2295
2296 if( has_technique( RAPID ) ) {
2297 Creature *temp_rs_mon = &mon;
2298 damage_instance rs_base_damage;
2299 guy.roll_all_damage( crit, rs_base_damage, true, *this, "WEAPON", &mon, bp );
2300 damage_instance dealt_rs_damage = rs_base_damage;
2301 for( damage_unit &dmg_unit : dealt_rs_damage.damage_units ) {
2302 dmg_unit.damage_multiplier *= 0.66;
2303 }
2304 // TODO: Modify DPS calculation to consider weakpoints.
2305 resistances rs_r = resistances( *static_cast<monster *>( temp_rs_mon ) );
2306 for( damage_unit &dmg_unit : dealt_rs_damage.damage_units ) {
2307 dmg_unit.amount -= std::min( rs_r.get_effective_resist( dmg_unit ), dmg_unit.amount );
2308 }
2309 dealt_damage_instance rs_dealt_dams;
2310 for( const damage_unit &dmg_unit : dealt_rs_damage.damage_units ) {
2311 int cur_damage = 0;
2312 int total_pain = 0;
2313 temp_rs_mon->deal_damage_handle_type( effect_source::empty(), dmg_unit, bp,
2314 cur_damage, total_pain );
2315 if( cur_damage > 0 ) {
2316 rs_dealt_dams.dealt_dams[dmg_unit.type] += cur_damage;
2317 }
2318 }
2319 double rs_damage_per_hit = rs_dealt_dams.total_damage();
2320 subtotal_moves *= 0.5;
2321 subtotal_damage *= 0.5;
2322 subtotal_moves += moves_per_attack * num_strikes * 0.33;
2323 subtotal_damage += rs_damage_per_hit * num_strikes * 0.5;
2324 }
2325 return std::make_pair( subtotal_moves, subtotal_damage );
2326 };
2327 std::pair<double, double> crit_summary = calc_effective_damage( num_crits, true, guy, mon );
2328 total_moves += crit_summary.first;
2329 total_damage += crit_summary.second;
2330 std::pair<double, double> summary = calc_effective_damage( num_hits, false, guy, mon );
2331 total_moves += summary.first;
2332 total_damage += summary.second;
2333 return total_damage * to_moves<double>( 1_seconds ) / total_moves;
2334}
2335
2336struct dps_comp_data {
2337 mtype_id mon_id;
2338 bool display;
2339 bool evaluate;
2340};
2341
2342static const std::vector<std::pair<translation, dps_comp_data>> dps_comp_monsters = {
2343 { to_translation( "Best" ), { debug_mon, true, false } },
2344 { to_translation( "Vs. Agile" ), { mon_zombie_smoker, true, true } },
2345 { to_translation( "Vs. Armored" ), { mon_zombie_soldier, true, true } },
2346 { to_translation( "Vs. Mixed" ), { mon_zombie_survivor, false, true } },
2347};
2348
2349std::map<std::string, double> item::dps( const bool for_display, const bool for_calc,
2350 const Character &guy ) const
2351{
2352 std::map<std::string, double> results;
2353 for( const std::pair<translation, dps_comp_data> &comp_mon : dps_comp_monsters ) {
2354 if( ( comp_mon.second.display != for_display ) &&
2355 ( comp_mon.second.evaluate != for_calc ) ) {
2356 continue;
2357 }
2358 monster test_mon = monster( comp_mon.second.mon_id );
2359 results[ comp_mon.first.translated() ] = effective_dps( guy, test_mon );
2360 }
2361 return results;
2362}
2363
2364std::map<std::string, double> item::dps( const bool for_display, const bool for_calc ) const
2365{
2366 return dps( for_display, for_calc, get_avatar() );
2367}
2368
2369double item::average_dps( const Character &guy ) const
2370{
2371 double dmg_count = 0.0;
2372 const std::map<std::string, double> &dps_data = dps( false, true, guy );
2373 for( const std::pair<const std::string, double> &dps_entry : dps_data ) {
2374 dmg_count += dps_entry.second;
2375 }
2376 return dmg_count / dps_data.size();
2377}
2378
2379void item::basic_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch,
2380 bool /* debug */ ) const
2381{
2382 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_MOD_SRC ) ) {
2383 info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "Origin: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Origin: %s" ) ) ), enumerate_as_string( type->src,
2384 []( const std::pair<itype_id, mod_id> &source ) {
2385 return string_format( "'%s'", source.second->name() );
2386 }, enumeration_conjunction::arrow ) ) );
2387 insert_separation_line( info );
2388 }
2389
2390 const std::string space = " ";
2391 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_MATERIAL ) ) {
2392 const std::vector<const material_type *> mat_types = made_of_types();
2393 if( !mat_types.empty() ) {
2394 const std::string material_list = enumerate_as_string( mat_types,
2395 []( const material_type * material ) {
2396 return string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>", material->name() );
2397 }, enumeration_conjunction::none );
2398 info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "Material: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Material: %s" ) ) ), material_list ) );
2399 }
2400 }
2401 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_VOLUME ) ) {
2402 info.push_back( vol_to_info( "BASE", _( "Volume: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Volume: " ) ) ), volume() * batch, 3 ) );
2403 }
2404 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_WEIGHT ) ) {
2405 info.push_back( weight_to_info( "BASE", space + _( "Weight: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Weight: " ) ) ), weight() * batch ) );
2406 info.back().bNewLine = true;
2407 }
2408 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_LENGTH ) && length() > 0_mm ) {
2409 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Length: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Length: " ) ) ),
2410 string_format( "<num> %s", length_units( length() ) ),
2411 iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2412 convert_length( length() ), length().value() );
2413 }
2414 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_OWNER ) && !owner.is_null() ) {
2415 info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "Owner: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Owner: %s" ) ) ),
2416 _( get_owner_name() )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( get_owner_name() ) ) ) ) );
2417 }
2418 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_CATEGORY ) ) {
2419 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Category: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Category: " ) ) ),
2420 "<header>" + get_category_shallow().name_header() + "</header>" );
2421 }
2422
2423 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION ) ) {
2424 insert_separation_line( info );
2425 const std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator idescription =
2426 item_vars.find( "description" );
2427 const std::optional<translation> snippet = SNIPPET.get_snippet_by_id( snip_id );
2428 if( snippet.has_value() ) {
2429 // Just use the dynamic description
2430 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", snippet.value().translated() );
2431
2432 // only ever do the effect for a snippet the first time you see it
2433 if( !get_avatar().has_seen_snippet( snip_id ) ) {
2434 // Have looked at the item so call the on examine EOC for the snippet
2435 const std::optional<talk_effect_t> examine_effect = SNIPPET.get_EOC_by_id( snip_id );
2436 if( examine_effect.has_value() ) {
2437 // activate the effect
2438 dialogue d( get_talker_for( get_avatar() ), nullptr );
2439 examine_effect.value().apply( d );
2440 }
2441
2442 //note that you have seen the snippet
2443 get_avatar().add_snippet( snip_id );
2444 }
2445 } else if( idescription != item_vars.end() ) {
2446 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", idescription->second );
2447 } else if( has_itype_variant() ) {
2448 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", variant_description() );
2449 } else {
2450 if( has_flag( flag_MAGIC_FOCUS ) ) {
2451 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2452 _( "This item is a <info>magical focus</info>. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item is a <info>magical focus</info>. "
"You can cast spells with it in your hand." ) ) )
2453 "You can cast spells with it in your hand." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item is a <info>magical focus</info>. "
"You can cast spells with it in your hand." ) ) ) );
2454 }
2455 if( is_craft() ) {
2456 const std::string desc = ( typeId() == itype_disassembly ) ?
2457 _( "This is an in progress disassembly of %s. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This is an in progress disassembly of %s. "
"It is %d percent complete." ) ) )
2458 "It is %d percent complete." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This is an in progress disassembly of %s. "
"It is %d percent complete." ) ) ) : _( "This is an in progress %s. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This is an in progress %s. "
"It is %d percent complete." ) ) )
2459 "It is %d percent complete." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This is an in progress %s. "
"It is %d percent complete." ) ) );
2460 const int percent_progress = item_counter / 100000;
2461 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( desc,
2462 craft_data_->making->result_name(),
2463 percent_progress ) );
2464 } else {
2465 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", type->description.translated() );
2466 }
2467 }
2468 insert_separation_line( info );
2469 }
2470
2471 insert_separation_line( info );
2472
2473 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_REQUIREMENTS ) ) {
2474 // Display any minimal stat or skill requirements for the item
2475 std::vector<std::string> req;
2476 if( get_min_str() > 0 ) {
2477 req.push_back( string_format( "%s %d", _( "strength" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "strength" ) ) ), get_min_str() ) );
2478 }
2479 if( type->min_dex > 0 ) {
2480 req.push_back( string_format( "%s %d", _( "dexterity" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "dexterity" ) ) ), type->min_dex ) );
2481 }
2482 if( type->min_int > 0 ) {
2483 req.push_back( string_format( "%s %d", _( "intelligence" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "intelligence" ) ) ), type->min_int ) );
2484 }
2485 if( type->min_per > 0 ) {
2486 req.push_back( string_format( "%s %d", _( "perception" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "perception" ) ) ), type->min_per ) );
2487 }
2488 for( const std::pair<skill_id, int> &sk : sorted_lex( type->min_skills ) ) {
2489 req.push_back( string_format( "%s %d", sk.first->name(), sk.second ) );
2490 }
2491 if( !req.empty() ) {
2492 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "<bold>Minimum requirements</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Minimum requirements</bold>:"
) ) ) );
2493 info.emplace_back( "BASE", enumerate_as_string( req ) );
2494 insert_separation_line( info );
2495 }
2496 }
2497
2498 if( has_var( "contained_name" ) && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_CONTENTS ) ) {
2499 info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "Contains: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Contains: %s" ) ) ),
2500 get_var( "contained_name" ) ) );
2501 }
2502 if( count_by_charges() && !is_food() && !is_medication() &&
2503 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_AMOUNT ) ) {
2504 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Amount: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Amount: " ) ) ), "<num>", iteminfo::no_flags,
2505 charges * batch );
2506 }
2507}
2508
2509void item::debug_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /* batch */,
2510 bool debug ) const
2511{
2512 if( debug && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_DEBUG ) ) {
2513 if( g != nullptr ) {
2514 info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( "itype_id: %s",
2515 typeId().str() ) );
2516 if( !old_owner.is_null() ) {
2517 info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "Old owner: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Old owner: %s" ) ) ),
2518 _( get_old_owner_name() )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( get_old_owner_name() ) ) ) ) );
2519 }
2520 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "age (hours): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "age (hours): " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2521 to_hours<int>( age() ) );
2522 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "charges: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "charges: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2523 charges );
2524 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "damage: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "damage: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2525 damage_ );
2526 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "degradation: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "degradation: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2527 degradation_ );
2528 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "active: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "active: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2529 active );
2530 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "burn: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "burn: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2531 burnt );
2532 if( countdown_point != calendar::turn_max ) {
2533 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "countdown: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "countdown: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2534 to_seconds<int>( countdown_point - calendar::turn ) );
2535 }
2536
2537 const std::string tags_listed = enumerate_as_string( item_tags,
2538 []( const flag_id & f ) {
2539 return f.str();
2540 }, enumeration_conjunction::none );
2541 info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "tags: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "tags: %s" ) ) ), tags_listed ) );
2542
2543 const std::string flags_listed = enumerate_as_string( type->get_flags(),
2544 []( const flag_id & f ) {
2545 return f.str();
2546 }, enumeration_conjunction::none );
2547
2548 info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "flags: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "flags: %s" ) ) ), flags_listed ) );
2549 for( auto const &imap : item_vars ) {
2550 info.emplace_back( "BASE",
2551 string_format( _( "item var: %s, %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "item var: %s, %s" ) ) ), imap.first,
2552 imap.second ) );
2553 }
2554
2555 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "wetness: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "wetness: " ) ) ),
2556 "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2557 wetness );
2558
2559 const std::string space = " ";
2560 if( goes_bad() ) {
2561 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "age (turns): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "age (turns): " ) ) ),
2562 "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2563 to_turns<int>( age() ) );
2564 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "rot (turns): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "rot (turns): " ) ) ),
2565 "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2566 to_turns<int>( rot ) );
2567 info.emplace_back( "BASE", space + _( "max rot (turns): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "max rot (turns): " ) ) ),
2568 "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2569 to_turns<int>( get_shelf_life() ) );
2570 }
2571 if( has_temperature() ) {
2572 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "last temp: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "last temp: " ) ) ),
2573 "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2574 to_turn<int>( last_temp_check ) );
2575 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Temp: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Temp: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2576 units::to_kelvin( temperature ) );
2577 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Spec ener: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Spec ener: " ) ) ), "",
2578 iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2579 units::to_joule_per_gram( specific_energy ) );
2580 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Spec heat lq: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Spec heat lq: " ) ) ), "",
2581 iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2582 get_specific_heat_liquid() );
2583 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Spec heat sld: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Spec heat sld: " ) ) ), "",
2584 iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2585 get_specific_heat_solid() );
2586 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "latent heat: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "latent heat: " ) ) ), "",
2587 iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2588 get_latent_heat() );
2589 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Freeze point: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Freeze point: " ) ) ), "",
2590 iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2591 units::to_kelvin( get_freeze_point() ) );
2592 }
2593 }
2594 }
2595}
2596
2597void item::med_info( const item *med_item, std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
2598 int batch, bool debug ) const
2599{
2600 const cata::value_ptr<islot_comestible> &med_com = med_item->get_comestible();
2601 if( med_com->quench != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MED_QUENCH ) ) {
2602 info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Quench: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Quench: " ) ) ), med_com->quench );
2603 }
2604
2605 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
2606 if( med_item->get_comestible_fun() != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MED_JOY ) ) {
2607 info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Enjoyability: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Enjoyability: " ) ) ),
2608 player_character.fun_for( *med_item ).first );
2609 }
2610
2611 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_HEALTH ) && med_com->healthy != 0 ) {
2612 info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Health: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Health: " ) ) ), healthy_bar( med_com->healthy ) );
2613 }
2614
2615 if( med_com->stim != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MED_STIMULATION ) ) {
2616 std::string name = string_format( "%s<stat>%s</stat>", _( "Stimulation: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stimulation: " ) ) ),
2617 med_com->stim > 0 ? _( "Upper" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Upper" ) ) ) : _( "Downer" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Downer" ) ) ) );
2618 info.emplace_back( "MED", name );
2619 }
2620
2621 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MED_PORTIONS ) ) {
2622 info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Portions: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Portions: " ) ) ),
2623 std::abs( static_cast<int>( med_item->count() ) * batch ) );
2624 }
2625
2626 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MED_CONSUME_TIME ) ) {
2627 info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Consume time: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Consume time: " ) ) ),
2628 to_string( player_character.get_consume_time( *med_item ) ) );
2629 }
2630
2631 bool addictive = false;
2632 for( const std::pair<const addiction_id, int> &add : med_com->addictions ) {
2633 if( add.second > 0 ) {
2634 addictive = true;
2635 break;
2636 }
2637 }
2638 if( addictive && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MED_ADDICTING ) ) {
2639 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* Consuming this item is <bad>addicting</bad>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* Consuming this item is <bad>addicting</bad>."
) ) ) );
2640 }
2641
2642 rot_info( med_item, info, parts, batch, debug );
2643}
2644
2645void item::food_info( const item *food_item, std::vector<iteminfo> &info,
2646 const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch, bool debug ) const
2647{
2648 nutrients min_nutr;
2649 nutrients max_nutr;
2650
2651 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
2652 std::string recipe_exemplar = get_var( "recipe_exemplar", "" );
2653 if( recipe_exemplar.empty() ) {
2654 min_nutr = max_nutr = player_character.compute_effective_nutrients( *food_item );
2655 } else {
2656 std::map<recipe_id, std::pair<nutrients, nutrients>> rec_cache;
2657 std::tie( min_nutr, max_nutr ) =
2658 player_character.compute_nutrient_range( *food_item, recipe_id( recipe_exemplar ), rec_cache );
2659 }
2660
2661 bool show_nutr = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_NUTRITION ) ||
2662 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_VITAMINS );
2663 if( min_nutr != max_nutr && show_nutr ) {
2664 info.emplace_back(
2665 "FOOD", _( "Nutrition will <color_cyan>vary with chosen ingredients</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nutrition will <color_cyan>vary with chosen ingredients</color>."
) ) ) );
2666 if( recipe_dict.is_item_on_loop( food_item->typeId() ) ) {
2667 info.emplace_back(
2668 "FOOD", _( "Nutrition range cannot be calculated accurately due to "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nutrition range cannot be calculated accurately due to "
"<color_red>recipe loops</color>." ) ) )
2669 "<color_red>recipe loops</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nutrition range cannot be calculated accurately due to "
"<color_red>recipe loops</color>." ) ) ) );
2670 }
2671 }
2672
2673 if( max_nutr.kcal() != 0 || food_item->get_comestible()->quench != 0 ) {
2674 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_NUTRITION ) ) {
2675 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "<bold>Calories (kcal)</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Calories (kcal)</bold>: "
) ) ),
2676 "", iteminfo::no_newline, min_nutr.kcal() );
2677 if( max_nutr.kcal() != min_nutr.kcal() ) {
2678 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "-" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "-" ) ) ),
2679 "", iteminfo::no_newline, max_nutr.kcal() );
2680 }
2681 }
2682 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_QUENCH ) ) {
2683 const std::string space = " ";
2684 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", space + _( "Quench: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Quench: " ) ) ),
2685 food_item->get_comestible()->quench );
2686 }
2687 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_SATIATION ) ) {
2688
2689 if( max_nutr.kcal() == min_nutr.kcal() ) {
2690 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "<bold>Satiety: </bold>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Satiety: </bold>"
) ) ),
2691 satiety_bar( player_character.compute_calories_per_effective_volume( *food_item ) ) );
2692 } else {
2693 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "<bold>Satiety: </bold>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Satiety: </bold>"
) ) ),
2694 satiety_bar( player_character.compute_calories_per_effective_volume( *food_item, &min_nutr ) ),
2695 iteminfo::no_newline
2696 );
2697 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( " - " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " - " ) ) ),
2698 satiety_bar( player_character.compute_calories_per_effective_volume( *food_item, &max_nutr ) ) );
2699 }
2700 }
2701 }
2702
2703 const std::pair<int, int> fun_for_food_item = player_character.fun_for( *food_item );
2704 if( fun_for_food_item.first != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_JOY ) ) {
2705 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Enjoyability: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Enjoyability: " ) ) ), fun_for_food_item.first );
2706 }
2707
2708 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_HEALTH ) && food_item->get_comestible()->healthy != 0 ) {
2709 info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Health: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Health: " ) ) ),
2710 healthy_bar( food_item->get_comestible()->healthy ) );
2711 }
2712
2713 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_PORTIONS ) ) {
2714 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Portions: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Portions: " ) ) ),
2715 std::abs( static_cast<int>( food_item->count() ) * batch ) );
2716 }
2717 if( food_item->corpse != nullptr && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_SMELL ) &&
2718 ( debug || ( g != nullptr && player_character.has_trait( trait_CARNIVORE ) ) ) ) {
2719 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Smells like: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Smells like: " ) ) ) + food_item->corpse->nname() );
2720 }
2721
2722 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_CONSUME_TIME ) ) {
2723 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Consume time: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Consume time: " ) ) ),
2724 to_string( player_character.get_consume_time( *food_item ) ) );
2725 }
2726
2727 auto format_vitamin = [&]( const std::pair<vitamin_id, int> &v, bool display_vitamins ) {
2728 const bool is_vitamin = v.first->type() == vitamin_type::VITAMIN;
2729 // only display vitamins that we actually require
2730 if( player_character.vitamin_rate( v.first ) == 0_turns || v.second == 0 ||
2731 display_vitamins != is_vitamin || v.first->has_flag( flag_NO_DISPLAY ) ) {
2732 return std::string();
2733 }
2734 const int min_value = min_nutr.get_vitamin( v.first );
2735 const int max_value = v.second;
2736 const int min_rda = player_character.vitamin_RDA( v.first, min_value );
2737 const int max_rda = player_character.vitamin_RDA( v.first, max_value );
2738 std::pair<std::string, std::string> weight_and_units = v.first->mass_str_from_units( v.second );
2739 std::string weight_str;
2740 if( !weight_and_units.first.empty() ) {
2741 if( min_value != max_value ) {
2742 std::pair<std::string, std::string> min_weight_and_units = v.first->mass_str_from_units(
2743 min_nutr.get_vitamin( v.first ) );
2744 const bool show_first_unit = ( min_value != 0 ) &&
2745 ( min_weight_and_units.second != weight_and_units.second );
2746 std::string first_string = string_format( !show_first_unit ? "%s" : "%s %s",
2747 min_weight_and_units.first, min_weight_and_units.second );
2748 weight_str = string_format( "%s-%s %s ", first_string, weight_and_units.first,
2749 weight_and_units.second );
2750 } else {
2751 weight_str = string_format( "%s %s ", weight_and_units.first, weight_and_units.second );
2752 }
2753 }
2754 std::string format;
2755 if( is_vitamin ) {
2756 format = min_value == max_value ? "%s%s (%i%%)" : "%s%s (%i-%i%%)";
2757 return string_format( format, weight_str, v.first->name(), min_rda, max_rda );
2758 }
2759 format = min_value == max_value ? "%s%s (%i U)" : "%s%s (%i-%i U)";
2760 return string_format( format, weight_str, v.first->name(), min_value, max_value );
2761 };
2762
2763 const auto max_nutr_vitamins = sorted_lex( max_nutr.vitamins() );
2764 const std::string required_vits = enumerate_as_string( max_nutr_vitamins,
2765 [&]( const std::pair<vitamin_id, int> &v ) {
2766 return format_vitamin( v, true );
2767 } );
2768
2769 const std::string effect_vits = enumerate_as_string( max_nutr_vitamins,
2770 [&]( const std::pair<vitamin_id, int> &v ) {
2771 return format_vitamin( v, false );
2772 } );
2773
2774 if( !required_vits.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_VITAMINS ) ) {
2775 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Vitamins (RDA): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Vitamins (RDA): " ) ) ), required_vits );
2776 }
2777
2778 if( !effect_vits.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_VIT_EFFECTS ) ) {
2779 info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Other contents: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Other contents: " ) ) ), effect_vits );
2780 }
2781
2782 insert_separation_line( info );
2783
2784 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_ALLERGEN )
2785 && player_character.allergy_type( *food_item ) != morale_null ) {
2786 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2787 _( "* This food will cause an <bad>allergic reaction</bad>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This food will cause an <bad>allergic reaction</bad>."
) ) ) );
2788 }
2789
2790 if( food_item->has_flag( flag_CANNIBALISM ) &&
2791 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_CANNIBALISM ) ) {
2792 if( !player_character.has_flag( json_flag_CANNIBAL ) &&
2793 !player_character.has_flag( json_flag_PSYCHOPATH ) &&
2794 !player_character.has_flag( json_flag_SAPIOVORE ) ) {
2795 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2796 _( "* This food contains <bad>human flesh</bad>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This food contains <bad>human flesh</bad>."
) ) ) );
2797 } else {
2798 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2799 _( "* This food contains <good>human flesh</good>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This food contains <good>human flesh</good>."
) ) ) );
2800 }
2801 }
2802
2803 if( food_item->is_tainted() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_CANNIBALISM ) ) {
2804 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2805 _( "* This food is <bad>tainted</bad> and will poison you." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This food is <bad>tainted</bad> and will poison you."
) ) ) );
2806 }
2807
2808 ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL >=3 allows detection of poisonous food
2809 if( food_item->has_flag( flag_HIDDEN_POISON ) &&
2810 player_character.get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( skill_survival ) >= 3 &&
2811 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_POISON ) ) {
2812 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2813 _( "* On closer inspection, this appears to be "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* On closer inspection, this appears to be "
"<bad>poisonous</bad>." ) ) )
2814 "<bad>poisonous</bad>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* On closer inspection, this appears to be "
"<bad>poisonous</bad>." ) ) ) );
2815 }
2816
2817 ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL >=5 allows detection of hallucinogenic food
2818 if( food_item->has_flag( flag_HIDDEN_HALLU ) &&
2819 player_character.get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( skill_survival ) >= 5 &&
2820 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_HALLUCINOGENIC ) ) {
2821 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2822 _( "* On closer inspection, this appears to be "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* On closer inspection, this appears to be "
"<neutral>hallucinogenic</neutral>." ) ) )
2823 "<neutral>hallucinogenic</neutral>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* On closer inspection, this appears to be "
"<neutral>hallucinogenic</neutral>." ) ) ) );
2824 }
2825
2826 rot_info( food_item, info, parts, batch, debug );
2827}
2828
2829void item::rot_info( const item *const food_item, std::vector<iteminfo> &info,
2830 const iteminfo_query *const parts, const int /*batch*/, const bool /*debug*/ ) const
2831{
2832 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
2833
2834 if( food_item->goes_bad() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_ROT ) ) {
2835 const std::string rot_time = to_string_clipped( food_item->get_shelf_life() );
2836 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2837 string_format( _( "* This item is <neutral>perishable</neutral>, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item is <neutral>perishable</neutral>, "
"and at room temperature has an estimated nominal " "shelf life of <info>%s</info>."
) ) )
2838 "and at room temperature has an estimated nominal "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item is <neutral>perishable</neutral>, "
"and at room temperature has an estimated nominal " "shelf life of <info>%s</info>."
) ) )
2839 "shelf life of <info>%s</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item is <neutral>perishable</neutral>, "
"and at room temperature has an estimated nominal " "shelf life of <info>%s</info>."
) ) ), rot_time ) );
2840
2841 if( !food_item->rotten() ) {
2842 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", get_freshness_description( *food_item ) );
2843 }
2844
2845 if( food_item->has_flag( flag_FREEZERBURN ) && !food_item->rotten() &&
2846 !food_item->has_flag( flag_MUSHY ) ) {
2847 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2848 _( "* Quality of this food suffers when it's frozen, and it "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* Quality of this food suffers when it's frozen, and it "
"<neutral>will become mushy after thawing out</neutral>."
) ) )
2849 "<neutral>will become mushy after thawing out</neutral>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* Quality of this food suffers when it's frozen, and it "
"<neutral>will become mushy after thawing out</neutral>."
) ) ) );
2850 }
2851 if( food_item->has_flag( flag_MUSHY ) && !food_item->rotten() ) {
2852 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2853 _( "* It was frozen once and after thawing became <bad>mushy and "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* It was frozen once and after thawing became <bad>mushy and "
"tasteless</bad>. It will rot quickly if thawed again."
) ) )
2854 "tasteless</bad>. It will rot quickly if thawed again." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* It was frozen once and after thawing became <bad>mushy and "
"tasteless</bad>. It will rot quickly if thawed again."
) ) ) );
2855 }
2856 if( food_item->has_flag( flag_NO_PARASITES ) &&
2857 player_character.get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( skill_cooking ) >= 3 ) {
2858 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2859 _( "* It seems that deep freezing <good>killed all "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* It seems that deep freezing <good>killed all "
"parasites</good>." ) ) )
2860 "parasites</good>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* It seems that deep freezing <good>killed all "
"parasites</good>." ) ) ) );
2861 }
2862 if( food_item->rotten() ) {
2863 if( player_character.has_bionic( bio_digestion ) ) {
2864 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2865 _( "This item has started to <neutral>rot</neutral>, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item has started to <neutral>rot</neutral>, "
"but <info>your bionic digestion can tolerate " "it</info>."
) ) )
2866 "but <info>your bionic digestion can tolerate "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item has started to <neutral>rot</neutral>, "
"but <info>your bionic digestion can tolerate " "it</info>."
) ) )
2867 "it</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item has started to <neutral>rot</neutral>, "
"but <info>your bionic digestion can tolerate " "it</info>."
) ) ) );
2868 } else if( player_character.has_flag( json_flag_IMMUNE_SPOIL ) ) {
2869 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2870 _( "This item has started to <neutral>rot</neutral>, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item has started to <neutral>rot</neutral>, "
"but <info>you can tolerate it</info>." ) ) )
2871 "but <info>you can tolerate it</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item has started to <neutral>rot</neutral>, "
"but <info>you can tolerate it</info>." ) ) ) );
2872 } else {
2873 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2874 _( "This item has started to <bad>rot</bad>. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item has started to <bad>rot</bad>. "
"<info>Eating</info> it would be a <bad>very bad "
"idea</bad>." ) ) )
2875 "<info>Eating</info> it would be a <bad>very bad "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item has started to <bad>rot</bad>. "
"<info>Eating</info> it would be a <bad>very bad "
"idea</bad>." ) ) )
2876 "idea</bad>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item has started to <bad>rot</bad>. "
"<info>Eating</info> it would be a <bad>very bad "
"idea</bad>." ) ) ) );
2877 }
2878 }
2879 }
2880}
2881
2882void item::magazine_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
2883 bool /*debug*/ ) const
2884{
2885 if( !is_magazine() || has_flag( flag_NO_RELOAD ) || is_tool() ) {
2886 return;
2887 }
2888
2889 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MAGAZINE_COMPATIBLE_GUNS ) &&
2890 islot_magazine::compatible_guns.find( this->typeId() ) != islot_magazine::compatible_guns.end() ) {
2891 const auto compare = []( const auto & lhs, const auto & rhs ) {
2892 return localized_compare( lhs, rhs );
2893 };
2894 std::set<std::string, decltype( compare )> compatible_guns( compare );
2895
2896 for( const itype_id &gun_type_id : islot_magazine::compatible_guns[this->typeId()] ) {
2897 const itype &gun_type = gun_type_id.obj();
2898 if( get_option<bool>( "SHOW_GUN_VARIANTS" ) ) {
2899 if( gun_type.variants.empty() ) {
2900 compatible_guns.insert( gun_type.nname( 1 ) );
2901 }
2902 for( const itype_variant_data &variant_type : gun_type.variants ) {
2903 compatible_guns.insert( variant_type.alt_name.translated() );
2904 }
2905 } else {
2906 compatible_guns.insert( gun_type.nname( 1 ) );
2907 }
2908 }
2909
2910 if( !compatible_guns.empty() ) {
2911 const std::string mag_names = enumerate_as_string( compatible_guns );
2912 info.emplace_back( "MAGAZINE", _( "<bold>Compatible guns</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Compatible guns</bold>: "
) ) ) + mag_names );
2913 insert_separation_line( info );
2914 }
2915 }
2916 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MAGAZINE_CAPACITY ) ) {
2917 for( const ammotype &at : ammo_types() ) {
2918 const std::string fmt = string_format( n_gettext( "<num> round of %s",
2919 "<num> rounds of %s", ammo_capacity( at ) ),
2920 at->name() );
2921 info.emplace_back( "MAGAZINE", _( "Capacity: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Capacity: " ) ) ), fmt, iteminfo::no_flags,
2922 ammo_capacity( at ) );
2923 }
2924 }
2925 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MAGAZINE_COMPATABILITY ) ) {
2926 for( const ammotype &at : ammo_types() ) {
2927 std::string ammo_details = print_ammo( at );
2928 if( !ammo_details.empty() ) {
2929 info.emplace_back( "MAGAZINE", _( "Variants: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Variants: " ) ) ), ammo_details, iteminfo::no_flags );
2930 }
2931
2932 }
2933 }
2934 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MAGAZINE_RELOAD ) && type->magazine ) {
2935 info.emplace_back( "MAGAZINE", _( "Reload time: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Reload time: " ) ) ), _( "<num> moves per round" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<num> moves per round"
) ) ),
2936 iteminfo::lower_is_better, type->magazine->reload_time );
2937 }
2938 insert_separation_line( info );
2939}
2940
2941void item::ammo_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /* batch */,
2942 bool /* debug */ ) const
2943{
2944 // Skip this section for guns and items without ammo data
2945 if( is_gun() || !ammo_data() ||
2946 !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_REMAINING_OR_TYPES ) ) {
2947 return;
2948 }
2949
2950 const islot_ammo &ammo = *ammo_data()->ammo;
2951 if( !ammo.damage.empty() || ammo.force_stat_display ) {
2952 if( is_ammo() ) {
2953 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "<bold>Ammunition type</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Ammunition type</bold>: "
) ) ), ammo_type()->name() );
2954 } else if( ammo_remaining() > 0 ) {
2955 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "<bold>Ammunition</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Ammunition</bold>: "
) ) ),
2956 ammo_data()->nname( ammo_remaining() ) );
2957 }
2958
2959 const std::string space = " ";
2960 if( !ammo.damage.empty() && ammo.damage.damage_units.front().amount > 0 ) {
2961 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_VALUE ) ) {
2962 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Damage: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Damage: " ) ) ), "",
2963 iteminfo::no_newline, ammo.damage.total_damage() );
2964 }
2965 } else if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_PROPORTIONAL ) ) {
2966 const float multiplier = ammo.damage.empty() ? 1.0f
2967 : ammo.damage.damage_units.front().unconditional_damage_mult;
2968 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Damage multiplier: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Damage multiplier: " ) ) ), "",
2969 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2970 multiplier );
2971 }
2972 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_AP ) ) {
2973 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", space + _( "Armor-pierce: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Armor-pierce: " ) ) ), get_ranged_pierce( ammo ) );
2974 }
2975 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_RANGE ) ) {
2976 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Range: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Range: " ) ) ), "<num>" + space,
2977 iteminfo::no_newline, ammo.range );
2978 }
2979 if( ammo.range_multiplier != 1.0f && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_RANGE_MULTIPLIER ) ) {
2980 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Range Multiplier: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Range Multiplier: " ) ) ), "<num>",
2981 iteminfo::is_decimal, ammo.range_multiplier );
2982 }
2983 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_DISPERSION ) ) {
2984 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Dispersion: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Dispersion: " ) ) ), "",
2985 iteminfo::lower_is_better, ammo.dispersion );
2986 }
2987 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_RECOIL ) ) {
2988 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Recoil: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Recoil: " ) ) ), "",
2989 iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::no_newline, ammo.recoil );
2990 }
2991 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_CRIT_MULTIPLIER ) ) {
2992 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", space + _( "Critical multiplier: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Critical multiplier: " ) ) ), ammo.critical_multiplier );
2993 }
2994 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_BARREL_DETAILS ) ) {
2995 std::string barrel_details;
2996 const units::length small = 150_mm;
2997 const units::length medium = 400_mm;
2998 const units::length large = 600_mm;
2999 const int small_damage = static_cast<int>( ammo.damage.di_considering_length(
3000 small ).total_damage() );
3001 const int medium_damage = static_cast<int>( ammo.damage.di_considering_length(
3002 medium ).total_damage() );
3003 const int large_damage = static_cast<int>( ammo.damage.di_considering_length(
3004 large ).total_damage() );
3005 const int small_dispersion = static_cast<int>( ammo.dispersion_considering_length( small ) );
3006 const int medium_dispersion = static_cast<int>( ammo.dispersion_considering_length( medium ) );
3007 const int large_dispersion = static_cast<int>( ammo.dispersion_considering_length( large ) );
3008 if( small_damage != medium_damage || medium_damage != large_damage ||
3009 small_dispersion != medium_dispersion || medium_damage != large_dispersion ) {
3010 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Damage and dispersion by barrel length: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Damage and dispersion by barrel length: "
) ) ) );
3011 const std::string small_string = string_format( " <info>%d %s</info>: ",
3012 convert_length( small ),
3013 length_units( small ) );
3014 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", small_string, _( " damage: <num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " damage: <num>" ) ) ), iteminfo::no_newline,
3015 small_damage );
3016 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", "", _( " dispersion: <num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " dispersion: <num>" )
) ),
3017 iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::lower_is_better, small_dispersion );
3018 const std::string medium_string = string_format( " <info>%d %s</info>: ",
3019 convert_length( medium ),
3020 length_units( medium ) );
3021 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", medium_string, _( " damage: <num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " damage: <num>" ) ) ), iteminfo::no_newline,
3022 medium_damage );
3023 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", "", _( " dispersion: <num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " dispersion: <num>" )
) ),
3024 iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::lower_is_better, medium_dispersion );
3025 const std::string large_string = string_format( " <info>%d %s</info>: ",
3026 convert_length( large ),
3027 length_units( large ) );
3028 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", large_string, _( " damage: <num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " damage: <num>" ) ) ), iteminfo::no_newline,
3029 large_damage );
3030 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", "", _( " dispersion: <num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " dispersion: <num>" )
) ),
3031 iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::lower_is_better, large_dispersion );
3032 }
3033 }
3034 }
3035
3036 std::vector<std::string> fx;
3037 if( ammo.ammo_effects.count( "RECYCLED" ) &&
3038 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_RECYCLED ) ) {
3039 fx.emplace_back( _( "This ammo has been <bad>hand-loaded</bad>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This ammo has been <bad>hand-loaded</bad>."
) ) ) );
3040 }
3041 if( ammo.ammo_effects.count( "MATCHHEAD" ) &&
3042 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_BLACKPOWDER ) ) {
3043 fx.emplace_back(
3044 _( "This ammo has been loaded with <bad>matchhead powder</bad>, and will quickly "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This ammo has been loaded with <bad>matchhead powder</bad>, and will quickly "
"clog and rust most guns like blackpowder, but will also rarely cause the gun damage from pressure spikes."
) ) )
3045 "clog and rust most guns like blackpowder, but will also rarely cause the gun damage from pressure spikes." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This ammo has been loaded with <bad>matchhead powder</bad>, and will quickly "
"clog and rust most guns like blackpowder, but will also rarely cause the gun damage from pressure spikes."
) ) ) );
3046 } else if( ammo.ammo_effects.count( "BLACKPOWDER" ) &&
3047 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_BLACKPOWDER ) ) {
3048 fx.emplace_back(
3049 _( "This ammo has been loaded with <bad>blackpowder</bad>, and will quickly "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This ammo has been loaded with <bad>blackpowder</bad>, and will quickly "
"clog up most guns, and cause rust if the gun is not cleaned."
) ) )
3050 "clog up most guns, and cause rust if the gun is not cleaned." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This ammo has been loaded with <bad>blackpowder</bad>, and will quickly "
"clog up most guns, and cause rust if the gun is not cleaned."
) ) ) );
3051 }
3052 if( ammo.ammo_effects.count( "NEVER_MISFIRES" ) &&
3053 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_CANTMISSFIRE ) ) {
3054 fx.emplace_back( _( "This ammo <good>never misfires</good>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This ammo <good>never misfires</good>."
) ) ) );
3055 }
3056 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_RECOVER ) ) {
3057 for( const std::string &effect : ammo.ammo_effects ) {
3058 if( string_starts_with( effect, "RECOVER_" ) ) {
3059 ret_val<int> try_recover_chance =
3060 try_parse_integer<int>( effect.substr( 8 ), false );
3061 if( !try_recover_chance.success() ) {
3062 debugmsg( "Error parsing ammo RECOVER_ denominator: %s",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "3063", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Error parsing ammo RECOVER_ denominator: %s"
, try_recover_chance.str())
3063 try_recover_chance.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "3063", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Error parsing ammo RECOVER_ denominator: %s"
, try_recover_chance.str());
3064 break;
3065 }
3066 int recover_chance = try_recover_chance.value();
3067 if( recover_chance <= 5 ) {
3068 fx.emplace_back( _( "Stands a <bad>very low</bad> chance of remaining intact once fired." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stands a <bad>very low</bad> chance of remaining intact once fired."
) ) ) );
3069 } else if( recover_chance <= 10 ) {
3070 fx.emplace_back( _( "Stands a <bad>low</bad> chance of remaining intact once fired." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stands a <bad>low</bad> chance of remaining intact once fired."
) ) ) );
3071 } else if( recover_chance <= 20 ) {
3072 fx.emplace_back( _( "Stands a <bad>somewhat low</bad> chance of remaining intact once fired." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stands a <bad>somewhat low</bad> chance of remaining intact once fired."
) ) ) );
3073 } else if( recover_chance <= 30 ) {
3074 fx.emplace_back( _( "Stands a <good>decent</good> chance of remaining intact once fired." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stands a <good>decent</good> chance of remaining intact once fired."
) ) ) );
3075 } else {
3076 fx.emplace_back( _( "Stands a <good>good</good> chance of remaining intact once fired." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stands a <good>good</good> chance of remaining intact once fired."
) ) ) );
3077 }
3078 break;
3079 }
3080 }
3081 }
3082 if( ammo.ammo_effects.count( "INCENDIARY" ) &&
3083 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_INCENDIARY ) ) {
3084 fx.emplace_back( _( "This ammo <neutral>starts fires</neutral>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This ammo <neutral>starts fires</neutral>."
) ) ) );
3085 }
3086 if( !fx.empty() ) {
3087 insert_separation_line( info );
3088 for( const std::string &e : fx ) {
3089 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", e );
3090 }
3091 }
3092}
3093
3094void item::gun_info( const item *mod, std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
3095 int /* batch */, bool /* debug */ ) const
3096{
3097 const std::string space = " ";
3098 const islot_gun &gun = *mod->type->gun;
3099 const Skill &skill = *mod->gun_skill();
3100
3101 // many statistics are dependent upon loaded ammo
3102 // if item is unloaded (or is RELOAD_AND_SHOOT) shows approximate stats using default ammo
3103 const item *loaded_mod = mod;
3104 item tmp;
3105 const itype *curammo = nullptr;
3106 if( mod->ammo_required() && !mod->ammo_remaining() ) {
3107 tmp = *mod;
3108 itype_id default_ammo = mod->magazine_current() ? tmp.common_ammo_default() : tmp.ammo_default();
3109 if( !default_ammo.is_null() ) {
3110 tmp.ammo_set( default_ammo );
3111 } else if( !tmp.magazine_default().is_null() ) {
3112 // clear out empty magazines so put_in below doesn't error
3113 for( item *i : tmp.contents.all_items_top() ) {
3114 if( i->is_magazine() ) {
3115 tmp.remove_item( *i );
3116 tmp.on_contents_changed();
3117 }
3118 }
3119
3120 item tmp_mag( tmp.magazine_default() );
3121 tmp_mag.ammo_set( tmp_mag.ammo_default() );
3122 tmp.put_in( tmp_mag, pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL );
3123 }
3124 loaded_mod = &tmp;
3125 curammo = loaded_mod->ammo_data();
3126 // TODO: Should this be .is_null(), rather than comparing to "none"?
3127 if( loaded_mod == nullptr || loaded_mod->typeId().str() == "none" ||
3128 curammo == nullptr ) {
3129 if( magazine_current() ) {
3130 const itype_id mag_default = magazine_current()->ammo_default();
3131 if( mag_default.is_null() ) {
3132 debugmsg( "gun %s has magazine %s with no default ammo",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "3133", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "gun %s has magazine %s with no default ammo"
, typeId().c_str(), magazine_current()->typeId().c_str())
3133 typeId().c_str(), magazine_current()->typeId().c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "3133", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "gun %s has magazine %s with no default ammo"
, typeId().c_str(), magazine_current()->typeId().c_str());
3134 return;
3135 }
3136 curammo = &mag_default.obj();
3137 } else {
3138 debugmsg( "loaded a nun or ammo_data() is nullptr" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "3138", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "loaded a nun or ammo_data() is nullptr"
);
3139 return;
3140 }
3141 }
3142 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DEFAULT_AMMO ) ) {
3143 insert_separation_line( info );
3144 info.emplace_back( "GUN",
3145 _( "Weapon is <bad>not loaded</bad>, so stats below assume the default ammo: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Weapon is <bad>not loaded</bad>, so stats below assume the default ammo: "
) ) ),
3146 string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>",
3147 curammo->nname( 1 ) ) );
3148 }
3149 } else {
3150 curammo = loaded_mod->ammo_data();
3151 }
3152
3153 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DAMAGE ) ) {
3154 insert_separation_line( info );
3155 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "<bold>Ranged damage</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Ranged damage</bold>: "
) ) ), "", iteminfo::no_newline,
3156 mod->gun_damage( false ).total_damage() );
3157 }
3158
3159 if( mod->ammo_required() ) {
3160 // ammo_damage, sum_of_damage, and ammo_mult not shown so don't need to translate.
3161 float dmg_mult = 1.0f;
3162 for( const damage_unit &dmg : curammo->ammo->damage.damage_units ) {
3163 dmg_mult *= dmg.unconditional_damage_mult;
3164 }
3165 if( dmg_mult != 1.0f ) {
3166 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DAMAGE_AMMOPROP ) ) {
3167 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "ammo_mult", "*",
3168 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::is_decimal, dmg_mult );
3169 }
3170 } else {
3171 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DAMAGE_LOADEDAMMO ) ) {
3172 damage_instance ammo_dam = curammo->ammo->damage;
3173 int bullet_damage = ammo_dam.total_damage();
3174 if( mod->barrel_length().value() > 0 ) {
3175 bullet_damage = ammo_dam.di_considering_length( mod->barrel_length() ).total_damage();
3176 }
3177 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "ammo_damage", "",
3178 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::no_name |
3179 iteminfo::show_plus, bullet_damage );
3180 }
3181 }
3182
3183 const int gun_damage = loaded_mod->gun_damage( true ).total_damage();
3184 if( damage() > 0 ) {
3185 item intact_mod( *loaded_mod );
3186 intact_mod.set_degradation( 0 );
3187 intact_mod.set_damage( 0 );
3188 const int intact_damage = intact_mod.gun_damage( true ).total_damage();
3189 if( intact_damage != gun_damage ) {
3190 const int dmg_penalty = gun_damage - intact_damage;
3191 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "damaged_weapon_penalty", "",
3192 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::no_name, dmg_penalty );
3193 }
3194 }
3195
3196 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DAMAGE_TOTAL ) ) {
3197 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "sum_of_damage", _( " = <num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " = <num>" ) ) ),
3198 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::no_name, gun_damage );
3199 }
3200 }
3201 info.back().bNewLine = true;
3202
3203 if( mod->barrel_length().value() > 0 ) {
3204 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_BARRELLENGTH ) ) {
3205 info.emplace_back( "GUN", string_format( _( "Barrel Length: <info>%d %s</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Barrel Length: <info>%d %s</info>"
) ) ),
3206 convert_length( mod->barrel_length() ), length_units( mod->barrel_length() ) ),
3207 iteminfo::no_flags );
3208 }
3209 }
3210
3211 if( mod->ammo_required() && curammo->ammo->critical_multiplier != 1.0 ) {
3212 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_CRIT_MULTIPLIER ) ) {
3213 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Critical multiplier: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Critical multiplier: " ) ) ), "<num>",
3214 iteminfo::no_flags, curammo->ammo->critical_multiplier );
3215 }
3216 }
3217
3218 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
3219 int max_gun_range = loaded_mod->gun_range( &player_character );
3220 if( max_gun_range > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_MAX_RANGE ) ) {
3221 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Maximum range: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Maximum range: " ) ) ), "<num>", iteminfo::no_flags,
3222 max_gun_range );
3223 }
3224
3225 // TODO: This doesn't cover multiple damage types
3226
3227 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_ARMORPIERCE ) ) {
3228 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Armor-pierce: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Armor-pierce: " ) ) ), "",
3229 iteminfo::no_newline, get_ranged_pierce( gun ) );
3230 }
3231 if( mod->ammo_required() ) {
3232 int ammo_pierce = get_ranged_pierce( *curammo->ammo );
3233 // ammo_armor_pierce and sum_of_armor_pierce don't need to translate.
3234 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_ARMORPIERCE_LOADEDAMMO ) ) {
3235 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "ammo_armor_pierce", "",
3236 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::no_name |
3237 iteminfo::show_plus, ammo_pierce );
3238 }
3239 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_ARMORPIERCE_TOTAL ) ) {
3240 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "sum_of_armor_pierce", _( " = <num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " = <num>" ) ) ),
3241 iteminfo::no_name,
3242 get_ranged_pierce( gun ) + ammo_pierce );
3243 }
3244 }
3245 info.back().bNewLine = true;
3246
3247 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DISPERSION ) ) {
3248 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Dispersion: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Dispersion: " ) ) ), "",
3249 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
3250 mod->gun_dispersion( false, false ) );
3251 }
3252 if( mod->ammo_required() ) {
3253 int ammo_dispersion = curammo->ammo->dispersion_considering_length( barrel_length() );
3254 // ammo_dispersion and sum_of_dispersion don't need to translate.
3255 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DISPERSION_LOADEDAMMO ) ) {
3256 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "ammo_dispersion", "",
3257 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better |
3258 iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::show_plus,
3259 ammo_dispersion );
3260 }
3261 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DISPERSION_TOTAL ) ) {
3262 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "sum_of_dispersion", _( " = <num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " = <num>" ) ) ),
3263 iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::no_name,
3264 loaded_mod->gun_dispersion( true, false ) );
3265 }
3266 }
3267 info.back().bNewLine = true;
3268
3269 // if effective sight dispersion differs from actual sight dispersion display both
3270 std::pair<int, int> disp = mod->sight_dispersion( player_character );
3271 int act_disp = disp.first;
3272 int eff_disp = disp.second;
3273 int adj_disp = eff_disp - act_disp;
3274 int point_shooting_limit = player_character.point_shooting_limit( *mod );
3275
3276 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DISPERSION_SIGHT ) ) {
3277 if( point_shooting_limit <= eff_disp ) {
3278 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Sight dispersion (point shooting): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Sight dispersion (point shooting): "
) ) ), "",
3279 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
3280 point_shooting_limit );
3281 } else {
3282 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Sight dispersion: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Sight dispersion: " ) ) ), "",
3283 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
3284 act_disp );
3285
3286 if( adj_disp ) {
3287 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "sight_adj_disp", "",
3288 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better |
3289 iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::show_plus, adj_disp );
3290 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "sight_eff_disp", _( " = <num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " = <num>" ) ) ),
3291 iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::no_name,
3292 eff_disp );
3293 }
3294 }
3295 }
3296
3297 bool bipod = mod->has_flag( flag_BIPOD );
3298
3299 if( loaded_mod->gun_recoil( player_character ) ) {
3300 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_RECOIL ) ) {
3301 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Effective recoil: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Effective recoil: " ) ) ), "",
3302 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
3303 loaded_mod->gun_recoil( player_character ) );
3304 }
3305 if( bipod && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_RECOIL_BIPOD ) ) {
3306 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "bipod_recoil", _( " (with bipod <num>)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " (with bipod <num>)" )
) ),
3307 iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::no_name,
3308 loaded_mod->gun_recoil( player_character, true ) );
3309 }
3310
3311 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_RECOIL_THEORETICAL_MINIMUM ) ) {
3312 info.back().bNewLine = true;
3313 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Theoretical minimum recoil: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Theoretical minimum recoil: "
) ) ), "",
3314 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better, loaded_mod->gun_recoil( player_character, true,
3315 true ) );
3316 }
3317 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts:: GUN_IDEAL_STRENGTH ) ) {
3318 info.emplace_back( "GUN", "ideal_strength", _( " (when strength reaches: <num>)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " (when strength reaches: <num>)"
) ) ),
3319 iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::no_name,
3320 loaded_mod->gun_base_weight() / 333.0_gram );
3321 }
3322 }
3323 info.back().bNewLine = true;
3324 std::map<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> fire_modes = mod->gun_all_modes();
3325
3326 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_RELOAD_TIME ) ) {
3327 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Reload time: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Reload time: " ) ) ),
3328 has_flag( flag_RELOAD_ONE ) ? _( "<num> moves per round" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<num> moves per round"
) ) ) :
3329 _( "<num> moves" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<num> moves" ) ) ),
3330 iteminfo::lower_is_better, mod->get_reload_time() );
3331 }
3332
3333 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_CURRENT_LOUDNESS ) ) {
3334 const bool is_default_fire_mode = loaded_mod->gun_current_mode().tname() == "DEFAULT";
3335 //if empty, use the temporary gun loaded with default ammo
3336 const item::sound_data data = ( mod->ammo_required() &&
3337 !mod->ammo_remaining() ) ? tmp.gun_noise( is_default_fire_mode ) : loaded_mod->gun_noise(
3338 is_default_fire_mode );
3339 const int loudness = data.volume;
3340 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Loudness with current fire mode: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Loudness with current fire mode: "
) ) ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
3341 loudness );
3342 }
3343
3344 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_USEDSKILL ) ) {
3345 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Skill used: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Skill used: " ) ) ),
3346 "<info>" + skill.name() + "</info>" );
3347 }
3348
3349 if( mod->magazine_integral() || mod->magazine_current() ) {
3350 if( mod->magazine_current() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_MAGAZINE ) ) {
3351 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Magazine: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Magazine: " ) ) ),
3352 string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>",
3353 mod->magazine_current()->tname() ) );
3354 }
3355 if( !mod->ammo_types().empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_CAPACITY ) ) {
3356 for( const ammotype &at : mod->ammo_types() ) {
3357 const std::string fmt = string_format( n_gettext( "<num> round of %s",
3358 "<num> rounds of %s",
3359 mod->ammo_capacity( at ) ), at->name() );
3360 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Capacity: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Capacity: " ) ) ), fmt, iteminfo::no_flags,
3361 mod->ammo_capacity( at ) );
3362 std::string ammo_details = print_ammo( at );
3363 if( !ammo_details.empty() && !magazine_integral() ) {
3364 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Variants: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Variants: " ) ) ), ammo_details, iteminfo::no_flags );
3365 }
3366 }
3367 }
3368 } else if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_TYPE ) ) {
3369 const std::set<ammotype> types_of_ammo = mod->ammo_types();
3370 if( !types_of_ammo.empty() ) {
3371 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Type: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Type: " ) ) ), enumerate_as_string( types_of_ammo,
3372 []( const ammotype & at ) {
3373 return at->name();
3374 }, enumeration_conjunction::none ) );
3375 }
3376 }
3377
3378 if( mod->ammo_data() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_REMAINING ) ) {
3379 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Ammunition: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Ammunition: " ) ) ), string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>",
3380 mod->ammo_data()->nname( mod->ammo_remaining() ) ) );
3381 }
3382
3383 if( mod->ammo_required() > 1 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_TO_FIRE ) ) {
3384 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Ammunition consumed per shot: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Ammunition consumed per shot: "
) ) ), "",
3385 iteminfo::lower_is_better, mod->ammo_required() );
3386 }
3387
3388 if( mod->get_gun_energy_drain() > 0_kJ && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_UPSCOST ) ) {
3389 info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Energy per shot: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Energy per shot: " ) ) ), string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>",
3390 units::display( mod->get_gun_energy_drain() ) ) );
3391 }
3392
3393 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_AIMING_STATS ) ) {
3394 insert_separation_line( info );
3395 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "<bold>Base aim speed</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Base aim speed</bold>: "
) ) ), "<num>", iteminfo::no_flags,
3396 player_character.aim_per_move( *mod, MAX_RECOIL ) );
3397 for( const aim_type &type : player_character.get_aim_types( *mod ) ) {
3398 // Nameless and immediate aim levels don't get an entry.
3399 if( type.name.empty() || type.threshold == static_cast<int>( MAX_RECOIL ) ) {
3400 continue;
3401 }
3402 // For item comparison to work correctly each info object needs a
3403 // distinct tag per aim type.
3404 const std::string tag = "GUN_" + type.name;
3405 info.emplace_back( tag, string_format( "<info>%s</info>", type.name ) );
3406 int max_dispersion = player_character.get_weapon_dispersion( *loaded_mod ).max();
3407 int range = range_with_even_chance_of_good_hit( max_dispersion + type.threshold );
3408 info.emplace_back( tag, _( "Even chance of good hit at range: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
