translation_argument_identity( "Even chance of good hit at range: "
) ) ),
3409 _( "<num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<num>" ) ) ), iteminfo::no_flags, range );
3410 int aim_mv = player_character.gun_engagement_moves( *mod, type.threshold );
3411 info.emplace_back( tag, _( "Time to reach aim level: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Time to reach aim level: " )
) ), _( "<num> moves" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<num> moves" ) ) ),
3412 iteminfo::lower_is_better, aim_mv );
3413 }
3414 }
3415
3416 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_FIRE_MODES ) ) {
3417 std::vector<std::string> fm;
3418 for( const std::pair<const gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &e : fire_modes ) {
3419 if( e.second.target == this && !e.second.melee() ) {
3420 fm.emplace_back( string_format( "%s (%i)", e.second.tname(), e.second.qty ) );
3421 }
3422 }
3423 if( !fm.empty() ) {
3424 insert_separation_line( info );
3425 info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "<bold>Fire modes</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Fire modes</bold>: "
) ) ) + enumerate_as_string( fm ) );
3426 }
3427 }
3428
3429 if( !magazine_integral() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_ALLOWED_MAGAZINES ) ) {
3430 insert_separation_line( info );
3431 if( uses_magazine() ) {
3432 // Keep this identical with tool magazines in item::tool_info
3433 const std::vector<itype_id> compat_sorted = sorted_lex( magazine_compatible() );
3434 const std::string mag_names = enumerate_as_string( compat_sorted,
3435 []( const itype_id & id ) {
3436 return item::nname( id );
3437 } );
3438
3439 const std::set<flag_id> flag_restrictions = contents.magazine_flag_restrictions();
3440 const std::string flag_names = enumerate_as_string( flag_restrictions,
3441 []( const flag_id & e ) {
3442 return e->name();
3443 } );
3444
3445 std::string display = _( "<bold>Compatible magazines</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Compatible magazines</bold>:"
) ) );
3446 if( !compat_sorted.empty() ) {
3447 display += _( "\n<bold>Types</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n<bold>Types</bold>: "
) ) ) + mag_names;
3448 }
3449 if( !flag_restrictions.empty() ) {
3450 display += _( "\n<bold>Form factors</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n<bold>Form factors</bold>: "
) ) ) + flag_names;
3451 }
3452
3453 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", display );
3454 }
3455 }
3456
3457 if( !gun.valid_mod_locations.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUN_MODS ) ) {
3458 insert_separation_line( info );
3459
3460 std::string mod_str = _( "<bold>Mods</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Mods</bold>:"
) ) );
3461
3462 std::map<gunmod_location, int> mod_locations = get_mod_locations();
3463
3464 int iternum = 0;
3465 mod_str += "\n";
3466 for( std::pair<const gunmod_location, int> &elem : mod_locations ) {
3467 if( iternum != 0 ) {
3468 mod_str += "\n";
3469 }
3470 const int free_slots = elem.second - get_free_mod_locations( elem.first );
3471 mod_str += string_format( "<color_cyan># </color>%s:", elem.first.name() );
3472
3473 for( const item *gmod : gunmods() ) {
3474 if( gmod->type->gunmod->location == elem.first ) { // if mod for this location
3475 mod_str +=
3476 string_format( "\n <stat>[</stat><color_light_green>● </color><stat>%s]</stat>",
3477 gmod->tname( 1, false ) );
3478 }
3479 }
3480 for( int i = free_slots + 1 ; i <= elem.second ; i++ ) {
3481 if( i == free_slots + 1 && i <= elem.second ) {
3482 mod_str += string_format( "\n " );
3483 }
3484 mod_str += string_format( " <color_dark_gray>[-%s-]</color>", _( "empty" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "empty" ) ) ) );
3485 }
3486 iternum++;
3487 }
3488 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", mod_str );
3489 }
3490
3491 if( mod->casings_count() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUN_CASINGS ) ) {
3492 insert_separation_line( info );
3493 std::string tmp = n_gettext( "Contains <stat>%i</stat> casing",
3494 "Contains <stat>%i</stat> casings", mod->casings_count() );
3495 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( tmp, mod->casings_count() ) );
3496 }
3497
3498 if( is_gun() && has_flag( flag_FIRE_TWOHAND ) &&
3499 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_TWOHANDED ) ) {
3500 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3501 _( "This weapon needs <info>two free hands</info> to fire." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This weapon needs <info>two free hands</info> to fire."
) ) ) );
3502 }
3503}
3504
3505void item::gunmod_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /* batch */,
3506 bool /* debug */ ) const
3507{
3508 if( !is_gunmod() ) {
3509 return;
3510 }
3511 const islot_gunmod &mod = *type->gunmod;
3512
3513 if( is_gun() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUNMOD ) ) {
3514 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3515 _( "This mod <info>must be attached to a gun</info>, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This mod <info>must be attached to a gun</info>, "
"it can not be fired separately." ) ) )
3516 "it can not be fired separately." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This mod <info>must be attached to a gun</info>, "
"it can not be fired separately." ) ) ) );
3517 }
3518 if( has_flag( flag_REACH_ATTACK ) && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUNMOD_REACH ) ) {
3519 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3520 _( "When attached to a gun, <good>allows</good> making "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "When attached to a gun, <good>allows</good> making "
"<info>reach melee attacks</info> with it." ) ) )
3521 "<info>reach melee attacks</info> with it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "When attached to a gun, <good>allows</good> making "
"<info>reach melee attacks</info> with it." ) ) ) );
3522 }
3523
3524 if( is_gunmod() && has_flag( flag_DISABLE_SIGHTS ) &&
3525 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUNMOD_DISABLESSIGHTS ) ) {
3526 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3527 _( "This mod <bad>obscures sights</bad> of the "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This mod <bad>obscures sights</bad> of the "
"base weapon." ) ) )
3528 "base weapon." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This mod <bad>obscures sights</bad> of the "
"base weapon." ) ) ) );
3529 }
3530
3531 if( is_gunmod() && has_flag( flag_CONSUMABLE ) &&
3532 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUNMOD_CONSUMABLE ) ) {
3533 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3534 _( "This mod might <bad>suffer wear</bad> when firing "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This mod might <bad>suffer wear</bad> when firing "
"the base weapon." ) ) )
3535 "the base weapon." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This mod might <bad>suffer wear</bad> when firing "
"the base weapon." ) ) ) );
3536 }
3537
3538 if( mod.dispersion != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_DISPERSION ) ) {
3539 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Dispersion modifier: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Dispersion modifier: " ) ) ), "",
3540 iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::show_plus,
3541 mod.dispersion );
3542 }
3543 if( mod.sight_dispersion != -1 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_DISPERSION_SIGHT ) ) {
3544 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Sight dispersion: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Sight dispersion: " ) ) ), "",
3545 iteminfo::lower_is_better, mod.sight_dispersion );
3546 }
3547 if( mod.field_of_view > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_FIELD_OF_VIEW ) ) {
3548 if( mod.field_of_view >= MAX_RECOIL ) {
3549 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Field of view: <good>No limit</good>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Field of view: <good>No limit</good>"
) ) ) );
3550 } else {
3551 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Field of view: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Field of view: " ) ) ), "",
3552 iteminfo::no_flags, mod.field_of_view );
3553 }
3554 }
3555 if( mod.field_of_view > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_AIM_SPEED_MODIFIER ) ) {
3556 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Aim speed modifier: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Aim speed modifier: " ) ) ), "",
3557 iteminfo::no_flags, mod.aim_speed_modifier );
3558 }
3559 int total_damage = static_cast<int>( mod.damage.total_damage() );
3560 if( total_damage != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_DAMAGE ) ) {
3561 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Damage: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Damage: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::show_plus,
3562 total_damage );
3563 }
3564 int pierce = get_ranged_pierce( mod );
3565 if( get_ranged_pierce( mod ) != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_ARMORPIERCE ) ) {
3566 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Armor-pierce: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Armor-pierce: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::show_plus,
3567 pierce );
3568 }
3569 if( mod.range != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_RANGE ) ) {
3570 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Range: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Range: " ) ) ), "",
3571 iteminfo::show_plus | iteminfo::no_newline, mod.range );
3572 }
3573 if( mod.range_multiplier != 1.0f && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_RANGE_MULTIPLIER ) ) {
3574 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Range Multiplier: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Range Multiplier: " ) ) ), "",
3575 iteminfo::is_decimal, mod.range_multiplier );
3576 }
3577 if( mod.handling != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_HANDLING ) ) {
3578 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Handling modifier: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Handling modifier: " ) ) ), "",
3579 iteminfo::show_plus, mod.handling );
3580 }
3581 if( mod.loudness != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_LOUDNESS_MODIFIER ) ) {
3582 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Loudness modifier: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Loudness modifier: " ) ) ), "",
3583 iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::show_plus,
3584 mod.loudness );
3585 }
3586 if( !type->mod->ammo_modifier.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_AMMO ) ) {
3587 for( const ammotype &at : type->mod->ammo_modifier ) {
3588 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", string_format( _( "Ammo: <stat>%s</stat>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Ammo: <stat>%s</stat>"
) ) ),
3589 at->name() ) );
3590 }
3591 }
3592 if( mod.reload_modifier != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_RELOAD ) ) {
3593 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Reload modifier: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Reload modifier: " ) ) ), _( "<num>%" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<num>%" ) ) ),
3594 iteminfo::lower_is_better, mod.reload_modifier );
3595 }
3596 if( mod.min_str_required_mod > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_STRENGTH ) ) {
3597 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Minimum strength required modifier: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Minimum strength required modifier: "
) ) ),
3598 mod.min_str_required_mod );
3599 }
3600 if( !mod.add_mod.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_ADD_MOD ) ) {
3601 insert_separation_line( info );
3602
3603 std::string mod_loc_str = _( "<bold>Adds mod locations: </bold> " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Adds mod locations: </bold> "
) ) );
3604
3605 std::map<gunmod_location, int> mod_locations = mod.add_mod;
3606
3607 int iternum = 0;
3608 for( std::pair<const gunmod_location, int> &elem : mod_locations ) {
3609 if( iternum != 0 ) {
3610 mod_loc_str += "; ";
3611 }
3612 mod_loc_str += string_format( "<bold>%s</bold> %s", elem.second, elem.first.name() );
3613 iternum++;
3614 }
3615 mod_loc_str += ".";
3616 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", mod_loc_str );
3617 }
3618
3619 insert_separation_line( info );
3620
3621 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_USEDON ) ) {
3622 std::set<std::string> used_on_translated; // uses set to prune duplicates
3623 for( const gun_type_type &gtt : mod.usable ) {
3624 used_on_translated.emplace( string_format( "<info>%s</info>", gtt.name() ) );
3625 }
3626 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Used on: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Used on: " ) ) ) + enumerate_as_string( used_on_translated ) );
3627 }
3628
3629 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_LOCATION ) ) {
3630 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", string_format( _( "Location: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Location: %s" ) ) ), mod.location.name() ) );
3631 }
3632
3633 if( !mod.blacklist_slot.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_BLACKLIST_SLOT ) ) {
3634 std::string mod_black_str = _( "<bold>Incompatible with gunmods: </bold> " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Incompatible with gunmods: </bold> "
) ) );
3635
3636 int iternum = 0;
3637 for( const gunmod_location &black : mod.blacklist_slot ) {
3638 if( iternum != 0 ) {
3639 mod_black_str += ", ";
3640 }
3641 mod_black_str += string_format( "%s", ( black.name() ) );
3642 iternum++;
3643 }
3644 mod_black_str += ".";
3645 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", mod_black_str );
3646 }
3647 if( !mod.blacklist_mod.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_BLACKLIST_MOD ) ) {
3648 std::string mod_black_str = _( "<bold>Incompatible with slots: </bold> " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Incompatible with slots: </bold> "
) ) );
3649
3650 int iternum = 0;
3651 for( const itype_id &black : mod.blacklist_mod ) {
3652 if( iternum != 0 ) {
3653 mod_black_str += ", ";
3654 }
3655 mod_black_str += string_format( "%s", ( black->nname( 1 ) ) );
3656 iternum++;
3657 }
3658 mod_black_str += ".";
3659 info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", mod_black_str );
3660 }
3661}
3662
3663static bool armor_encumb_header_info( const item &it, std::vector<iteminfo> &info )
3664{
3665 std::string format;
3666 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3667 const bool sizing_matters = it.get_sizing( player_character ) != item::sizing::ignore;
3668
3669 if( it.has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
3670 format = _( " <info>(fits)</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <info>(fits)</info>"
) ) );
3671 } else if( it.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE ) && sizing_matters ) {
3672 format = _( " <bad>(poor fit)</bad>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <bad>(poor fit)</bad>"
) ) );
3673 }
3674 if( sizing_matters ) {
3675 const item::sizing sizing_level = it.get_sizing( player_character );
3676 //If we have the wrong size, we do not fit so alert the player
3677 if( sizing_level == item::sizing::human_sized_small_char ) {
3678 format = _( " <bad>(too big)</bad>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <bad>(too big)</bad>"
) ) );
3679 } else if( sizing_level == item::sizing::big_sized_small_char ) {
3680 format = _( " <bad>(huge!)</bad>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <bad>(huge!)</bad>"
) ) );
3681 } else if( sizing_level == item::sizing::small_sized_human_char ||
3682 sizing_level == item::sizing::human_sized_big_char ) {
3683 format = _( " <bad>(too small)</bad>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <bad>(too small)</bad>"
) ) );
3684 } else if( sizing_level == item::sizing::small_sized_big_char ) {
3685 format = _( " <bad>(tiny!)</bad>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <bad>(tiny!)</bad>"
) ) );
3686 }
3687 }
3688 if( format.empty() ) {
3689 return false;
3690 }
3691
3692 //~ The size or fit of an article of clothing (fits / poor fit)
3693 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Size/Fit</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Size/Fit</bold>:"
) ) ) + format );
3694 return true;
3695}
3696
3697bool item::armor_full_protection_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info,
3698 const iteminfo_query *parts ) const
3699{
3700 bool divider_needed = false;
3701 const std::string space = " ";
3702
3703 bool ret = false;
3704 if( const islot_armor *t = find_armor_data() ) {
3705 if( t->data.empty() ) {
3706 return ret;
3707 }
3708
3709 for( const armor_portion_data &p : t->sub_data ) {
3710 if( divider_needed ) {
3711 insert_separation_line( info );
3712 }
3713
3714 std::vector<sub_bodypart_id> covered( p.sub_coverage.size() );
3715 std::transform( p.sub_coverage.begin(), p.sub_coverage.end(),
3716 covered.begin(), []( sub_bodypart_str_id a ) {
3717 return a.id();
3718 } );
3719 std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( covered );
3720 std::string coverage = _( "<bold>Protection for</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Protection for</bold>:"
) ) );
3721 for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
3722 coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " The <info>%s</info>."
) ) ), entry );
3723 }
3724 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
3725
3726 // the following function need one representative sub limb from which to query data
3727 armor_material_info( info, parts, 0, false, *p.sub_coverage.begin() );
3728 armor_attribute_info( info, parts, 0, false, *p.sub_coverage.begin() );
3729 armor_protection_info( info, parts, 0, false, *p.sub_coverage.begin() );
3730 ret = true;
3731 divider_needed = true;
3732 }
3733 } else if( is_gun() && has_flag( flag_IS_ARMOR ) ) {
3734 if( divider_needed ) {
3735 insert_separation_line( info );
3736 }
3737 //right now all eligible gunmods (shoulder_strap, belt_clip) have the is_armor flag and use the torso
3738 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "Torso:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Torso:" ) ) ) + space, "",
3739 iteminfo::no_flags | iteminfo::lower_is_better, get_avg_encumber( get_avatar() ) );
3740
3741 //~ Limb-specific coverage (for guns strapped to torso)
3742 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Torso coverage</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Torso coverage</bold>:"
) ) ) );
3743 //~ Regular/Default coverage
3744 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space + _( "Default:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Default:" ) ) ) + space, "",
3745 iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( body_part_torso.id() ) );
3746 //~ Melee coverage
3747 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space + _( "Melee:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Melee:" ) ) ) + space, "",
3748 iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( body_part_torso.id(), cover_type::COVER_MELEE ) );
3749 //~ Ranged coverage
3750 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space + _( "Ranged:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Ranged:" ) ) ) + space, "",
3751 iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( body_part_torso.id(), cover_type::COVER_RANGED ) );
3752 //~ Vitals coverage
3753 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space + _( "Vitals:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Vitals:" ) ) ) + space, "",
3754 iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( body_part_torso.id(), cover_type::COVER_VITALS ) );
3755 }
3756
3757 return ret;
3758}
3759
3760static void armor_protect_dmg_info( int dmg, std::vector<iteminfo> &info )
3761{
3762 if( dmg > 0 ) {
3763 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "Protection values are <bad>reduced by damage</bad> and "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Protection values are <bad>reduced by damage</bad> and "
"you may be able to <info>improve them by repairing this "
"item</info>." ) ) )
3764 "you may be able to <info>improve them by repairing this "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Protection values are <bad>reduced by damage</bad> and "
"you may be able to <info>improve them by repairing this "
"item</info>." ) ) )
3765 "item</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Protection values are <bad>reduced by damage</bad> and "
"you may be able to <info>improve them by repairing this "
"item</info>." ) ) ) );
3766 }
3767}
3768
3769void item::armor_protection_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
3770 int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/, const sub_bodypart_id &sbp ) const
3771{
3772 if( !is_armor() && !is_pet_armor() ) {
3773 return;
3774 }
3775
3776 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_PROTECTION ) ) {
3777 const std::string space = " ";
3778 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
3779 std::string bp_cat = string_format( "ARMOR" );
3780 std::string layering;
3781
3782 // get the layers this bit of the armor covers if its unique compared to the rest of the armor
3783 for( const layer_level &ll : get_layer( sbp ) ) {
3784 switch( ll ) {
3785 case layer_level::PERSONAL:
3786 layering += _( " <stat>Personal aura</stat>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <stat>Personal aura</stat>."
) ) );
3787 break;
3788 case layer_level::SKINTIGHT:
3789 layering += _( " <stat>Close to skin</stat>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <stat>Close to skin</stat>."
) ) );
3790 break;
3791 case layer_level::NORMAL:
3792 layering += _( " <stat>Normal</stat>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <stat>Normal</stat>."
) ) );
3793 break;
3794 case layer_level::WAIST:
3795 layering += _( " <stat>Waist</stat>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <stat>Waist</stat>."
) ) );
3796 break;
3797 case layer_level::OUTER:
3798 layering += _( " <stat>Outer</stat>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <stat>Outer</stat>."
) ) );
3799 break;
3800 case layer_level::BELTED:
3801 layering += _( " <stat>Strapped</stat>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <stat>Strapped</stat>."
) ) );
3802 break;
3803 case layer_level::AURA:
3804 layering += _( " <stat>Outer aura</stat>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <stat>Outer aura</stat>."
) ) );
3805 break;
3806 default:
3807 layering += _( " Should never see this." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " Should never see this." ) )
);
3808 }
3809 }
3810 //~ Limb-specific coverage (%s = name of limb)
3811 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>Coverage</bold>:%s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Coverage</bold>:%s"
) ) ), layering ) );
3812 //~ Regular/Default coverage
3813 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s%s", space, _( "Default:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Default:" ) ) ), space ), "",
3814 iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( sbp ) );
3815 if( get_coverage( sbp ) != get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_MELEE ) ) {
3816 //~ Melee coverage
3817 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s%s", space, _( "Melee:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Melee:" ) ) ), space ), "",
3818 iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_MELEE ) );
3819 }
3820 if( get_coverage( sbp ) != get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_RANGED ) ) {
3821 //~ Ranged coverage
3822 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s%s", space, _( "Ranged:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Ranged:" ) ) ), space ), "",
3823 iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_RANGED ) );
3824 }
3825 if( get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_VITALS ) > 0 ) {
3826 //~ Vitals coverage
3827 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s%s", space, _( "Vitals:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Vitals:" ) ) ), space ), "",
3828 iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_VITALS ) );
3829 }
3830
3831 bool printed_any = false;
3832
3833 // gather all the protection data
3834 // the rolls are basically a perfect hit for protection and a
3835 // worst possible
3836 resistances worst_res = resistances( *this, false, 99, sbp );
3837 resistances best_res = resistances( *this, false, 0, sbp );
3838 resistances median_res = resistances( *this, false, 50, sbp );
3839
3840 int percent_best = 100;
3841 int percent_worst = 0;
3842 const armor_portion_data *portion = portion_for_bodypart( sbp );
3843 // if there isn't a portion this is probably pet armor
3844 if( portion ) {
3845 percent_best = portion->best_protection_chance;
3846 percent_worst = portion->worst_protection_chance;
3847 }
3848
3849 bool display_median = percent_best < 50 && percent_worst < 50;
3850
3851 if( display_median ) {
3852 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3853 string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>: <bad>%d%%</bad>, <color_c_yellow>Median</color>, <good>%d%%</good>",
3854 _( "Protection" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Protection" ) ) ), percent_worst, percent_best ) );
3855 } else if( percent_worst > 0 ) {
3856 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3857 string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>: <bad>%d%%</bad>, <good>%d%%</good>", _( "Protection" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Protection" ) ) ),
3858 percent_worst, percent_best ) );
3859 } else {
3860 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>:", _( "Protection" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Protection" ) ) ) ) );
3861 }
3862
3863 for( const damage_info_order &dio : damage_info_order::get_all(
3864 damage_info_order::info_type::PROT ) ) {
3865 if( best_res.resist_vals.count( dio.dmg_type ) <= 0 ||
3866 best_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ) < 1.0f ) {
3867 continue;
3868 }
3869 bool skipped_detailed = false;
3870 if( dio.info_display == damage_info_order::info_disp::DETAILED ) {
3871 if( display_median ) {
3872 info.emplace_back( bp_cat,
3873 string_format( "%s%s: <bad>%.2f</bad>, <color_c_yellow>%.2f</color>, <good>%.2f</good>", space,
3874 uppercase_first_letter( dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ), worst_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ),
3875 median_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ), best_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ) ), "",
3876 iteminfo::no_flags );
3877 printed_any = true;
3878 } else if( percent_worst > 0 ) {
3879 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s: <bad>%.2f</bad>, <good>%.2f</good>", space,
3880 uppercase_first_letter( dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ),
3881 worst_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ), best_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ) ), "",
3882 iteminfo::no_flags );
3883 printed_any = true;
3884 } else {
3885 skipped_detailed = true;
3886 }
3887 }
3888 if( skipped_detailed || dio.info_display == damage_info_order::info_disp::BASIC ) {
3889 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s: ", space,
3890 uppercase_first_letter( dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ) ), "",
3891 iteminfo::is_decimal, best_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ) );
3892 printed_any = true;
3893 }
3894 }
3895 if( get_base_env_resist( *this ) >= 1 ) {
3896 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s", space, _( "Environmental: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Environmental: " ) ) ) ),
3897 get_base_env_resist( *this ) );
3898 printed_any = true;
3899 }
3900 // if we haven't printed any armor data acknowledge that
3901 if( !printed_any ) {
3902 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s", space, _( "Negligible Protection" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Negligible Protection" ) ) ) ) );
3903 }
3904 if( type->can_use( "GASMASK" ) || type->can_use( "DIVE_TANK" ) ) {
3905 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>:",
3906 _( "Protection when active" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Protection when active" ) ) ) ) );
3907 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, space + _( "Acid: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Acid: " ) ) ), "",
3908 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
3909 resist( damage_acid, false, sbp, get_base_env_resist_w_filter() ) );
3910 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, space + _( "Fire: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Fire: " ) ) ), "",
3911 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
3912 resist( damage_heat, false, sbp, get_base_env_resist_w_filter() ) );
3913 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, space + _( "Environmental: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Environmental: " ) ) ),
3914 get_env_resist( get_base_env_resist_w_filter() ) );
3915 }
3916
3917 if( sbp == sub_bodypart_id() && damage() > 0 ) {
3918 armor_protect_dmg_info( damage(), info );
3919 }
3920 }
3921}
3922void item::armor_material_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
3923 int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/, const sub_bodypart_id &sbp ) const
3924{
3925 if( !is_armor() && !is_pet_armor() ) {
3926 return;
3927 }
3928
3929 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_MATERIALS ) ) {
3930 const std::string space = " ";
3931 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
3932 std::string bp_cat = string_format( "ARMOR" );
3933 std::string materials_list;
3934 std::string units_info = pgettext( "length unit: milimeter", "mm" );
3935 for( const part_material *mat : armor_made_of( sbp ) ) {
3936
3937 materials_list.append( string_format( " %s %.2f%s (%d%%).", mat->id->name(), mat->thickness,
3938 units_info, mat->cover ) );
3939 }
3940
3941 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s", _( "<bold>Materials</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Materials</bold>:"
) ) ),
3942 materials_list ), "", iteminfo::no_flags );
3943 }
3944}
3945
3946void item::armor_attribute_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
3947 int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/, const sub_bodypart_id &sbp ) const
3948{
3949 if( !is_armor() && !is_pet_armor() ) {
3950 return;
3951 }
3952
3953 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_ADDITIONAL_INFO ) ) {
3954 const std::string space = " ";
3955 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
3956 std::string bp_cat = string_format( "ARMOR" );
3957
3958 if( const armor_portion_data *portion_data = portion_for_bodypart( sbp ) ) {
3959 if( portion_data->rigid_layer_only ) {
3960 info.emplace_back( bp_cat, _( "<info>Rigid items only conflict on shared layers</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<info>Rigid items only conflict on shared layers</info>"
) ) ),
3961 "", iteminfo::no_flags );
3962 }
3963 }
3964 }
3965}
3966
3967void item::pet_armor_protection_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info,
3968 const iteminfo_query *parts ) const
3969{
3970 if( !is_pet_armor() ) {
3971 return;
3972 }
3973
3974 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_PROTECTION ) ) {
3975 const std::string space = " ";
3976
3977 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Protection</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Protection</bold>:"
) ) ), "" );
3978
3979 for( const damage_info_order &dio : damage_info_order::get_all(
3980 damage_info_order::info_type::PET ) ) {
3981 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", string_format( "%s%s: ", space,
3982 uppercase_first_letter( dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ) ), "",
3983 iteminfo::is_decimal, resist( dio.dmg_type ) );
3984 }
3985
3986 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space + _( "Environmental: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Environmental: " ) ) ),
3987 get_base_env_resist( *this ) );
3988
3989 if( damage() > 0 ) {
3990 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR",
3991 _( "Protection values are <bad>reduced by damage</bad> and "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Protection values are <bad>reduced by damage</bad> and "
"you may be able to <info>improve them by repairing this "
"item</info>." ) ) )
3992 "you may be able to <info>improve them by repairing this "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Protection values are <bad>reduced by damage</bad> and "
"you may be able to <info>improve them by repairing this "
"item</info>." ) ) )
3993 "item</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Protection values are <bad>reduced by damage</bad> and "
"you may be able to <info>improve them by repairing this "
"item</info>." ) ) ) );
3994 }
3995 }
3996}
3997
3998// simple struct used for organizing encumberance in an ordered set
3999struct armor_encumb_data {
4000 int encumb;
4001 int encumb_max;
4002 int encumb_min;
4003
4004 bool operator==( const armor_encumb_data &a ) const {
4005 return encumb == a.encumb &&
4006 encumb_min == a.encumb_min &&
4007 encumb_max == a.encumb_max;
4008 }
4009
4010 armor_encumb_data( int in_encumb_min, int in_encumb, int in_encumb_max ) {
4011 encumb = in_encumb;
4012 encumb_min = in_encumb_min;
4013 encumb_max = in_encumb_max;
4014 }
4015};
4016
4017static bool operator<( const armor_encumb_data &lhs, const armor_encumb_data &rhs )
4018{
4019 return lhs.encumb < rhs.encumb;
4020}
4021
4022void item::armor_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch,
4023 bool debug ) const
4024{
4025 if( !is_armor() ) {
4026 return;
4027 }
4028
4029 const std::string space = " ";
4030 body_part_set covered_parts = get_covered_body_parts();
4031 bool covers_anything = covered_parts.any();
4032 const bool show_bodygraph = get_option<bool>( "ITEM_BODYGRAPH" ) &&
4033 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_BODYGRAPH );
4034
4035 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_BODYPARTS ) ) {
4036 insert_separation_line( info );
4037 std::vector<sub_bodypart_id> covered = get_covered_sub_body_parts();
4038 std::string coverage = _( "<bold>Covers</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Covers</bold>:"
) ) );
4039
4040 if( !covered.empty() ) {
4041 std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( covered );
4042 for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4043 coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " The <info>%s</info>."
) ) ), entry );
4044 }
4045 }
4046
4047 if( !covers_anything ) {
4048 coverage += _( " <info>Nothing</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <info>Nothing</info>."
) ) );
4049 }
4050
4051 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
4052 }
4053
4054 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_RIGIDITY ) && ( is_rigid() || is_ablative() ) ) {
4055 // if the item has no armor data it doesn't cover that part
4056 const islot_armor *armor = find_armor_data();
4057 if( armor != nullptr ) {
4058 if( armor->rigid ) {
4059 std::string coverage = _( "<bold>This armor is rigid</bold>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>This armor is rigid</bold>"
) ) );
4060 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
4061 } else {
4062 // only some parts are rigid
4063 std::string coverage = _( "<bold>Rigid Locations</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Rigid Locations</bold>:"
) ) );
4064 std::set<sub_bodypart_id> covered;
4065 // if ablative check if there are hard plates in locations
4066 if( armor->ablative ) {
4067 // if item has ablative armor we should check those too.
4068 for( const item_pocket *pocket : get_all_contained_pockets() ) {
4069 // if the pocket is ablative and not empty we should use its values
4070 if( pocket->get_pocket_data()->ablative && !pocket->empty() ) {
4071 // get the contained plate
4072 const item &ablative_armor = pocket->front();
4073 for( const armor_portion_data &entry : ablative_armor.find_armor_data()->sub_data ) {
4074 if( entry.rigid ) {
4075 for( const sub_bodypart_str_id &sbp : entry.sub_coverage ) {
4076 covered.emplace( sbp );
4077 }
4078 }
4079 }
4080 }
4081 }
4082 }
4083 for( const armor_portion_data &entry : armor->sub_data ) {
4084 if( entry.rigid ) {
4085 for( const sub_bodypart_str_id &sbp : entry.sub_coverage ) {
4086 covered.emplace( sbp );
4087 }
4088 }
4089 }
4090
4091 if( !covered.empty() ) {
4092 std::vector<sub_bodypart_id> covered_vec( covered.begin(), covered.end() );
4093 std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( covered_vec );
4094 for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4095 coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " The <info>%s</info>."
) ) ), entry );
4096 }
4097 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
4098 }
4099 }
4100 }
4101 }
4102
4103 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_RIGIDITY ) && is_comfortable() ) {
4104 // if the item has no armor data it doesn't cover that part
4105 const islot_armor *armor = find_armor_data();
4106 if( armor != nullptr ) {
4107 if( armor->comfortable ) {
4108 std::string coverage = _( "<bold>This armor is comfortable</bold>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>This armor is comfortable</bold>"
) ) );
4109 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
4110 } else {
4111 // only some parts are comfortable
4112 std::string coverage = _( "<bold>Comfortable Locations</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Comfortable Locations</bold>:"
) ) );
4113 std::vector<sub_bodypart_id> covered;
4114 for( const armor_portion_data &entry : armor->sub_data ) {
4115 if( entry.comfortable ) {
4116 for( const sub_bodypart_str_id &sbp : entry.sub_coverage ) {
4117 covered.emplace_back( sbp );
4118 }
4119 }
4120 }
4121 if( !covered.empty() ) {
4122 std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( covered );
4123 for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4124 coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " The <info>%s</info>."
) ) ), entry );
4125 }
4126 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
4127 }
4128 }
4129 }
4130 }
4131
4132 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_COVERAGE ) && covers_anything ) {
4133 std::map<int, std::vector<bodypart_id>> limb_groups;
4134 for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : get_covered_body_parts() ) {
4135 const armor_portion_data *portion = portion_for_bodypart( bp );
4136 if( portion ) {
4137 limb_groups[portion->coverage].emplace_back( bp );
4138 }
4139 }
4140 // keep on one line if only 1 entry
4141 if( limb_groups.size() == 1 ) {
4142 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Total Coverage</bold>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Total Coverage</bold>"
) ) ), iteminfo::no_newline );
4143 } else {
4144 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Total Coverage</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Total Coverage</bold>:"
) ) ) );
4145 }
4146
4147 for( auto &entry : limb_groups ) {
4148 std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( entry.second );
4149 std::string coverage;
4150 for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4151 coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " The <info>%s</info>."
) ) ), entry );
4152 }
4153 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", "", string_format( " <num>%%:%s", coverage ), iteminfo::no_flags,
4154 entry.first );
4155 }
4156 }
4157
4158 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_ENCUMBRANCE ) && covers_anything ) {
4159 std::map<armor_encumb_data, std::vector<bodypart_id>> limb_groups;
4160 const Character &c = get_player_character();
4161
4162 armor_encumb_header_info( *this, info );
4163 for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : get_covered_body_parts() ) {
4164 armor_encumb_data encumbrance( get_encumber( c, bp, item::encumber_flags::assume_empty ),
4165 get_encumber( c, bp ), get_encumber( c, bp, item::encumber_flags::assume_full ) );
4166
4167 limb_groups[encumbrance].emplace_back( bp );
4168 }
4169 // keep on one line if only 1 entry
4170 if( limb_groups.size() == 1 ) {
4171 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Encumbrance</bold>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Encumbrance</bold>"
) ) ), iteminfo::no_newline );
4172 } else {
4173 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Encumbrance</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Encumbrance</bold>:"
) ) ) );
4174 }
4175 for( auto &entry : limb_groups ) {
4176 std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( entry.second );
4177 std::string coverage;
4178 std::string encumbrance_info;
4179 for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4180 coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " The <info>%s</info>."
) ) ), entry );
4181 }
4182
4183 //encumbrance_info = string_format( "%d", entry.first.encumb );
4184
4185 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
4186 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space, "", iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
4187 entry.first.encumb );
4188
4189 // if it has a max value
4190 if( entry.first.encumb != entry.first.encumb_max ) {
4191 std::string when_full_message = _( ", When full" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( ", When full" ) ) ) + space;
4192 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", when_full_message, "", iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
4193 entry.first.encumb_max );
4194 }
4195
4196 // if it has a min value
4197 if( entry.first.encumb != entry.first.encumb_min ) {
4198 std::string when_empty_message = _( ", When empty" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( ", When empty" ) ) ) + space;
4199 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", when_empty_message, "",
4200 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better, entry.first.encumb_min );
4201 }
4202 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", string_format( ":%s", coverage ) );
4203 }
4204 }
4205
4206 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_WARMTH ) && covers_anything ) {
4207 // TODO: Make this less inflexible on anatomy
4208 std::map<int, std::vector<bodypart_id>> limb_groups;
4209 for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : get_covered_body_parts() ) {
4210 limb_groups[get_warmth( bp )].emplace_back( bp );
4211 }
4212 // keep on one line if only 1 entry
4213 if( limb_groups.size() == 1 ) {
4214 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Warmth</bold>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Warmth</bold>"
) ) ), iteminfo::no_newline );
4215 } else {
4216 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Warmth</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Warmth</bold>:"
) ) ) );
4217 }
4218 for( auto &entry : limb_groups ) {
4219 std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( entry.second );
4220 std::string coverage;
4221 for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4222 coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " The <info>%s</info>."
) ) ), entry );
4223 }
4224 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", "", string_format( " <num>:%s", coverage ), iteminfo::no_flags,
4225 entry.first );
4226 }
4227 }
4228
4229 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_BREATHABILITY ) && covers_anything ) {
4230
4231 std::map<int, std::vector<bodypart_id>> limb_groups;
4232 for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : get_covered_body_parts() ) {
4233 const armor_portion_data *portion = portion_for_bodypart( bp );
4234 if( portion ) {
4235 limb_groups[portion->breathability].emplace_back( bp );
4236 }
4237 }
4238 // keep on one line if only 1 entry
4239 if( limb_groups.size() == 1 ) {
4240 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Breathability</bold>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Breathability</bold>"
) ) ), iteminfo::no_newline );
4241 } else {
4242 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Breathability</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Breathability</bold>:"
) ) ) );
4243 }
4244 for( auto &entry : limb_groups ) {
4245 std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( entry.second );
4246 std::string coverage;
4247 for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4248 coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " The <info>%s</info>."
) ) ), entry );
4249 }
4250 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", "", string_format( " <num>%%:%s", coverage ), iteminfo::no_flags,
4251 entry.first );
4252 }
4253 }
4254
4255 insert_separation_line( info );
4256
4257 if( covers_anything ) {
4258
4259 if( is_power_armor() || type->get_id() == itype_rm13_armor ) {
4260 item tmp = *this;
4261
4262 //no need to clutter the ui with inactive versions when the armor is already active
4263 if( !( active || ( type->tool && type->tool->power_draw > 0_W ) ) ) {
4264 bool print_prot = true;
4265 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_PROTECTION ) ) {
4266 print_prot = !tmp.armor_full_protection_info( info, parts );
4267 }
4268 if( print_prot ) {
4269 tmp.armor_protection_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
4270 }
4271 armor_protect_dmg_info( tmp.damage(), info );
4272
4273 insert_separation_line( info );
4274 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>When active</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>When active</bold>:"
) ) ) );
4275 tmp = tmp.convert( itype_id( tmp.typeId().str() + "_on" ) );
4276 }
4277
4278 bool print_prot = true;
4279 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_PROTECTION ) ) {
4280 print_prot = !tmp.armor_full_protection_info( info, parts );
4281 }
4282 if( print_prot ) {
4283 tmp.armor_protection_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
4284 }
4285 armor_protect_dmg_info( tmp.damage(), info );
4286 } else {
4287 bool print_prot = true;
4288 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_PROTECTION ) ) {
4289 print_prot = !armor_full_protection_info( info, parts );
4290 }
4291 if( print_prot ) {
4292 armor_protection_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
4293 }
4294 armor_protect_dmg_info( damage(), info );
4295 }
4296 }
4297
4298 // Whatever the last entry was, we want a newline at this point
4299 info.back().bNewLine = true;
4300
4301 const units::mass weight_bonus = get_weight_capacity_bonus();
4302 const float weight_modif = get_weight_capacity_modifier();
4303 if( weight_modif != 1 ) {
4304 std::string modifier;
4305 if( weight_modif < 1 ) {
4306 modifier = "<num><bad>x</bad>";
4307 } else {
4308 modifier = "<num><color_light_green>x</color>";
4309 }
4310 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR",
4311 _( "<bold>Weight capacity modifier</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Weight capacity modifier</bold>: "
) ) ), modifier,
4312 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal, weight_modif );
4313 }
4314 if( weight_bonus != 0_gram ) {
4315 std::string bonus;
4316 if( weight_bonus < 0_gram ) {
4317 bonus = string_format( "<num> <bad>%s</bad>", weight_units() );
4318 } else {
4319 bonus = string_format( "<num> <color_light_green> %s</color>", weight_units() );
4320 }
4321 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Weight capacity bonus</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Weight capacity bonus</bold>: "
) ) ), bonus,
4322 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
4323 convert_weight( weight_bonus ) );
4324 }
4325
4326 if( show_bodygraph ) {
4327 insert_separation_line( info );
4328
4329 auto bg_cb = [this]( const bodygraph_part * bgp, const std::string & sym ) {
4330 if( !bgp ) {
4331 return colorize( sym, bodygraph_full_body_iteminfo->fill_color );
4332 }
4333 std::set<sub_bodypart_id> grp{ bgp->sub_bodyparts.begin(), bgp->sub_bodyparts.end() };
4334 for( const bodypart_id &bid : bgp->bodyparts ) {
4335 grp.insert( bid->sub_parts.begin(), bid->sub_parts.end() );
4336 }
4337 nc_color clr = c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
4338 int cov_val = 0;
4339 for( const sub_bodypart_id &sid : grp ) {
4340 int tmp = get_coverage( sid );
4341 cov_val = tmp > cov_val ? tmp : cov_val;
4342 }
4343 if( cov_val <= 5 ) {
4344 clr = c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
4345 } else if( cov_val <= 10 ) {
4346 clr = c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
4347 } else if( cov_val <= 25 ) {
4348 clr = c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red);
4349 } else if( cov_val <= 60 ) {
4350 clr = c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
4351 } else if( cov_val <= 80 ) {
4352 clr = c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green);
4353 } else {
4354 clr = c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green);
4355 }
4356 return colorize( sym, clr );
4357 };
4358 std::vector<std::string> bg_lines = get_bodygraph_lines( get_player_character(), bg_cb,
4359 bodygraph_full_body_iteminfo );
4360 for( const std::string &line : bg_lines ) {
4361 info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", line );
4362 }
4363 insert_separation_line( info );
4364 }
4365}
4366
4367void item::animal_armor_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
4368 int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
4369{
4370 if( !is_pet_armor() ) {
4371 return;
4372 }
4373 pet_armor_protection_info( info, parts );
4374}
4375
4376void item::armor_fit_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
4377 bool /*debug*/ ) const
4378{
4379 if( !is_armor() ) {
4380 return;
4381 }
4382
4383 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
4384 const sizing sizing_level = get_sizing( player_character );
4385
4386 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS_FITS ) ) {
4387 switch( sizing_level ) {
4388 case sizing::human_sized_human_char:
4389 if( has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
4390 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4391 _( "* This clothing <info>fits</info> you perfectly." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing <info>fits</info> you perfectly."
) ) ) );
4392 }
4393 break;
4394 case sizing::big_sized_big_char:
4395 if( has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
4396 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This clothing <info>fits</info> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing <info>fits</info> "
"your large frame perfectly." ) ) )
4397 "your large frame perfectly." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing <info>fits</info> "
"your large frame perfectly." ) ) ) );
4398 }
4399 break;
4400 case sizing::small_sized_small_char:
4401 if( has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
4402 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This clothing <info>fits</info> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing <info>fits</info> "
"your small frame perfectly." ) ) )
4403 "your small frame perfectly." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing <info>fits</info> "
"your small frame perfectly." ) ) ) );
4404 }
4405 break;
4406 case sizing::big_sized_human_char:
4407 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This clothing is <bad>oversized</bad> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is <bad>oversized</bad> "
"and does <bad>not fit</bad> you." ) ) )
4408 "and does <bad>not fit</bad> you." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is <bad>oversized</bad> "
"and does <bad>not fit</bad> you." ) ) ) );
4409 break;
4410 case sizing::big_sized_small_char:
4411 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4412 _( "* This clothing is hilariously <bad>oversized</bad> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is hilariously <bad>oversized</bad> "
"and does <bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally "
"small mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) )
4413 "and does <bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is hilariously <bad>oversized</bad> "
"and does <bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally "
"small mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) )
4414 "small mutated anatomy</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is hilariously <bad>oversized</bad> "
"and does <bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally "
"small mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) ) );
4415 break;
4416 case sizing::human_sized_big_char:
4417 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4418 _( "* This clothing is <bad>normal sized</bad> and does "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is <bad>normal sized</bad> and does "
"<bad>not fit</info> your <info>abnormally large "
"mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) )
4419 "<bad>not fit</info> your <info>abnormally large "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is <bad>normal sized</bad> and does "
"<bad>not fit</info> your <info>abnormally large "
"mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) )
4420 "mutated anatomy</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is <bad>normal sized</bad> and does "
"<bad>not fit</info> your <info>abnormally large "
"mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) ) );
4421 break;
4422 case sizing::human_sized_small_char:
4423 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4424 _( "* This clothing is <bad>normal sized</bad> and does "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is <bad>normal sized</bad> and does "
"<bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally small "
"mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) )
4425 "<bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally small "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is <bad>normal sized</bad> and does "
"<bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally small "
"mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) )
4426 "mutated anatomy</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is <bad>normal sized</bad> and does "
"<bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally small "
"mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) ) );
4427 break;
4428 case sizing::small_sized_big_char:
4429 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4430 _( "* This clothing is hilariously <bad>undersized</bad> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is hilariously <bad>undersized</bad> "
"and does <bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally "
"large mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) )
4431 "and does <bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is hilariously <bad>undersized</bad> "
"and does <bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally "
"large mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) )
4432 "large mutated anatomy</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is hilariously <bad>undersized</bad> "
"and does <bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally "
"large mutated anatomy</info>." ) ) ) );
4433 break;
4434 case sizing::small_sized_human_char:
4435 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This clothing is <bad>undersized</bad> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is <bad>undersized</bad> "
"and does <bad>not fit</bad> you." ) ) )
4436 "and does <bad>not fit</bad> you." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing is <bad>undersized</bad> "
"and does <bad>not fit</bad> you." ) ) ) );
4437 break;
4438 default:
4439 break;
4440 }
4441 }
4442
4443 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS_VARSIZE ) ) {
4444 if( has_flag( flag_VARSIZE ) ) {
4445 std::string resize_str;
4446 if( has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
4447 switch( sizing_level ) {
4448 case sizing::small_sized_human_char:
4449 resize_str = _( "<info>can be upsized</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<info>can be upsized</info>"
) ) );
4450 break;
4451 case sizing::human_sized_small_char:
4452 resize_str = _( "<info>can be downsized</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<info>can be downsized</info>"
) ) );
4453 break;
4454 case sizing::big_sized_human_char:
4455 case sizing::big_sized_small_char:
4456 resize_str = _( "<bad>can not be downsized</bad>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bad>can not be downsized</bad>"
) ) );
4457 break;
4458 case sizing::small_sized_big_char:
4459 case sizing::human_sized_big_char:
4460 resize_str = _( "<bad>can not be upsized</bad>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bad>can not be upsized</bad>"
) ) );
4461 break;
4462 default:
4463 break;
4464 }
4465 if( !resize_str.empty() ) {
4466 std::string info_str = string_format( _( "* This clothing %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing %s." ) ) ), resize_str );
4467 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", info_str );
4468 }
4469 } else {
4470 switch( sizing_level ) {
4471 case sizing::small_sized_human_char:
4472 resize_str = _( " and <info>upsized</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " and <info>upsized</info>"
) ) );
4473 break;
4474 case sizing::human_sized_small_char:
4475 resize_str = _( " and <info>downsized</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " and <info>downsized</info>"
) ) );
4476 break;
4477 case sizing::big_sized_human_char:
4478 case sizing::big_sized_small_char:
4479 resize_str = _( " but <bad>not downsized</bad>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " but <bad>not downsized</bad>"
) ) );
4480 break;
4481 case sizing::small_sized_big_char:
4482 case sizing::human_sized_big_char:
4483 resize_str = _( " but <bad>not upsized</bad>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " but <bad>not upsized</bad>"
) ) );
4484 break;
4485 default:
4486 break;
4487 }
4488 std::string info_str = string_format( _( "* This clothing <info>can be "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing <info>can be "
"refitted</info>%s." ) ) )
4489 "refitted</info>%s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing <info>can be "
"refitted</info>%s." ) ) ), resize_str );
4490 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", info_str );
4491 }
4492 } else {
4493 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This clothing <bad>can not be refitted, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing <bad>can not be refitted, "
"upsized, or downsized</bad>." ) ) )
4494 "upsized, or downsized</bad>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This clothing <bad>can not be refitted, "
"upsized, or downsized</bad>." ) ) ) );
4495 }
4496 }
4497
4498 if( is_sided() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS_SIDED ) ) {
4499 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4500 _( "* This item can be worn on <info>either side</info> of "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item can be worn on <info>either side</info> of "
"the body." ) ) )
4501 "the body." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item can be worn on <info>either side</info> of "
"the body." ) ) ) );
4502 }
4503 if( is_power_armor() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS_POWERARMOR ) ) {
4504 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4505 _( "* This gear is a part of power armor." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This gear is a part of power armor."
) ) ) );
4506 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS_POWERARMOR_RADIATIONHINT ) ) {
4507 if( covers( bodypart_id( "head" ) ) ) {
4508 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4509 _( "* When worn with a power armor suit, it will "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* When worn with a power armor suit, it will "
"<good>fully protect</good> you from " "<info>radiation</info>."
) ) )
4510 "<good>fully protect</good> you from "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* When worn with a power armor suit, it will "
"<good>fully protect</good> you from " "<info>radiation</info>."
) ) )
4511 "<info>radiation</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* When worn with a power armor suit, it will "
"<good>fully protect</good> you from " "<info>radiation</info>."
) ) ) );
4512 } else {
4513 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4514 _( "* When worn with a power armor helmet, it will "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* When worn with a power armor helmet, it will "
"<good>fully protect</good> you from " "<info>radiation</info>."
) ) )
4515 "<good>fully protect</good> you from "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* When worn with a power armor helmet, it will "
"<good>fully protect</good> you from " "<info>radiation</info>."
) ) )
4516 "<info>radiation</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* When worn with a power armor helmet, it will "
"<good>fully protect</good> you from " "<info>radiation</info>."
) ) ) );
4517 }
4518 }
4519 }
4520
4521 if( typeId() == itype_rad_badge && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_IRRADIATION ) ) {
4522 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4523 string_format( _( "* The film strip on the badge is %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* The film strip on the badge is %s."
) ) ),
4524 rad_badge_color( irradiation ).first ) );
4525 }
4526}
4527
4528void item::book_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /* batch */,
4529 bool /* debug */ ) const
4530{
4531 if( !is_book() ) {
4532 return;
4533 }
4534
4535 insert_separation_line( info );
4536 const islot_book &book = *type->book;
4537 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
4538 // Some things about a book you CAN tell by it's cover.
4539 if( !book.skill && !type->can_use( "MA_MANUAL" ) && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_SUMMARY ) &&
4540 player_character.studied_all_recipes( *type ) ) {
4541 info.emplace_back( "BOOK", _( "Just for fun." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Just for fun." ) ) ) );
4542 }
4543
4544 if( type->can_use( "MA_MANUAL" ) && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_SUMMARY ) ) {
4545 info.emplace_back( "BOOK",
4546 _( "Some sort of <info>martial arts training "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Some sort of <info>martial arts training "
"manual</info>." ) ) )
4547 "manual</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Some sort of <info>martial arts training "
"manual</info>." ) ) ) );
4548 if( player_character.has_identified( typeId() ) ) {
4549 const matype_id style_to_learn = martial_art_learned_from( *type );
4550 info.emplace_back( "BOOK",
4551 string_format( _( "You can learn <info>%s</info> style "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can learn <info>%s</info> style "
"from it." ) ) )
4552 "from it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can learn <info>%s</info> style "
"from it." ) ) ), style_to_learn->name ) );
4553 info.emplace_back( "BOOK",
4554 string_format( _( "This fighting style is <info>%s</info> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This fighting style is <info>%s</info> "
"to learn." ) ) )
4555 "to learn." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This fighting style is <info>%s</info> "
"to learn." ) ) ),
4556 martialart_difficulty( style_to_learn ) ) );
4557 info.emplace_back( "BOOK",
4558 string_format( _( "It'd be easier to master if you'd have "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It'd be easier to master if you'd have "
"skill expertise in <info>%s</info>." ) ) )
4559 "skill expertise in <info>%s</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It'd be easier to master if you'd have "
"skill expertise in <info>%s</info>." ) ) ),
4560 style_to_learn->primary_skill->name() ) );
4561 }
4562 }
4563 if( book.req == 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_REQUIREMENTS_BEGINNER ) ) {
4564 info.emplace_back( "BOOK", _( "It can be <info>understood by "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It can be <info>understood by "
"beginners</info>." ) ) )
4565 "beginners</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It can be <info>understood by "
"beginners</info>." ) ) ) );
4566 }
4567 if( player_character.has_identified( typeId() ) ) {
4568 if( book.skill ) {
4569 const SkillLevel &skill = player_character.get_skill_level_object( book.skill );
4570 if( skill.can_train() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_SKILLRANGE_MAX ) ) {
4571 const std::string skill_name = book.skill->name();
4572 std::string fmt;
4573 if( book.level != 0 ) {
4574 fmt = string_format( _( "Can bring your <info>%s skill to</info> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can bring your <info>%s skill to</info> "
"<num>." ) ) )
