4575 "<num>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can bring your <info>%s skill to</info> "
"<num>." ) ) ), skill_name );
4576 info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "", fmt, iteminfo::no_flags, book.level );
4577 }
4578 fmt = string_format( _( "Your current <stat>%s skill</stat> is <num>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your current <stat>%s skill</stat> is <num>."
) ) ),
4579 skill_name );
4580 info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "", fmt, iteminfo::no_flags, skill.knowledgeLevel() );
4581 }
4582
4583 if( book.req != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_SKILLRANGE_MIN ) ) {
4584 const std::string fmt = string_format(
4585 _( "<info>Requires %s level</info> <num> to "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<info>Requires %s level</info> <num> to "
"understand." ) ) )
4586 "understand." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<info>Requires %s level</info> <num> to "
"understand." ) ) ), book.skill.obj().name() );
4587 info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "", fmt,
4588 iteminfo::lower_is_better, book.req );
4589 }
4590 }
4591
4592 if( book.intel != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_REQUIREMENTS_INT ) ) {
4593 info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "",
4594 _( "Requires <info>intelligence of</info> <num> to easily "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Requires <info>intelligence of</info> <num> to easily "
"read." ) ) )
4595 "read." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Requires <info>intelligence of</info> <num> to easily "
"read." ) ) ), iteminfo::lower_is_better, book.intel );
4596 }
4597 if( player_character.book_fun_for( *this, player_character ) != 0 &&
4598 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_MORALECHANGE ) ) {
4599 info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "",
4600 _( "Reading this book affects your morale by <num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Reading this book affects your morale by <num>"
) ) ),
4601 iteminfo::show_plus, player_character.book_fun_for( *this, player_character ) );
4602 }
4603 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_TIMEPERCHAPTER ) ) {
4604 std::string fmt = n_gettext(
4605 "A chapter of this book takes <num> <info>minute to "
4606 "read</info>.",
4607 "A chapter of this book takes <num> <info>minutes to "
4608 "read</info>.", to_minutes<int>( book.time ) );
4609 if( type->use_methods.count( "MA_MANUAL" ) ) {
4610 fmt = n_gettext(
4611 "<info>A training session</info> with this book takes "
4612 "<num> <info>minute</info>.",
4613 "<info>A training session</info> with this book takes "
4614 "<num> <info>minutes</info>.", to_minutes<int>( book.time ) );
4615 }
4616 info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "", fmt,
4617 iteminfo::lower_is_better, to_minutes<int>( book.time ) );
4618 }
4619
4620 if( book.chapters > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_NUMUNREADCHAPTERS ) ) {
4621 const int unread = get_remaining_chapters( player_character );
4622 std::string fmt = n_gettext( "This book has <num> <info>unread chapter</info>.",
4623 "This book has <num> <info>unread chapters</info>.",
4624 unread );
4625 info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "", fmt, iteminfo::no_flags, unread );
4626 }
4627
4628 if( !book.proficiencies.empty() ) {
4629 const auto enumerate_profs = []( const book_proficiency_bonus & prof ) {
4630 return prof.id->name();
4631 };
4632 const std::string profs = string_format(
4633 _( "This book can help with the following proficiencies: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This book can help with the following proficiencies: %s"
) ) ),
4634 enumerate_as_string( book.proficiencies, enumerate_profs ) );
4635 info.emplace_back( "BOOK", profs );
4636 }
4637
4638 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_INCLUDED_RECIPES ) ) {
4639 std::vector<std::string> known_recipe_list;
4640 std::vector<std::string> learnable_recipe_list;
4641 std::vector<std::string> practice_recipe_list;
4642 std::vector<std::string> unlearnable_recipe_list;
4643 for( const islot_book::recipe_with_description_t &elem : book.recipes ) {
4644 const bool knows_it = player_character.knows_recipe( elem.recipe );
4645 // If the player knows it, they recognize it even if it's not clearly stated.
4646 if( elem.is_hidden() && !knows_it ) {
4647 continue;
4648 }
4649 const bool can_learn = player_character.get_knowledge_level( elem.recipe->skill_used ) >=
4650 elem.skill_level;
4651 if( elem.recipe->is_practice() ) {
4652 const char *const format = can_learn ? "<dark>%s</dark>" : "<color_brown>%s</color>";
4653 practice_recipe_list.emplace_back( string_format( format, elem.recipe->result_name() ) );
4654 } else if( knows_it ) {
4655 // In case the recipe is known, but has a different name in the book, use the
4656 // real name to avoid confusing the player.
4657 known_recipe_list.emplace_back( string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>", elem.recipe->result_name() ) );
4658 } else if( !can_learn ) {
4659 unlearnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( string_format( "<color_brown>%s</color>", elem.name() ) );
4660 } else {
4661 learnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( string_format( "<dark>%s</dark>", elem.name() ) );
4662 }
4663 }
4664
4665 const std::size_t num_crafting_recipes = known_recipe_list.size() + learnable_recipe_list.size() +
4666 unlearnable_recipe_list.size();
4667 const std::size_t num_total_recipes = num_crafting_recipes + practice_recipe_list.size();
4668 if( num_total_recipes > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BOOK_RECIPES ) ) {
4669 std::vector<std::string> lines;
4670 if( num_crafting_recipes > 0 ) {
4671 lines.emplace_back(
4672 string_format( n_gettext( "This book contains %u crafting recipe.",
4673 "This book contains %u crafting recipes.",
4674 num_crafting_recipes ), num_crafting_recipes ) );
4675 }
4676 if( !known_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4677 lines.emplace_back( _( "You already know how to craft:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You already know how to craft:"
) ) ) );
4678 lines.emplace_back( enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( known_recipe_list ) );
4679 }
4680 if( !learnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4681 lines.emplace_back( _( "You understand how to craft:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You understand how to craft:"
) ) ) );
4682 lines.emplace_back( enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( learnable_recipe_list ) );
4683 }
4684 if( !unlearnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4685 lines.emplace_back( _( "You lack the skills to understand:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You lack the skills to understand:"
) ) ) );
4686 lines.emplace_back( enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( unlearnable_recipe_list ) );
4687 }
4688 if( !practice_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4689 lines.emplace_back( _( "This book can help you practice:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This book can help you practice:"
) ) ) );
4690 lines.emplace_back( enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( practice_recipe_list ) );
4691 }
4692 insert_separation_line( info );
4693 for( const std::string &recipe_line : lines ) {
4694 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4695 }
4696 }
4697
4698 if( num_total_recipes < book.recipes.size() &&
4699 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BOOK_ADDITIONAL_RECIPES ) ) {
4700 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4701 _( "It might help you figuring out some <good>more recipes</good>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It might help you figuring out some <good>more recipes</good>."
) ) ) );
4702 }
4703 }
4704
4705 } else {
4706 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_UNREAD ) ) {
4707 info.emplace_back( "BOOK", _( "You need to <info>read this book to see its contents</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need to <info>read this book to see its contents</info>."
) ) ) );
4708 }
4709 }
4710}
4711
4712void item::battery_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query * /*parts*/,
4713 int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
4714{
4715 if( !is_vehicle_battery() ) {
4716 return;
4717 }
4718
4719 std::string info_string;
4720 if( type->battery->max_capacity < 1_J ) {
4721 info_string = string_format( _( "<bold>Capacity</bold>: %dmJ" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Capacity</bold>: %dmJ"
) ) ),
4722 to_millijoule( type->battery->max_capacity ) );
4723 } else if( type->battery->max_capacity < 1_kJ ) {
4724 info_string = string_format( _( "<bold>Capacity</bold>: %dJ" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Capacity</bold>: %dJ"
) ) ),
4725 to_joule( type->battery->max_capacity ) );
4726 } else if( type->battery->max_capacity >= 1_kJ ) {
4727 info_string = string_format( _( "<bold>Capacity</bold>: %dkJ" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Capacity</bold>: %dkJ"
) ) ),
4728 to_kilojoule( type->battery->max_capacity ) );
4729 }
4730 insert_separation_line( info );
4731 info.emplace_back( "BATTERY", info_string );
4732}
4733
4734void item::tool_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
4735 bool /*debug*/ ) const
4736{
4737 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
4738
4739 if( !is_tool() ) {
4740 return;
4741 }
4742
4743 insert_separation_line( info );
4744 if( !ammo_types().empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::TOOL_CHARGES ) ) {
4745 info.emplace_back( "TOOL", string_format( _( "<bold>Charges</bold>: %d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Charges</bold>: %d"
) ) ),
4746 ammo_remaining() ) );
4747 }
4748
4749 if( !magazine_integral() ) {
4750 if( magazine_current() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::TOOL_MAGAZINE_CURRENT ) ) {
4751 info.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Magazine: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Magazine: " ) ) ),
4752 string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>", magazine_current()->tname() ) );
4753 }
4754
4755 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::TOOL_MAGAZINE_COMPATIBLE ) ) {
4756 if( uses_magazine() ) {
4757 // Keep this identical with gun magazines in item::gun_info
4758 const std::vector<itype_id> compat_sorted = sorted_lex( magazine_compatible() );
4759 const std::string mag_names = enumerate_as_string( compat_sorted,
4760 []( const itype_id & id ) {
4761 return item::nname( id );
4762 } );
4763
4764 const std::set<flag_id> flag_restrictions = contents.magazine_flag_restrictions();
4765 const std::string flag_names = enumerate_as_string( flag_restrictions,
4766 []( const flag_id & e ) {
4767 return e->name();
4768 } );
4769
4770 std::string display = _( "<bold>Compatible magazines</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Compatible magazines</bold>:"
) ) );
4771 if( !compat_sorted.empty() ) {
4772 display += _( "\n<bold>Types</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n<bold>Types</bold>: "
) ) ) + mag_names;
4773 }
4774 if( !flag_restrictions.empty() ) {
4775 display += _( "\n<bold>Form factors</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\n<bold>Form factors</bold>: "
) ) ) + flag_names;
4776 }
4777
4778 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", display );
4779 }
4780 }
4781 } else if( !ammo_types().empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::TOOL_CAPACITY ) ) {
4782 for( const ammotype &at : ammo_types() ) {
4783 info.emplace_back(
4784 "TOOL",
4785 "",
4786 string_format(
4787 n_gettext(
4788 "Maximum <num> charge of %s.",
4789 "Maximum <num> charges of %s.",
4790 ammo_capacity( at ) ),
4791 at->name() ),
4792 iteminfo::no_flags,
4793 ammo_capacity( at ) );
4794 }
4795 }
4796
4797 // UPS, rechargeable power cells, and bionic power
4798 if( has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RECHARGE_UPSMODDED ) ) {
4799 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4800 _( "* This tool has been modified to use a <info>universal "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool has been modified to use a <info>universal "
"power supply</info> and is <neutral>not compatible"
"</neutral> with <info>standard batteries</info>."
) ) )
4801 "power supply</info> and is <neutral>not compatible"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool has been modified to use a <info>universal "
"power supply</info> and is <neutral>not compatible"
"</neutral> with <info>standard batteries</info>."
) ) )
4802 "</neutral> with <info>standard batteries</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool has been modified to use a <info>universal "
"power supply</info> and is <neutral>not compatible"
"</neutral> with <info>standard batteries</info>."
) ) ) );
4803 } else if( has_flag( flag_RECHARGE ) && has_flag( flag_NO_RELOAD ) &&
4804 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RECHARGE_NORELOAD ) ) {
4805 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4806 _( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "
"and is <neutral>not compatible</neutral> with "
"<info>standard batteries</info>." ) ) )
4807 "and is <neutral>not compatible</neutral> with "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "
"and is <neutral>not compatible</neutral> with "
"<info>standard batteries</info>." ) ) )
4808 "<info>standard batteries</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "
"and is <neutral>not compatible</neutral> with "
"<info>standard batteries</info>." ) ) ) );
4809 } else if( has_flag( flag_RECHARGE ) &&
4810 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RECHARGE_UPSCAPABLE ) ) {
4811 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4812 _( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "
"and can be recharged in any <neutral>UPS-compatible "
"recharging station</neutral>. You could charge it with "
"<info>standard batteries</info>, but unloading it is "
"impossible." ) ) )
4813 "and can be recharged in any <neutral>UPS-compatible "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "
"and can be recharged in any <neutral>UPS-compatible "
"recharging station</neutral>. You could charge it with "
"<info>standard batteries</info>, but unloading it is "
"impossible." ) ) )
4814 "recharging station</neutral>. You could charge it with "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "
"and can be recharged in any <neutral>UPS-compatible "
"recharging station</neutral>. You could charge it with "
"<info>standard batteries</info>, but unloading it is "
"impossible." ) ) )
4815 "<info>standard batteries</info>, but unloading it is "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "
"and can be recharged in any <neutral>UPS-compatible "
"recharging station</neutral>. You could charge it with "
"<info>standard batteries</info>, but unloading it is "
"impossible." ) ) )
4816 "impossible." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "
"and can be recharged in any <neutral>UPS-compatible "
"recharging station</neutral>. You could charge it with "
"<info>standard batteries</info>, but unloading it is "
"impossible." ) ) ) );
4817 } else if( has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
4818 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4819 _( "* This tool <info>runs on bionic power</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This tool <info>runs on bionic power</info>."
) ) ) );
4820 } else if( has_flag( flag_BURNOUT ) && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::TOOL_BURNOUT ) ) {
4821 int percent_left = 0;
4822 if( ammo_data() != nullptr ) {
4823 // Candle items that use ammo instead of charges
4824 // The capacity should never be zero but clang complains about it
4825 percent_left = 100 * ammo_remaining() / std::max( ammo_capacity( ammo_data()->ammo->type ), 1 );
4826 } else if( type->maximum_charges() > 0 ) {
4827 // Candle items that use charges instead of ammo
4828 percent_left = 100 * ammo_remaining() / type->maximum_charges();
4829 }
4830
4831 std::string feedback;
4832 if( percent_left == 100 ) {
4833 feedback = _( "It's new, and ready to burn." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's new, and ready to burn."
) ) );
4834 } else if( percent_left >= 75 ) {
4835 feedback = _( "Almost new, with much material to burn." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Almost new, with much material to burn."
) ) );
4836 } else if( percent_left >= 50 ) {
4837 feedback = _( "More than a quarter has burned away." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "More than a quarter has burned away."
) ) );
4838 } else if( percent_left >= 25 ) {
4839 feedback = _( "More than half has burned away." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "More than half has burned away."
) ) );
4840 } else if( percent_left >= 10 ) {
4841 feedback = _( "Less than a quarter left to burn." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Less than a quarter left to burn."
) ) );
4842 } else {
4843 feedback = _( "Almost completely burned out." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Almost completely burned out."
) ) );
4844 }
4845 feedback = _( "<bold>Fuel</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Fuel</bold>: "
) ) ) + feedback;
4846 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", feedback );
4847 }
4848
4849 // Display e-ink tablet copied recipes from SD cards
4850 const std::set<recipe_id> saved_recipes = get_saved_recipes();
4851 if( !saved_recipes.empty() ) {
4852 std::vector<std::string> known_recipe_list;
4853 std::vector<std::string> learnable_recipe_list;
4854 std::vector<std::string> unlearnable_recipe_list;
4855
4856 for( const recipe_id &rid : saved_recipes ) {
4857 const recipe *r = &rid.obj();
4858
4859 const bool knows_it = player_character.knows_recipe( r );
4860 const bool can_learn = player_character.get_skill_level( r->skill_used ) >= r->difficulty;
4861
4862 // In case the recipe is known, but has a different name in the item, use the
4863 // real name to avoid confusing the player.
4864 const std::string name = r->result_name();
4865
4866 if( knows_it ) {
4867 known_recipe_list.emplace_back( "<bold>" + name + "</bold>" );
4868 } else if( !can_learn ) {
4869 unlearnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( "<color_brown>" + name + "</color>" );
4870 } else {
4871 learnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( "<dark>" + name + "</dark>" );
4872 }
4873 }
4874
4875 int total_recipes = known_recipe_list.size() + learnable_recipe_list.size() +
4876 unlearnable_recipe_list.size();
4877
4878 if( ( !known_recipe_list.empty() || !learnable_recipe_list.empty() ||
4879 !unlearnable_recipe_list.empty() ) &&
4880 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BOOK_RECIPES ) ) {
4881 const std::string recipe_line =
4882 string_format( n_gettext( "Contains %1$d copied crafting recipe:",
4883 "Contains %1$d copied crafting recipes:",
4884 total_recipes ), total_recipes );
4885
4886 insert_separation_line( info );
4887 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4888
4889 if( !known_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4890 const std::string recipe_line =
4891 string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou already know %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
4892 "\nYou already know %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
4893 known_recipe_list.size() ),
4894 known_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( known_recipe_list ) );
4895
4896 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4897 }
4898
4899 if( !learnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4900 const std::string recipe_line =
4901 string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou have the skills to craft %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
4902 "\nYou have the skills to craft %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
4903 learnable_recipe_list.size() ),
4904 learnable_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( learnable_recipe_list ) );
4905
4906 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4907 }
4908
4909 if( !unlearnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4910 const std::string recipe_line =
4911 string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou lack the skills to craft %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
4912 "\nYou lack the skills to craft %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
4913 unlearnable_recipe_list.size() ),
4914 unlearnable_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( unlearnable_recipe_list ) );
4915
4916 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4917 }
4918 }
4919 }
4920
4921 // Display e-ink tablet ebook recipes
4922 if( is_ebook_storage() && !is_broken_on_active() ) {
4923 std::vector<std::string> known_recipe_list;
4924 std::vector<std::string> learnable_recipe_list;
4925 std::vector<std::string> unlearnable_recipe_list;
4926 std::vector<const item *> book_list = ebooks();
4927 int total_ebooks = book_list.size();
4928
4929 for( const item *ebook : book_list ) {
4930 const islot_book &book = *ebook->type->book;
4931 for( const islot_book::recipe_with_description_t &elem : book.recipes ) {
4932 const bool knows_it = player_character.knows_recipe( elem.recipe );
4933 const bool can_learn = player_character.get_skill_level( elem.recipe->skill_used ) >=
4934 elem.skill_level;
4935 // If the player knows it, they recognize it even if it's not clearly stated.
4936 if( elem.is_hidden() && !knows_it ) {
4937 continue;
4938 }
4939
4940 // In case the recipe is known, but has a different name in the book, use the
4941 // real name to avoid confusing the player.
4942 const std::string name = elem.recipe->result_name( /*decorated=*/true );
4943
4944 if( knows_it ) {
4945 std::string recipe_formated = "<bold>" + name + "</bold>";
4946 if( known_recipe_list.end() == std::find( known_recipe_list.begin(), known_recipe_list.end(),
4947 name ) ) {
4948 known_recipe_list.emplace_back( "<bold>" + name + "</bold>" );
4949 }
4950 } else if( !can_learn ) {
4951 std::string recipe_formated = "<color_brown>" + elem.name() + "</color>";
4952 if( unlearnable_recipe_list.end() == std::find( unlearnable_recipe_list.begin(),
4953 unlearnable_recipe_list.end(), recipe_formated ) ) {
4954 unlearnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( recipe_formated );
4955 }
4956 } else {
4957 std::string recipe_formated = "<dark>" + elem.name() + "</dark>";
4958 if( learnable_recipe_list.end() == std::find( learnable_recipe_list.begin(),
4959 learnable_recipe_list.end(), recipe_formated ) ) {
4960 learnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( "<dark>" + elem.name() + "</dark>" );
4961 }
4962 }
4963 }
4964 }
4965
4966 int total_recipes = known_recipe_list.size() + learnable_recipe_list.size() +
4967 unlearnable_recipe_list.size();
4968
4969 if( ( !known_recipe_list.empty() || !learnable_recipe_list.empty() ||
4970 !unlearnable_recipe_list.empty() ) &&
4971 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BOOK_RECIPES ) ) {
4972 std::string recipe_line =
4973 string_format( n_gettext( "Contains %1$d unique crafting recipe,",
4974 "Contains %1$d unique crafting recipes,",
4975 total_recipes ), total_recipes );
4976 std::string source_line =
4977 string_format( n_gettext( "from %1$d stored e-book:",
4978 "from %1$d stored e-books:",
4979 total_ebooks ), total_ebooks );
4980
4981 insert_separation_line( info );
4982 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4983 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", source_line );
4984
4985 if( !known_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4986 const std::string recipe_line =
4987 string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou already know %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
4988 "\nYou already know %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
4989 known_recipe_list.size() ),
4990 known_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( known_recipe_list ) );
4991
4992 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4993 }
4994
4995 if( !learnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4996 std::string recipe_line =
4997 string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou have the skills to craft %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
4998 "\nYou have the skills to craft %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
4999 learnable_recipe_list.size() ),
5000 learnable_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( learnable_recipe_list ) );
5001
5002 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
5003 }
5004
5005 if( !unlearnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
5006 std::string recipe_line =
5007 string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou lack the skills to craft %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
5008 "\nYou lack the skills to craft %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
5009 unlearnable_recipe_list.size() ),
5010 unlearnable_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( unlearnable_recipe_list ) );
5011
5012 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
5013 }
5014 }
5015 }
5016}
5017
5018void item::actions_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
5019 int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
5020{
5021
5022 const std::map<std::string, use_function> &use_methods = type->use_methods;
5023 if( use_methods.empty() || !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ACTIONS ) ) {
5024 return;
5025 }
5026 insert_separation_line( info );
5027 std::string actions = enumerate_as_string( use_methods,
5028 []( const std::pair<std::string, use_function> &val ) {
5029 return string_format( "<info>%s</info>", val.second.get_name() );
5030 } );
5031 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>Actions</bold>: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Actions</bold>: %s"
) ) ), actions ) );
5032}
5033
5034void item::component_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
5035 bool /*debug*/ ) const
5036{
5037 if( components.empty() || !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_COMPONENTS_MADEFROM ) ) {
5038 return;
5039 }
5040 if( is_craft() ) {
5041 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "Using: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Using: %s" ) ) ),
5042 components_to_string() ) );
5043 } else {
5044 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "Made from: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Made from: %s" ) ) ),
5045 components_to_string() ) );
5046 }
5047}
5048
5049static void enchantment_info_helper( const item &it,
5050 enchantment::has type,
5051 std::vector<std::string> &always,
5052 std::vector<std::string> &active,
5053 std::vector<std::string> &inactive )
5054{
5055 for( const enchantment &ench : it.get_defined_enchantments() ) {
5056 // only check conditions matching the given type
5057 if( ench.active_conditions.first == type ) {
5058 // if a description is provided use that
5059 if( !ench.description.empty() ) {
5060 std::string info;
5061 if( !ench.name.empty() ) {
5062 info = string_format( "<info>%s</info>: %s", ench.name.translated(),
5063 ench.description.translated() );
5064 } else {
5065 info = string_format( _( "<info>Description</info>: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<info>Description</info>: %s"
) ) ), ench.description.translated() );
5066 }
5067 switch( ench.active_conditions.second ) {
5068 case enchantment::condition::ALWAYS:
5069 always.push_back( info );
5070 break;
5071 case enchantment::condition::ACTIVE:
5072 active.push_back( info );
5073 break;
5074 case enchantment::condition::INACTIVE:
5075 inactive.push_back( info );
5076 break;
5077 case enchantment::condition::DIALOG_CONDITION:
5078 case enchantment::condition::NUM_CONDITION:
5079 // skip for dialog conditions
5080 break;
5081 }
5082 }
5083 }
5084 }
5085 for( const enchant_cache &ench : it.get_proc_enchantments() ) {
5086 // only check conditions matching the given type
5087 if( ench.active_conditions.first == type ) {
5088 // if a description is provided use that
5089 if( !ench.description.empty() ) {
5090 std::string info;
5091 if( !ench.name.empty() ) {
5092 info = string_format( "<info>%s</info>: %s", ench.name.translated(),
5093 ench.description.translated() );
5094 } else {
5095 info = string_format( _( "<info>Description</info>: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<info>Description</info>: %s"
) ) ), ench.description.translated() );
5096 }
5097 switch( ench.active_conditions.second ) {
5098 case enchantment::condition::ALWAYS:
5099 always.push_back( info );
5100 break;
5101 case enchantment::condition::ACTIVE:
5102 active.push_back( info );
5103 break;
5104 case enchantment::condition::INACTIVE:
5105 inactive.push_back( info );
5106 break;
5107 case enchantment::condition::DIALOG_CONDITION:
5108 case enchantment::condition::NUM_CONDITION:
5109 // skip for dialog conditions
5110 break;
5111 }
5112 }
5113 }
5114 }
5115}
5116
5117static void enchantment_info_printer( std::vector<iteminfo> &info,
5118 std::vector<std::string> &always,
5119 std::vector<std::string> &active,
5120 std::vector<std::string> &inactive )
5121{
5122 if( !always.empty() ) {
5123 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>Always</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Always</bold>:"
) ) ) ) );
5124 for( const std::string &entry : always ) {
5125 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "* %s", entry ) );
5126 }
5127 }
5128 if( !active.empty() ) {
5129 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>When Active</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>When Active</bold>:"
) ) ) ) );
5130 for( const std::string &entry : active ) {
5131 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "* %s", entry ) );
5132 }
5133 }
5134 if( !inactive.empty() ) {
5135 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>When Inactive</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>When Inactive</bold>:"
) ) ) ) );
5136 for( const std::string &entry : inactive ) {
5137 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "* %s", entry ) );
5138 }
5139 }
5140}
5141
5142void item::enchantment_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
5143 int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
5144{
5145 if( !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_ENCHANTMENTS ) ) {
5146 return;
5147 }
5148 insert_separation_line( info );
5149 // if the item has relic data and the item is mundane show some details
5150 if( type->relic_data ) {
5151 // check WIELD
5152 std::vector<std::string> always;
5153 std::vector<std::string> active;
5154 std::vector<std::string> inactive;
5155 enchantment_info_helper( *this, enchantment::has::WIELD, always, active, inactive );
5156 if( !always.empty() || !active.empty() || !inactive.empty() ) {
5157 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5158 string_format( _( "When <bold>wielded</bold> this item provides:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "When <bold>wielded</bold> this item provides:"
) ) ) ) );
5159 enchantment_info_printer( info, always, active, inactive );
5160 }
5161 always.clear();
5162 active.clear();
5163 inactive.clear();
5164 enchantment_info_helper( *this, enchantment::has::WORN, always, active, inactive );
5165 if( !always.empty() || !active.empty() || !inactive.empty() ) {
5166 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5167 string_format( _( "When <bold>worn</bold> this item provides:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "When <bold>worn</bold> this item provides:"
) ) ) ) );
5168 enchantment_info_printer( info, always, active, inactive );
5169 }
5170 always.clear();
5171 active.clear();
5172 inactive.clear();
5173 enchantment_info_helper( *this, enchantment::has::HELD, always, active, inactive );
5174 if( !always.empty() || !active.empty() || !inactive.empty() ) {
5175 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5176 string_format( _( "When <bold>carried</bold> this item provides:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "When <bold>carried</bold> this item provides:"
) ) ) ) );
5177 enchantment_info_printer( info, always, active, inactive );
5178 }
5179 }
5180}
5181
5182void item::repair_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
5183 int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
5184{
5185 if( !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_REPAIREDWITH ) ) {
5186 return;
5187 }
5188 insert_separation_line( info );
5189 const std::vector<itype_id> rep = sorted_lex( repaired_with() );
5190 if( !rep.empty() ) {
5191 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>Repair</bold> using %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Repair</bold> using %s."
) ) ),
5192 enumerate_as_string( rep,
5193 []( const itype_id & e ) {
5194 return nname( e );
5195 }, enumeration_conjunction::or_ ) ) );
5196
5197 const std::string repairs_with = enumerate_as_string( type->repairs_with,
5198 []( const material_id & e ) {
5199 return string_format( "<info>%s</info>", e->name() );
5200 } );
5201 if( !repairs_with.empty() ) {
5202 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>With</bold> %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>With</bold> %s."
) ) ), repairs_with ) );
5203 }
5204 } else {
5205 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This item is <bad>not repairable</bad>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item is <bad>not repairable</bad>."
) ) ) );
5206 }
5207}
5208
5209void item::disassembly_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
5210 int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
5211{
5212 if( !components.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_COMPONENTS_MADEFROM ) ) {
5213 return;
5214 }
5215 if( !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_COMPONENTS_DISASSEMBLE ) ) {
5216 return;
5217 }
5218
5219 const recipe &dis = ( typeId() == itype_disassembly ) ? get_making() :
5220 recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( typeId() );
5221 const requirement_data &req = dis.disassembly_requirements();
5222 if( !req.is_empty() ) {
5223 const std::string approx_time = to_string_approx( dis.time_to_craft( get_player_character(),
5224 recipe_time_flag::ignore_proficiencies ) );
5225
5226 const requirement_data::alter_item_comp_vector &comps_list = req.get_components();
5227 const std::string comps_str = enumerate_as_string( comps_list,
5228 []( const std::vector<item_comp> &comp_opts ) {
5229 return comp_opts.front().to_string();
5230 } );
5231
5232 std::vector<std::string> reqs_list;
5233 const requirement_data::alter_tool_comp_vector &tools_list = req.get_tools();
5234 for( const std::vector<tool_comp> &it : tools_list ) {
5235 if( !it.empty() ) {
5236 reqs_list.push_back( it.front().to_string() );
5237 }
5238 }
5239 const requirement_data::alter_quali_req_vector &quals_list = req.get_qualities();
5240 for( const std::vector<quality_requirement> &it : quals_list ) {
5241 if( !it.empty() ) {
5242 reqs_list.push_back( it.front().to_colored_string() );
5243 }
5244 }
5245
5246 std::string descr;
5247 if( reqs_list.empty() ) {
5248 //~ 1 is approx. time (e.g. 'about 5 minutes'), 2 is a list of items
5249 descr = string_format( _( "<bold>Disassembly</bold> takes %1$s and might yield: %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Disassembly</bold> takes %1$s and might yield: %2$s."
) ) ),
5250 approx_time, comps_str );
5251 } else {
5252 descr = string_format(
5253 //~ 1 is approx. time, 2 is a list of items and tools with qualities, 3 is a list of items.
5254 //~ Bold text in the middle makes it easier to see where the second list starts.
5255 _( "<bold>Disassembly</bold> takes %1$s, requires %2$s and <bold>might yield</bold>: %3$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Disassembly</bold> takes %1$s, requires %2$s and <bold>might yield</bold>: %3$s."
) ) ),
5256 approx_time, enumerate_as_string( reqs_list ), comps_str );
5257 }
5258
5259 insert_separation_line( info );
5260 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", descr );
5261 }
5262}
5263
5264void item::qualities_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
5265 bool /*debug*/ ) const
5266{
5267 // Inline function to emplace a given quality (and its level) onto the info vector
5268 auto name_quality = [&info]( const std::pair<quality_id, int> &q ) {
5269 std::string str;
5270 if( q.first == qual_JACK || q.first == qual_LIFT ) {
5271 //~ %1$d is the numeric quality level, and %2$s is the name of the quality.
5272 //~ %3$d is the amount of weight the jack can lift, and %4$s is the units of that weight.
5273 str = string_format( _( "Level <info>%1$d %2$s</info> quality, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Level <info>%1$d %2$s</info> quality, "
"rated at <info>%3$d</info> %4$s" ) ) )
5274 "rated at <info>%3$d</info> %4$s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Level <info>%1$d %2$s</info> quality, "
"rated at <info>%3$d</info> %4$s" ) ) ),
5275 q.second, q.first.obj().name,
5276 static_cast<int>( convert_weight( lifting_quality_to_mass( q.second ) ) ),
5277 weight_units() );
5278 } else {
5279 //~ %1$d is the numeric quality level, and %2$s is the name of the quality
5280 str = string_format( _( "Level <info>%1$d %2$s</info> quality" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Level <info>%1$d %2$s</info> quality"
) ) ),
5281 q.second, q.first.obj().name );
5282 }
5283 info.emplace_back( "QUALITIES", "", str );
5284 };
5285
5286 // List all qualities of this item granted by its item type
5287 const bool has_any_qualities = !type->qualities.empty() || !type->charged_qualities.empty();
5288 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::QUALITIES ) && has_any_qualities ) {
5289 insert_separation_line( info );
5290 // List all inherent (unconditional) qualities
5291 if( !type->qualities.empty() ) {
5292 info.emplace_back( "QUALITIES", "", _( "<bold>Has qualities</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Has qualities</bold>:"
) ) ) );
5293 for( const std::pair<quality_id, int> &q : sorted_lex( type->qualities ) ) {
5294 name_quality( q );
5295 }
5296 }
5297 // Tools with "charged_qualities" defined may have additional qualities when charged.
5298 // List them, and show whether there is enough charge to use those qualities.
5299 if( !type->charged_qualities.empty() && type->charges_to_use() > 0 ) {
5300 // Use ammo_sufficient() with player character to include bionic/UPS power
5301 if( ammo_sufficient( &get_player_character() ) ) {
5302 info.emplace_back( "QUALITIES", "", _( "<good>Has enough charges</good> for qualities:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<good>Has enough charges</good> for qualities:"
) ) ) );
5303 } else {
5304 info.emplace_back( "QUALITIES", "",
5305 string_format( _( "<bad>Needs %d or more charges</bad> for qualities:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bad>Needs %d or more charges</bad> for qualities:"
) ) ),
5306 type->charges_to_use() ) );
5307 }
5308 for( const std::pair<quality_id, int> &q : sorted_lex( type->charged_qualities ) ) {
5309 name_quality( q );
5310 }
5311 }
5312 }
5313
5314 // Accumulate and list all qualities of items contained within this item
5315 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::QUALITIES_CONTAINED ) &&
5316 contents.has_any_with( []( const item & e ) {
5317 return !e.type->qualities.empty();
5318 }, pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
5319
5320 info.emplace_back( "QUALITIES", "", _( "Contains items with qualities:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Contains items with qualities:"
) ) ) );
5321 std::map<quality_id, int, quality_id::LexCmp> most_quality;
5322 for( const item *e : contents.all_items_top() ) {
5323 for( const std::pair<const quality_id, int> &q : e->type->qualities ) {
5324 auto emplace_result = most_quality.emplace( q );
5325 if( !emplace_result.second &&
5326 most_quality.at( emplace_result.first->first ) < q.second ) {
5327 most_quality[ q.first ] = q.second;
5328 }
5329 }
5330 }
5331 for( const std::pair<const quality_id, int> &q : most_quality ) {
5332 name_quality( q );
5333 }
5334 }
5335}
5336
5337void item::bionic_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
5338 bool /*debug*/ ) const
5339{
5340 if( !is_bionic() ) {
5341 return;
5342 }
5343
5344 insert_separation_line( info );
5345
5346 // TODO: Unhide when enforcing limits
5347 if( get_option < bool >( "CBM_SLOTS_ENABLED" )
5348 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_CBM_SLOTS ) ) {
5349 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", list_occupied_bps( type->bionic->id,
5350 _( "This bionic is installed in the following body "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This bionic is installed in the following body "
"part(s):" ) ) )
5351 "part(s):" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This bionic is installed in the following body "
"part(s):" ) ) ) ) );
5352 }
5353
5354 if( is_bionic() && has_flag( flag_NO_STERILE ) ) {
5355 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5356 _( "* This bionic is <bad>not sterile</bad>, use an <info>autoclave</info> and an <info>autoclave pouch</info> to sterilize it. " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This bionic is <bad>not sterile</bad>, use an <info>autoclave</info> and an <info>autoclave pouch</info> to sterilize it. "
) ) ) );
5357 }
5358 insert_separation_line( info );
5359
5360 const bionic_id bid = type->bionic->id;
5361 const std::vector<material_id> &fuels = bid->fuel_opts;
5362 if( !fuels.empty() ) {
5363 const std::string fuels_str = enumerate_as_string( fuels,
5364 []( const material_id & id ) {
5365 return "<info>" + id->name() + "</info>";
5366 } );
5367
5368 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5369 n_gettext( "* This bionic can produce power from the following fuel: ",
5370 "* This bionic can produce power from the following fuels: ", fuels.size() )
5371 + fuels_str );
5372 }
5373
5374 insert_separation_line( info );
5375
5376 if( bid->capacity > 0_mJ ) {
5377 info.emplace_back( "CBM", _( "<bold>Power Capacity</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Power Capacity</bold>:"
) ) ), _( " <num> mJ" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " <num> mJ" ) ) ),
5378 iteminfo::no_newline,
5379 static_cast<double>( units::to_millijoule( bid->capacity ) ) );
5380 }
5381
5382 insert_separation_line( info );
5383
5384 if( bid->required_bionic ) {
5385 info.emplace_back( "CBM", string_format( "* This CBM requires another CBM to also be installed: %s",
5386 bid->required_bionic->name ) );
5387 }
5388 insert_separation_line( info );
5389
5390 // TODO refactor these almost identical blocks
5391 if( !bid->encumbrance.empty() ) {
5392 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Encumbrance</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Encumbrance</bold>:"
) ) ),
5393 iteminfo::no_newline );
5394 for( const std::pair<bodypart_str_id, int> &element : sorted_lex( bid->encumbrance ) ) {
5395 info.emplace_back( "CBM", " " + body_part_name_as_heading( element.first.id(), 1 ),
5396 " <num>", iteminfo::no_newline, element.second );
5397 }
5398 }
5399
5400 if( !bid->env_protec.empty() ) {
5401 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5402 _( "<bold>Environmental Protection</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Environmental Protection</bold>:"
) ) ),
5403 iteminfo::no_newline );
5404 for( const std::pair< bodypart_str_id, size_t > &element : sorted_lex( bid->env_protec ) ) {
5405 info.emplace_back( "CBM", " " + body_part_name_as_heading( element.first, 1 ),
5406 " <num>", iteminfo::no_newline, static_cast<double>( element.second ) );
5407 }
5408 }
5409
5410 for( const damage_info_order &dio : damage_info_order::get_all(
5411 damage_info_order::info_type::BIO ) ) {
5412 std::map<bodypart_str_id, float> dt_protec;
5413 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, resistances> &prot : bid->protec ) {
5414 float res = prot.second.type_resist( dio.dmg_type );
5415 if( res >= 0.f ) {
5416 dt_protec.emplace( prot.first, res );
5417 }
5418 }
5419 if( !dt_protec.empty() ) {
5420 //~ Type of protection (ex: "Bash Protection")
5421 std::string label = string_format( _( "<bold>%s Protection</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>%s Protection</bold>:"
) ) ),
5422 uppercase_first_letter( dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ) );
5423 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", label, iteminfo::no_newline );
5424 for( const std::pair<bodypart_str_id, float> &element : sorted_lex( dt_protec ) ) {
5425 info.emplace_back( "CBM", " " + body_part_name_as_heading( element.first, 1 ),
5426 " <num>", iteminfo::no_newline, element.second );
5427 }
5428 }
5429 }
5430
5431 if( !bid->stat_bonus.empty() ) {
5432 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Stat Bonus</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Stat Bonus</bold>:"
) ) ),
5433 iteminfo::no_newline );
5434 for( const auto &element : bid->stat_bonus ) {
5435 info.emplace_back( "CBM", " " + get_stat_name( element.first ), " <num>",
5436 iteminfo::no_newline, static_cast<double>( element.second ) );
5437 }
5438 }
5439
5440 const units::mass weight_bonus = bid->weight_capacity_bonus;
5441 const float weight_modif = bid->weight_capacity_modifier;
5442 if( weight_modif != 1 ) {
5443 std::string modifier;
5444 if( weight_modif < 1 ) {
5445 modifier = "<num><bad>x</bad>";
5446 } else {
5447 modifier = "<num><color_light_green>x</color>";
5448 }
5449 info.emplace_back( "CBM",
5450 _( "<bold>Weight capacity modifier</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Weight capacity modifier</bold>: "
) ) ), modifier,
5451 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
5452 weight_modif );
5453 }
5454 if( weight_bonus != 0_gram ) {
5455 std::string bonus;
5456 if( weight_bonus < 0_gram ) {
5457 bonus = string_format( "<num> <bad>%s</bad>", weight_units() );
5458 } else {
5459 bonus = string_format( "<num> <color_light_green>%s</color>", weight_units() );
5460 }
5461 info.emplace_back( "CBM", _( "<bold>Weight capacity bonus</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Weight capacity bonus</bold>: "
) ) ), bonus,
5462 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
5463 convert_weight( weight_bonus ) );
5464 }
5465}
5466
5467void item::melee_combat_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
5468 int /*batch*/,
5469 bool /*debug*/ ) const
5470{
5471 const std::string space = " ";
5472
5473 std::map<damage_type_id, int> dmg_types;
5474 for( const damage_type &dt : damage_type::get_all() ) {
5475 if( dt.physical && dt.melee_only ) {
5476 int val = damage_melee( dt.id );
5477 if( val ) {
5478 dmg_types.emplace( dt.id, val );
5479 }
5480 }
5481 }
5482
5483 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
5484 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_DAMAGE ) ) {
5485 insert_separation_line( info );
5486 std::string sep;
5487 if( !dmg_types.empty() ) {
5488 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "<bold>Melee damage</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Melee damage</bold>: "
) ) ), "", iteminfo::no_newline );
5489 }
5490 for( const auto &dmg_type : dmg_types ) {
5491 if( !dmg_type.first->melee_only ) {
5492 continue;
5493 }
5494 info.emplace_back( "BASE", sep + uppercase_first_letter( dmg_type.first->name.translated() ) + ": ",
5495 "", iteminfo::no_newline, dmg_type.second );
5496 sep = space;
5497 }
5498 }
5499
5500 if( !dmg_types.empty() ) {
5501 int stam = 0;
5502 float stam_pct = 0.0f;
5503 std::map<std::string, double> dps_data;
5504
5505 bool base_tohit = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_TOHIT );
5506 bool base_moves = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_MOVES );
5507 bool base_dps = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_DPS );
5508 bool base_stamina = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_STAMINA );
5509 bool base_dpstam = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_DPSTAM );
5510
5511 if( base_stamina || base_dpstam ) {
5512 stam = player_character.get_total_melee_stamina_cost( this ) * -1;
5513 stam_pct = std::truncf( stam * 1000.0 / player_character.get_stamina_max() ) / 10;
5514 }
5515
5516 if( base_dps || base_dpstam ) {
5517 dps_data = dps( true, false );
5518 }
5519
5520 if( base_tohit ) {
5521 info.emplace_back( "BASE", space + _( "To-hit bonus: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "To-hit bonus: " ) ) ), "",
5522 iteminfo::show_plus, type->m_to_hit );
5523 }
5524
5525 if( base_moves ) {
5526 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Base moves per attack: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Base moves per attack: " ) )
), "",
5527 iteminfo::lower_is_better, attack_time( player_character ) );
5528 }
5529
5530 if( base_dps ) {
5531 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Typical damage per second:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Typical damage per second:" )
) ), "" );
5532 std::string sep;
5533 for( const std::pair<const std::string, double> &dps_entry : dps_data ) {
5534 info.emplace_back( "BASE", sep + dps_entry.first + ": ", "",
5535 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
5536 dps_entry.second );
5537 sep = space;
5538 }
5539 info.emplace_back( "BASE", "" );
5540 }
5541
5542 if( base_stamina ) {
5543 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "<bold>Stamina use</bold>: Costs " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Stamina use</bold>: Costs "
) ) ), "", iteminfo::no_newline );
5544 info.emplace_back( "BASE", ( stam_pct ? _( "about " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "about " ) ) ) : _( "less than " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "less than " ) ) ) ), "",
5545 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
5546 ( stam_pct > 0.1 ? stam_pct : 0.1 ) );
5547 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "% stamina to swing." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "% stamina to swing." ) ) ), "" );
5548 }
5549
5550 if( base_dpstam ) {
5551 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Typical damage per stamina:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Typical damage per stamina:"
) ) ), "" );
5552 std::string sep;
5553 for( const std::pair<const std::string, double> &dps_entry : dps_data ) {
5554 info.emplace_back( "BASE", sep + dps_entry.first + ": ", "",
5555 iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
5556 100 * dps_entry.second / stam );
5557 sep = space;
5558 }
5559 info.emplace_back( "BASE", "" );
5560 }
5561 }
5562
5563 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_TECHNIQUES ) ) {
5564 std::set<matec_id> all_techniques = type->techniques;
5565 all_techniques.insert( techniques.begin(), techniques.end() );
5566
5567 if( !all_techniques.empty() ) {
5568 const std::vector<matec_id> all_tec_sorted = sorted_lex( all_techniques );
5569 insert_separation_line( info );
5570 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Techniques when wielded</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Techniques when wielded</bold>: "
) ) ) +
5571 enumerate_as_string( all_tec_sorted, []( const matec_id & tid ) {
5572 return string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>: <info>%s</info> <info>%s</info>", tid.obj().name,
5573 tid.obj().description, tid.obj().condition_desc );
5574 } ) );
5575 }
5576 }
5577
5578 // display which martial arts styles character can use with this weapon
5579 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_APPLICABLEMARTIALARTS ) ) {
5580 const std::string valid_styles = player_character.martial_arts_data->enumerate_known_styles(
5581 typeId() );
5582 if( !valid_styles.empty() ) {
5583 insert_separation_line( info );
5584 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5585 _( "You know how to use this with these martial arts "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You know how to use this with these martial arts "
"styles: " ) ) )
5586 "styles: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You know how to use this with these martial arts "
"styles: " ) ) ) + valid_styles );
5587 }
5588 }
5589
5590 if( !is_gunmod() && has_flag( flag_REACH_ATTACK ) &&
5591 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUNMOD_ADDREACHATTACK ) ) {
5592 insert_separation_line( info );
5593 if( has_flag( flag_REACH3 ) ) {
5594 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5595 _( "* This item can be used to make <stat>long reach "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item can be used to make <stat>long reach "
"attacks</stat>." ) ) )
5596 "attacks</stat>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item can be used to make <stat>long reach "
"attacks</stat>." ) ) ) );
5597 } else {
5598 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5599 _( "* This item can be used to make <stat>reach "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item can be used to make <stat>reach "
"attacks</stat>." ) ) )
5600 "attacks</stat>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item can be used to make <stat>reach "
"attacks</stat>." ) ) ) );
5601 }
5602 }
5603
5604 ///\EFFECT_MELEE >2 allows seeing melee damage stats on weapons
5605 if( ( player_character.get_skill_level( skill_melee ) >= 3 &&
5606 ( !dmg_types.empty() || type->m_to_hit > 0 ) ) || debug_mode ) {
5607 bodypart_id bp = bodypart_id( "torso" );
5608 damage_instance non_crit;
5609 player_character.roll_all_damage( false, non_crit, true, *this, "WEAPON", nullptr, bp );
5610 damage_instance crit;
5611 player_character.roll_all_damage( true, crit, true, *this, "WEAPON", nullptr, bp );
5612 int attack_cost = player_character.attack_speed( *this );
5613 insert_separation_line( info );
5614 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MELEEDMG ) ) {
5615 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Average melee damage</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Average melee damage</bold>:"
) ) ) );
5616 }
5617 // Chance of critical hit
5618 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MELEEDMG_CRIT ) ) {
5619 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5620 string_format( _( "Critical hit chance <neutral>%d%% - %d%%</neutral>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Critical hit chance <neutral>%d%% - %d%%</neutral>"
) ) ),
5621 static_cast<int>( player_character.crit_chance( 0, 100, *this ) *
5622 100 ),
5623 static_cast<int>( player_character.crit_chance( 100, 0, *this ) *
5624 100 ) ) );
5625 }
5626 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MELEEDMG_TYPES ) ) {
5627 for( const damage_info_order &dio : damage_info_order::get_all(
5628 damage_info_order::info_type::MELEE ) ) {
5629 // NOTE: Using "BASE" instead of "DESCRIPTION", so numerical formatting will work
5630 // (output.cpp:format_item_info does not interpolate <num> for DESCRIPTION info)
5631 info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( "%s: ", uppercase_first_letter( dio.verb.translated() ) ),
5632 "<num>", iteminfo::no_newline, non_crit.type_damage( dio.dmg_type ) );
5633 //~ Label used in the melee damage section in the item info screen (ex: " Critical bash: ")
5634 //~ %1$s = a prepended space, %2$s = the name of the damage type (bash, cut, pierce, etc.)
5635 info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "%1$sCritical %2$s: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$sCritical %2$s: " ) ) ), space,
5636 dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ),
5637 "<num>", iteminfo::no_flags, crit.type_damage( dio.dmg_type ) );
5638 }
5639 }
5640 // Moves
5641 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MELEEDMG_MOVES ) ) {
5642 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Adjusted moves per attack: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Adjusted moves per attack: "
) ) ), "<num>",
5643 iteminfo::lower_is_better, attack_cost );
5644 }
5645 insert_separation_line( info );
5646 } else if( player_character.get_skill_level( skill_melee ) < 3 &&
5647 ( !dmg_types.empty() || type->m_to_hit > 0 ) ) {
5648 insert_separation_line( info );
5649 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MELEEDMG ) ) {
5650 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Average melee damage</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Average melee damage</bold>:"
) ) ) );
5651 info.emplace_back( "BASE",
5652 _( "You don't know enough about fighting to know how effectively you could use this." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You don't know enough about fighting to know how effectively you could use this."
) ) ) );
5653 }
5654 }
5655}
5656
5657void item::contents_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch,
5658 bool /*debug*/ ) const
5659{
5660 if( ( toolmods().empty() && gunmods().empty() && contents.empty() ) ||
5661 !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_CONTENTS ) ) {
5662 return;
5663 }
5664 const std::string space = " ";
5665
5666 for( const item *mod : is_gun() ? gunmods() : toolmods() ) {
5667 // mod_str = "(Integrated) Mod: %mod_name% (%mod_location%) "
5668 std::string mod_str;
5669 if( mod->is_irremovable() ) {
5670 mod_str = _( "Integrated mod: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Integrated mod: " ) ) );
5671 } else {
5672 mod_str = _( "Mod: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Mod: " ) ) );
5673 }
5674 mod_str += string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>", mod->tname() );
5675 if( mod->type->gunmod ) {
5676 mod_str += string_format( " (%s) ", mod->type->gunmod->location.name() );
5677 }
5678 insert_separation_line( info );
5679 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", mod_str );
5680 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", mod->type->description.translated() );
5681 }
5682 bool contents_header = false;
5683 for( const item *contents_item : contents.all_items_top() ) {
5684 if( !contents_header ) {
5685 insert_separation_line( info );
5686 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Contents of this item</bold>:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Contents of this item</bold>:"
) ) ) );
5687 contents_header = true;
5688 } else {
5689 // Separate items with a blank line
5690 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", space );
5691 }
5692
5693 const translation &description = contents_item->type->description;
5694
5695 if( contents_item->made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
5696 units::volume contents_volume = contents_item->volume() * batch;
5697 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", colorize( contents_item->display_name(),
5698 contents_item->color_in_inventory() ) );
5699 info.emplace_back( vol_to_info( "CONTAINER", description + space, contents_volume ) );
5700 } else {
5701 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", colorize( contents_item->display_name(),
5702 contents_item->color_in_inventory() ) );
5703 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", description.translated() );
5704 }
5705 }
5706}
5707
5708void item::properties_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch,
5709 bool debug ) const
5710{
5711 if( is_null() ) {
5712 return;
5713 }
5714
5715 insert_separation_line( info );
5716
5717 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_RIGIDITY ) ) {
5718 bool not_rigid = false;
5719 if( const islot_armor *t = find_armor_data() ) {
5720 bool any_encumb_increase = std::any_of( t->data.begin(), t->data.end(),
5721 []( const armor_portion_data & data ) {
5722 return data.encumber != data.max_encumber;
5723 } );
5724 if( any_encumb_increase ) {
5725 info.emplace_back( "BASE",
5726 _( "* This items pockets are <info>not rigid</info>. Its"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This items pockets are <info>not rigid</info>. Its"
" volume and encumbrance increase with contents." ) ) )
5727 " volume and encumbrance increase with contents." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This items pockets are <info>not rigid</info>. Its"
" volume and encumbrance increase with contents." ) ) ) );
5728 not_rigid = true;
5729 }
5730 }
5731 if( !not_rigid && !all_pockets_rigid() && !is_corpse() ) {
5732 info.emplace_back( "BASE",
5733 _( "* This items pockets are <info>not rigid</info>. Its"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This items pockets are <info>not rigid</info>. Its"
" volume increases with contents." ) ) )
5734 " volume increases with contents." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This items pockets are <info>not rigid</info>. Its"
" volume increases with contents." ) ) ) );
5735 }
5736 }
5737
5738 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_CONDUCTIVITY ) ) {
5739 if( !conductive() ) {
5740 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "* This item <good>does not "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item <good>does not "
"conduct</good> electricity." ) ) )
5741 "conduct</good> electricity." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item <good>does not "
"conduct</good> electricity." ) ) ) );
5742 } else if( has_flag( flag_CONDUCTIVE ) ) {
5743 info.emplace_back( "BASE",
5744 _( "* This item effectively <bad>conducts</bad> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item effectively <bad>conducts</bad> "
"electricity, as it has no guard." ) ) )
5745 "electricity, as it has no guard." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item effectively <bad>conducts</bad> "
"electricity, as it has no guard." ) ) ) );
5746 } else {
5747 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "* This item <bad>conducts</bad> electricity." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item <bad>conducts</bad> electricity."
) ) ) );
5748 }
5749 }
5750
5751 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS ) ) {
5752 // concatenate base and acquired flags...
5753 cata::flat_set<flag_id> flags;
5754 flags.insert( get_flags().begin(), get_flags().end() );
5755 flags.insert( type->get_flags().begin(), type->get_flags().end() );
5756 flags.insert( inherited_tags_cache.begin(), inherited_tags_cache.end() );
5757
5758 // ...and display those which have an info description
5759 for( const flag_id &e : sorted_lex( flags ) ) {
5760 const json_flag &f = e.obj();
5761 if( !f.info().empty() ) {
5762 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "* %s", f.info() ) );
5763 }
5764 }
5765 }
5766
5767 armor_fit_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
5768
5769 if( ethereal ) {
5770 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5771 _( "This item disappears as soon as its timer runs out, unless it is permanent or a comestible." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item disappears as soon as its timer runs out, unless it is permanent or a comestible."
) ) ) );
5772 }
5773
5774 if( has_flag( flag_RADIO_ACTIVATION ) &&
5775 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RADIO_ACTIVATION ) ) {
5776 if( has_flag( flag_RADIO_MOD ) ) {
5777 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5778 _( "* This item has been modified to listen to <info>radio "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item has been modified to listen to <info>radio "
"signals</info>. It can still be activated manually."
) ) )
5779 "signals</info>. It can still be activated manually." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item has been modified to listen to <info>radio "
"signals</info>. It can still be activated manually."
) ) ) );
5780 } else {
5781 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5782 _( "* This item can only be activated by a <info>radio "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item can only be activated by a <info>radio "
"signal</info>." ) ) )
5783 "signal</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item can only be activated by a <info>radio "
"signal</info>." ) ) ) );
5784 }
5785
5786 std::string signame;
5787 if( has_flag( flag_RADIOSIGNAL_1 ) ) {
5788 signame = _( "<color_c_red>red</color> radio signal" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_c_red>red</color> radio signal"
) ) );
5789 } else if( has_flag( flag_RADIOSIGNAL_2 ) ) {
5790 signame = _( "<color_c_blue>blue</color> radio signal" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_c_blue>blue</color> radio signal"
) ) );
5791 } else if( has_flag( flag_RADIOSIGNAL_3 ) ) {
5792 signame = _( "<color_c_green>green</color> radio signal" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_c_green>green</color> radio signal"
) ) );
5793 }
5794 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RADIO_ACTIVATION_CHANNEL ) ) {
5795 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5796 string_format( _( "* It will be activated by the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* It will be activated by the %s."
) ) ),
5797 signame ) );
5798 }
5799
5800 if( has_flag( flag_BOMB ) && has_flag( flag_RADIO_INVOKE_PROC ) &&
5801 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RADIO_ACTIVATION_PROC ) ) {
5802 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5803 _( "* Activating this item with a <info>radio signal</info> will "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* Activating this item with a <info>radio signal</info> will "
"<neutral>detonate</neutral> it immediately." ) )
)
5804 "<neutral>detonate</neutral> it immediately." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* Activating this item with a <info>radio signal</info> will "
"<neutral>detonate</neutral> it immediately." ) )
) );
5805 }
5806 }
5807
5808 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_DIE ) && this->get_var( "die_num_sides", 0 ) != 0 ) {
5809 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5810 string_format( _( "* This item can be used as a <info>die</info>, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item can be used as a <info>die</info>, "
"and has <info>%d</info> sides." ) ) )
5811 "and has <info>%d</info> sides." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item can be used as a <info>die</info>, "
"and has <info>%d</info> sides." ) ) ),
5812 static_cast<int>( this->get_var( "die_num_sides",
5813 0 ) ) ) );
5814 }
5815
5816}
5817
5818void item::final_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch,
5819 bool /* debug */ ) const
5820{
5821 if( is_null() ) {
5822 return;
5823 }
5824
5825 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
5826
5827 if( has_flag( flag_LEAK_DAM ) && has_flag( flag_RADIOACTIVE ) && damage() > 0
5828 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RADIOACTIVITY_DAMAGED ) ) {
5829 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5830 _( "* The casing of this item has <neutral>cracked</neutral>, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* The casing of this item has <neutral>cracked</neutral>, "
"revealing an <info>ominous green glow</info>." )
) )
5831 "revealing an <info>ominous green glow</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* The casing of this item has <neutral>cracked</neutral>, "
"revealing an <info>ominous green glow</info>." )
) ) );
5832 }
5833
5834 if( has_flag( flag_LEAK_ALWAYS ) && has_flag( flag_RADIOACTIVE ) &&
5835 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RADIOACTIVITY_ALWAYS ) ) {
5836 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5837 _( "* This object is <neutral>surrounded</neutral> by a "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This object is <neutral>surrounded</neutral> by a "
"<info>sickly green glow</info>." ) ) )
5838 "<info>sickly green glow</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This object is <neutral>surrounded</neutral> by a "
"<info>sickly green glow</info>." ) ) ) );
5839 }
5840
5841 if( type->milling_data && !type->milling_data->into_.is_null() ) {
5842 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MILLEABLE ) ) {
5843
5844 const islot_milling &mdata = *type->milling_data;
5845 const recipe rec = *mdata.recipe_;
5846
5847 if( rec.is_null() ) {
5848 debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s." ),realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "5849", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, ( ( []( const auto & arg )
{ static auto cache = detail::get_local_translation_cache( arg
); return cache( arg ); } )( translation_argument_identity( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s."
) ) ), this->tname( 1, false ))
5849 this->tname( 1, false ) )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "5849", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, ( ( []( const auto & arg )
{ static auto cache = detail::get_local_translation_cache( arg
