); return cache( arg ); } )( translation_argument_identity( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s."
) ) ), this->tname( 1, false ));
5850 } else {
5851 const int product_size = rec.makes_amount();
5852 const requirement_data::alter_item_comp_vector &components =
5853 rec.simple_requirements().get_components();
5854 int lot_size = 0;
5855
5856 // Making the assumption that milling only uses a single type of input product. Support for mixed products would require additional logic.
5857 // We also make the assumption that this is the only relevant input, so if lubricants etc. was to be added more logic would be needed.
5858 for( const std::vector<item_comp> &component : components ) {
5859 for( const item_comp &comp : component ) {
5860 if( comp.type == this->typeId() ) {
5861 lot_size = comp.count;
5862 break;
5863 }
5864 }
5865
5866 if( lot_size > 0 ) {
5867 break;
5868 }
5869 }
5870
5871 if( lot_size == 0 ) {
5872 debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s. It can't be milled." ),realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "5873", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, ( ( []( const auto & arg )
{ static auto cache = detail::get_local_translation_cache( arg
); return cache( arg ); } )( translation_argument_identity( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s. It can't be milled."
) ) ), this->display_name().c_str())
5873 this->display_name().c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "5873", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, ( ( []( const auto & arg )
{ static auto cache = detail::get_local_translation_cache( arg
); return cache( arg ); } )( translation_argument_identity( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s. It can't be milled."
) ) ), this->display_name().c_str());
5874 } else {
5875 std::string rate_info = string_format(
5876 _( "* <neutral>%d %s</neutral> can be turned into <neutral>%d %s</neutral>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* <neutral>%d %s</neutral> can be turned into <neutral>%d %s</neutral>."
) ) ),
5877 lot_size,
5878 type->nname( lot_size ), product_size,
5879 mdata.into_->nname( product_size ) );
5880
5881 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5882 string_format( _( "* This item can be <info>milled</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* This item can be <info>milled</info>."
) ) ) ) );
5883 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", rate_info );
5884 }
5885 }
5886 }
5887 }
5888
5889 if( is_brewable() ) {
5890 const item &brewed = *this;
5891 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BREWABLE_DURATION ) ) {
5892 const time_duration btime = brewed.brewing_time();
5893 int btime_i = to_days<int>( btime );
5894 if( btime <= 2_days ) {
5895 btime_i = to_hours<int>( btime );
5896 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5897 string_format( n_gettext( "* Once set in a vat, this "
5898 "will ferment in around %d hour.",
5899 "* Once set in a vat, this will ferment in "
5900 "around %d hours.", btime_i ), btime_i ) );
5901 } else {
5902 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5903 string_format( n_gettext( "* Once set in a vat, this "
5904 "will ferment in around %d day.",
5905 "* Once set in a vat, this will ferment in "
5906 "around %d days.", btime_i ), btime_i ) );
5907 }
5908 }
5909 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BREWABLE_PRODUCTS ) ) {
5910 for( const std::pair<const itype_id, int> &res : brewed.brewing_results() ) {
5911 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5912 string_format( _( "* Fermenting this will produce "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* Fermenting this will produce "
"<neutral>%s</neutral>." ) ) )
5913 "<neutral>%s</neutral>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* Fermenting this will produce "
"<neutral>%s</neutral>." ) ) ),
5914 res.first->nname( res.second ) ) );
5915 }
5916 }
5917 }
5918
5919 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FAULTS ) ) {
5920 for( const fault_id &e : faults ) {
5921 //~ %1$s is the name of a fault and %2$s is the description of the fault
5922 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "* <bad>%1$s</bad>. %2$s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* <bad>%1$s</bad>. %2$s"
) ) ),
5923 e.obj().name(), e.obj().description() ) );
5924 }
5925 }
5926
5927 // does the item fit in any holsters?
5928 std::vector<const itype *> holsters = Item_factory::find( [this]( const itype & e ) {
5929 if( !e.can_use( "holster" ) ) {
5930 return false;
5931 }
5932 const holster_actor *ptr = dynamic_cast<const holster_actor *>
5933 ( e.get_use( "holster" )->get_actor_ptr() );
5934 const item holster_item( &e );
5935 return ptr->can_holster( holster_item, *this ) && !item_is_blacklisted( holster_item.typeId() );
5936 } );
5937
5938 if( !holsters.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_HOLSTERS ) ) {
5939 insert_separation_line( info );
5940 std::vector<std::string> holsters_str;
5941 holsters_str.reserve( holsters.size() );
5942 for( const itype *e : holsters ) {
5943 holsters_str.emplace_back( player_character.is_wearing( e->get_id() )
5944 ? string_format( "<good>%s</good>", e->nname( 1 ) )
5945 : e->nname( 1 ) );
5946 }
5947 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Can be stored in</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Can be stored in</bold>: "
) ) ) +
5948 enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( holsters_str, 30 ) );
5949 info.back().sName += ".";
5950 }
5951
5952 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_ACTIVATABLE_TRANSFORMATION ) ) {
5953 insert_separation_line( info );
5954 for( const auto &u : type->use_methods ) {
5955 const delayed_transform_iuse *tt = dynamic_cast<const delayed_transform_iuse *>
5956 ( u.second.get_actor_ptr() );
5957 if( tt == nullptr ) {
5958 continue;
5959 }
5960 const int time_to_do = tt->time_to_do( *this );
5961 if( time_to_do <= 0 ) {
5962 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5963 _( "It's done and <info>can be activated</info>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's done and <info>can be activated</info>."
) ) ) );
5964 } else {
5965 const std::string time = to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_turns( time_to_do ) );
5966 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5967 string_format( _( "It will be done in %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It will be done in %s." ) ) ),
5968 time.c_str() ) );
5969 }
5970 }
5971 }
5972
5973 std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator item_note = item_vars.find( "item_note" );
5974
5975 if( item_note != item_vars.end() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_NOTES ) ) {
5976 insert_separation_line( info );
5977 std::string ntext;
5978 std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator item_note_tool =
5979 item_vars.find( "item_note_tool" );
5980 const use_function *use_func =
5981 item_note_tool != item_vars.end() ?
5982 item_controller->find_template(
5983 itype_id( item_note_tool->second ) )->get_use( "inscribe" ) :
5984 nullptr;
5985 const inscribe_actor *use_actor =
5986 use_func ? dynamic_cast<const inscribe_actor *>( use_func->get_actor_ptr() ) : nullptr;
5987 if( use_actor ) {
5988 //~ %1$s: gerund (e.g. carved), %2$s: item name, %3$s: inscription text
5989 ntext = string_format( pgettext( "carving", "%1$s on the %2$s is: %3$s" ),
5990 use_actor->gerund, tname(), item_note->second );
5991 } else {
5992 //~ %1$s: inscription text
5993 ntext = string_format( pgettext( "carving", "Note: %1$s" ), item_note->second );
5994 }
5995 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", ntext );
5996 }
5997
5998 // Price and barter value
5999 const int price_preapoc = price( false ) * batch;
6000 const int price_postapoc = price( true ) * batch;
6001 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_PRICE ) ) {
6002 insert_separation_line( info );
6003 info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Price: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Price: " ) ) ), _( "$<num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "$<num>" ) ) ),
6004 iteminfo::is_decimal | iteminfo::no_newline,
6005 static_cast<double>( price_preapoc ) / 100 );
6006 }
6007 if( price_preapoc != price_postapoc && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_BARTER ) ) {
6008 const std::string space = " ";
6009 info.emplace_back( "BASE", space + _( "Barter value: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Barter value: " ) ) ), _( "$<num>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "$<num>" ) ) ),
6010 iteminfo::is_decimal,
6011 static_cast<double>( price_postapoc ) / 100 );
6012 }
6013
6014 // Recipes using this item as an ingredient
6015 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_APPLICABLE_RECIPES ) ) {
6016 // with the inventory display allowing you to select items, showing the things you could make with contained items could be confusing.
6017 const itype_id &tid = typeId();
6018 const inventory &crafting_inv = player_character.crafting_inventory();
6019 const recipe_subset available_recipe_subset = player_character.get_available_recipes(
6020 crafting_inv );
6021 const std::set<const recipe *> &item_recipes = available_recipe_subset.of_component( tid );
6022
6023 insert_separation_line( info );
6024 if( item_recipes.empty() ) {
6025 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "You know of nothing you could craft with it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You know of nothing you could craft with it."
) ) ) );
6026 } else {
6027 std::vector<std::string> crafts;
6028 for( const recipe *r : item_recipes ) {
6029 const bool can_make = r->deduped_requirements()
6030 .can_make_with_inventory( crafting_inv, r->get_component_filter() );
6031
6032 // Endarken recipes that can't be constructed with the survivor's inventory
6033 const std::string name = r->result_name( /* decorated = */ true );
6034 crafts.emplace_back( can_make ? name : string_format( "<dark>%s</dark>", name ) );
6035 }
6036 const std::string recipes = enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( crafts, 15 );
6037 info.emplace_back( " DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "You could use it to craft: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You could use it to craft: %s"
) ) ), recipes ) );
6038 }
6039 }
6040
6041 if( is_armor() ) {
6042 const ret_val<void> can_wear = player_character.can_wear( *this, true );
6043 if( !can_wear.success() ) {
6044 insert_separation_line( info );
6045 // can_wear returns a translated string
6046 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "<bad>%s</bad>", can_wear.str() ) );
6047 }
6048 }
6049
6050 // Vehicle parts or appliances using this item as a component
6051 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_VEHICLE_PARTS ) ) {
6052 const itype_id tid = typeId();
6053 std::vector<vpart_info> vparts;
6054
6055 for( const vpart_info &vpi : vehicles::parts::get_all() ) {
6056 if( vpi.base_item == tid ) {
6057 vparts.push_back( vpi );
6058 }
6059 }
6060
6061 const auto print_parts = [&info, &player_character](
6062 const std::vector<vpart_info> &vparts,
6063 const std::string_view install_where,
6064 const std::function<bool( const vpart_info & )> &predicate
6065 ) {
6066 std::vector<std::string> result_parts;
6067 for( const vpart_info &vp : vparts ) {
6068 const bool is_duplicate = std::any_of( result_parts.begin(), result_parts.end(),
6069 [name = vp.name()]( const std::string & r ) {
6070 return r == name;
6071 } );
6072
6073 if( is_duplicate || !predicate( vp ) ) {
6074 continue; // skip part variants, they have same part names
6075 }
6076
6077 const bool can_install = player_character.meets_skill_requirements( vp.install_skills );
6078 const std::string name = vp.name();
6079
6080 // Endarken parts that can't be installed with the character's skills
6081 result_parts.emplace_back( can_install ? name : string_format( "<dark>%s</dark>", name ) );
6082 }
6083
6084 if( result_parts.empty() ) {
6085 return;
6086 }
6087
6088 const std::string installable_parts = enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( result_parts, 15 );
6089
6090 insert_separation_line( info );
6091 info.emplace_back( " DESCRIPTION", string_format( install_where, installable_parts ) );
6092 };
6093
6094 print_parts( vparts, _( "You could install it in a vehicle: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You could install it in a vehicle: %s"
) ) ),
6095 []( const vpart_info & vp ) {
6096 return !vp.has_flag( vpart_bitflags::VPFLAG_APPLIANCE );
6097 } );
6098
6099 print_parts( vparts, _( "You could install it as an appliance: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You could install it as an appliance: %s"
) ) ),
6100 []( const vpart_info & vp ) {
6101 return vp.has_flag( vpart_bitflags::VPFLAG_APPLIANCE );
6102 } );
6103 }
6104}
6105
6106void item::ascii_art_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query * /* parts */,
6107 int /* batch */,
6108 bool /* debug */ ) const
6109{
6110 if( is_null() ) {
6111 return;
6112 }
6113
6114 if( get_option<bool>( "ENABLE_ASCII_ART" ) ) {
6115 ascii_art_id art = type->picture_id;
6116 if( has_itype_variant() && itype_variant().art.is_valid() ) {
6117 art = itype_variant().art;
6118 }
6119 if( art.is_valid() ) {
6120 insert_separation_line( info );
6121 for( const std::string &line : art->picture ) {
6122 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", line );
6123 }
6124 }
6125 }
6126}
6127
6128std::string item::info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch ) const
6129{
6130 const bool debug = g != nullptr && debug_mode;
6131
6132 if( parts == nullptr ) {
6133 parts = &iteminfo_query::all;
6134 }
6135
6136 info.clear();
6137
6138 if( !is_null() ) {
6139 basic_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6140 debug_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6141 }
6142
6143 // Different items might want to present the info blocks in different order, depending on what
6144 // they consider more relevant.
6145 std::vector<std::string> all_info_blocks = {"big_block_of_stuff", "contents", "melee_combat_info", "footer"};
6146 std::vector<std::string> prio_info_blocks = { };
6147 item_category_id my_cat_id = get_category_shallow().id;
6148 if( is_maybe_melee_weapon() ) {
6149 prio_info_blocks.emplace_back( "melee_combat_info" );
6150 } else if( my_cat_id == item_category_container ) {
6151 prio_info_blocks.emplace_back( "contents" );
6152 }
6153 std::vector<std::string> info_block_ordered = prio_info_blocks;
6154 for( const std::string &blockname : all_info_blocks ) {
6155 if( std::find( info_block_ordered.begin(), info_block_ordered.end(),
6156 blockname ) == info_block_ordered.end() ) {
6157 info_block_ordered.push_back( blockname );
6158 }
6159 }
6160
6161 for( const auto &blockname : info_block_ordered ) {
6162 if( blockname == "melee_combat_info" ) {
6163
6164 melee_combat_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6165
6166 } else if( blockname == "big_block_of_stuff" ) {
6167
6168 if( is_medication() ) {
6169 med_info( this, info, parts, batch, debug );
6170 }
6171
6172 if( is_food() ) {
6173 food_info( this, info, parts, batch, debug );
6174 }
6175
6176 magazine_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6177 ammo_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6178
6179 const item *gun = nullptr;
6180 if( is_gun() ) {
6181 gun = this;
6182 const gun_mode aux = gun_current_mode();
6183 // if we have an active auxiliary gunmod display stats for this instead
6184 if( aux && aux->is_gunmod() && aux->is_gun() &&
6185 parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_AUX_GUNMOD_HEADER ) ) {
6186 gun = &*aux;
6187 info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
6188 string_format( _( "Stats of the active <info>gunmod (%s)</info> "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stats of the active <info>gunmod (%s)</info> "
"are shown." ) ) )
6189 "are shown." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stats of the active <info>gunmod (%s)</info> "
"are shown." ) ) ), gun->tname() ) );
6190 }
6191 }
6192 if( gun != nullptr ) {
6193 gun_info( gun, info, parts, batch, debug );
6194 }
6195
6196 gunmod_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6197 armor_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6198 animal_armor_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6199 book_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6200 battery_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6201 tool_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6202 actions_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6203 component_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6204 qualities_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6205
6206 // Uses for item (bandaging quality, holster capacity, grenade activation)
6207 if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_USE_METHODS ) ) {
6208 for( const std::pair<const std::string, use_function> &method : type->use_methods ) {
6209 insert_separation_line( info );
6210 method.second.dump_info( *this, info );
6211 }
6212 }
6213
6214 repair_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6215 enchantment_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6216 disassembly_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6217 properties_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6218 bionic_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6219
6220 } else if( blockname == "contents" ) {
6221
6222 contents.info( info, parts );
6223 contents_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6224
6225 } else if( blockname == "footer" ) {
6226
6227 final_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6228 ascii_art_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6229
6230 } else {
6231
6232 debugmsg( "Trying to show info block named %s which is not valid.", blockname )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "6232", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Trying to show info block named %s which is not valid."
, blockname);
6233
6234 }
6235 }
6236
6237 if( !info.empty() && info.back().sName == "--" ) {
6238 info.pop_back();
6239 }
6240
6241 return format_item_info( info, {} );
6242}
6243
6244std::map<gunmod_location, int> item::get_mod_locations() const
6245{
6246 std::map<gunmod_location, int> mod_locations = type->gun->valid_mod_locations;
6247
6248 for( const item *mod : gunmods() ) {
6249 if( !mod->type->gunmod->add_mod.empty() ) {
6250 std::map<gunmod_location, int> add_locations = mod->type->gunmod->add_mod;
6251
6252 for( const std::pair<const gunmod_location, int> &add_location : add_locations ) {
6253 mod_locations[add_location.first] += add_location.second;
6254 }
6255 }
6256 }
6257
6258 return mod_locations;
6259}
6260
6261int item::get_free_mod_locations( const gunmod_location &location ) const
6262{
6263 if( !is_gun() ) {
6264 return 0;
6265 }
6266
6267 std::map<gunmod_location, int> mod_locations = get_mod_locations();
6268
6269 const auto loc = mod_locations.find( location );
6270 if( loc == mod_locations.end() ) {
6271 return 0;
6272 }
6273 int result = loc->second;
6274 for( const item *elem : contents.all_items_top( pocket_type::MOD ) ) {
6275 const cata::value_ptr<islot_gunmod> &mod = elem->type->gunmod;
6276 if( mod && mod->location == location ) {
6277 result--;
6278 }
6279 }
6280 return result;
6281}
6282
6283const std::string &item::symbol() const
6284{
6285 if( has_itype_variant() && _itype_variant->alt_sym ) {
6286 return *_itype_variant->alt_sym;
6287 }
6288 return type->sym;
6289}
6290
6291nc_color item::color_in_inventory( const Character *const ch ) const
6292{
6293 const Character &player_character = ch ? *ch : get_player_character();
6294
6295 // Only item not otherwise colored gets colored as favorite
6296 nc_color ret = is_favorite ? c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
6297 if( type->can_use( "learn_spell" ) ) {
6298 const use_function *iuse = get_use( "learn_spell" );
6299 const learn_spell_actor *actor_ptr =
6300 static_cast<const learn_spell_actor *>( iuse->get_actor_ptr() );
6301 for( const std::string &spell_id_str : actor_ptr->spells ) {
6302 const spell_id sp_id( spell_id_str );
6303 if( player_character.magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) &&
6304 !player_character.magic->get_spell( sp_id ).is_max_level( player_character ) ) {
6305 ret = c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
6306 }
6307 if( !player_character.magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) &&
6308 player_character.magic->can_learn_spell( player_character, sp_id ) ) {
6309 return c_light_blueget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_blue);
6310 }
6311 }
6312 } else if( has_flag( flag_WET ) ) {
6313 ret = c_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_cyan);
6314 } else if( has_flag( flag_LITCIG ) ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
6315 ret = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
6316 } else if( is_armor() && player_character.has_trait( trait_WOOLALLERGY ) &&
6317 ( made_of( material_wool ) || has_own_flag( flag_wooled ) ) ) {
6318 ret = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
6319 } else if( is_filthy() || has_own_flag( flag_DIRTY ) ) {
6320 ret = c_brownget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown);
6321 } else if( is_relic() && !has_flag( flag_MUNDANE ) ) {
6322 ret = c_pinkget_all_colors().get(def_c_pink);
6323 } else if( is_bionic() ) {
6324 if( player_character.is_installable( this, false ).success() &&
6325 ( !player_character.has_bionic( type->bionic->id ) || type->bionic->id->dupes_allowed ) ) {
6326 ret = player_character.bionic_installation_issues( type->bionic->id ).empty() ? c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) : c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
6327 } else if( !has_flag( flag_NO_STERILE ) ) {
6328 ret = c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
6329 }
6330 } else if( has_flag( flag_LEAK_DAM ) && has_flag( flag_RADIOACTIVE ) && damage() > 0 ) {
6331 ret = c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green);
6332 } else if( ( active && !has_temperature() ) || ( is_corpse() && can_revive() ) ) {
6333 // Active items show up as yellow (corpses only if reviving)
6334 ret = c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
6335 } else if( is_medication() || is_medical_tool() ) {
6336 ret = c_light_blueget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_blue);
6337 } else if( is_food() ) {
6338 // Give color priority to allergy (allergy > inedible by freeze or other conditions)
6339 // TODO: refactor u.will_eat to let this section handle coloring priority without duplicating code.
6340 if( player_character.allergy_type( *this ) != morale_null ) {
6341 return c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
6342 }
6343
6344 // Default: permafood, drugs
6345 // Brown: rotten (for non-saprophages) or non-rotten (for saprophages)
6346 // Dark gray: inedible
6347 // Red: morale penalty
6348 // Yellow: will rot soon
6349 // Cyan: edible
6350 // Light Cyan: will rot eventually
6351 const ret_val<edible_rating> rating = player_character.will_eat( *this );
6352 // TODO: More colors
6353 switch( rating.value() ) {
6354 case EDIBLE:
6355 case TOO_FULL:
6356 ret = c_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_cyan);
6357
6358 // Show old items as yellow
6359 if( is_going_bad() ) {
6360 ret = c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
6361 }
6362 // Show perishables as a separate color
6363 else if( goes_bad() ) {
6364 ret = c_light_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_cyan);
6365 }
6366
6367 break;
6368 case INEDIBLE:
6369 case INEDIBLE_MUTATION:
6370 ret = c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
6371 break;
6372 case ALLERGY:
6373 case ALLERGY_WEAK:
6374 case CANNIBALISM:
6375 case PARASITES:
6376 ret = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
6377 break;
6378 case ROTTEN:
6379 ret = c_brownget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown);
6380 break;
6381 case NAUSEA:
6382 ret = c_pinkget_all_colors().get(def_c_pink);
6383 break;
6384 case NO_TOOL:
6385 break;
6386 }
6387 } else if( is_gun() ) {
6388 // Guns are green if you are carrying ammo for them
6389 // ltred if you have ammo but no mags
6390 // Gun with integrated mag counts as both
6391 for( const ammotype &at : ammo_types() ) {
6392 // get_ammo finds uncontained ammo, find_ammo finds ammo in magazines
6393 bool has_ammo = !player_character.get_ammo( at ).empty() ||
6394 !player_character.find_ammo( *this, false, -1 ).empty();
6395 bool has_mag = magazine_integral() || !player_character.find_ammo( *this, true, -1 ).empty();
6396 if( has_ammo && has_mag ) {
6397 ret = c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green);
6398 break;
6399 } else if( has_ammo || has_mag ) {
6400 ret = c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red);
6401 break;
6402 }
6403 }
6404 } else if( is_ammo() ) {
6405 // Likewise, ammo is green if you have guns that use it
6406 // ltred if you have the gun but no mags
6407 // Gun with integrated mag counts as both
6408 bool has_gun = player_character.cache_has_item_with( "is_gun", &item::is_gun,
6409 [this]( const item & i ) {
6410 return i.ammo_types().count( ammo_type() );
6411 } );
6412 bool has_mag = player_character.cache_has_item_with( "is_gun", &item::is_gun,
6413 [this]( const item & i ) {
6414 return i.magazine_integral() && i.ammo_types().count( ammo_type() );
6415 } );
6416 has_mag = has_mag ? true :
6417 player_character.cache_has_item_with( "is_magazine", &item::is_magazine,
6418 [this]( const item & i ) {
6419 return i.ammo_types().count( ammo_type() );
6420 } );
6421
6422 if( has_gun && has_mag ) {
6423 ret = c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green);
6424 } else if( has_gun || has_mag ) {
6425 ret = c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red);
6426 }
6427 } else if( is_magazine() ) {
6428 // Magazines are green if you have guns and ammo for them
6429 // ltred if you have one but not the other
6430 bool has_gun = player_character.cache_has_item_with( "is_gun", &item::is_gun,
6431 [this]( const item & it ) {
6432 return it.magazine_compatible().count( typeId() ) > 0;
6433 } );
6434 bool has_ammo = !player_character.find_ammo( *this, false, -1 ).empty();
6435 if( has_gun && has_ammo ) {
6436 ret = c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green);
6437 } else if( has_gun || has_ammo ) {
6438 ret = c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red);
6439 }
6440 } else if( is_book() ) {
6441 const islot_book &tmp = *type->book;
6442 if( player_character.has_identified( typeId() ) ) {
6443 if( tmp.skill && // Book can improve skill: blue
6444 player_character.get_skill_level_object( tmp.skill ).can_train() &&
6445 player_character.get_knowledge_level( tmp.skill ) >= tmp.req &&
6446 player_character.get_knowledge_level( tmp.skill ) < tmp.level
6447 ) { //NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
6448 ret = c_light_blueget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_blue);
6449 } else if( type->can_use( "MA_MANUAL" ) &&
6450 !player_character.martial_arts_data->has_martialart( martial_art_learned_from( *type ) ) ) {
6451 ret = c_light_blueget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_blue);
6452 } else if( tmp.skill && // Book can't improve skill right now, but maybe later: pink
6453 player_character.get_skill_level_object( tmp.skill ).can_train() &&
6454 player_character.get_knowledge_level( tmp.skill ) < tmp.level ) {
6455 ret = c_pinkget_all_colors().get(def_c_pink);
6456 } else if( !player_character.studied_all_recipes(
6457 *type ) ) { // Book can't improve skill anymore, but has more recipes: yellow
6458 ret = c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
6459 }
6460 } else if( ( tmp.skill || type->can_use( "MA_MANUAL" ) ) ||
6461 !player_character.studied_all_recipes( *type ) ) {
6462 // Book can teach you something and hasn't been identified yet
6463 ret = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
6464 } else {
6465 // "just for fun" book that they haven't read yet
6466 ret = c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red);
6467 }
6468 }
6469 return ret;
6470}
6471
6472void item::on_wear( Character &p )
6473{
6474 if( is_sided() && get_side() == side::BOTH ) {
6475 if( has_flag( flag_SPLINT ) ) {
6476 set_side( side::LEFT );
6477 if( ( covers( bodypart_id( "leg_l" ) ) && p.is_limb_broken( bodypart_id( "leg_r" ) ) &&
6478 !p.worn_with_flag( flag_SPLINT, bodypart_id( "leg_r" ) ) ) ||
6479 ( covers( bodypart_id( "arm_l" ) ) && p.is_limb_broken( bodypart_id( "arm_r" ) ) &&
6480 !p.worn_with_flag( flag_SPLINT, bodypart_id( "arm_r" ) ) ) ) {
6481 set_side( side::RIGHT );
6482 }
6483 } else if( has_flag( flag_TOURNIQUET ) ) {
6484 set_side( side::LEFT );
6485 if( ( covers( bodypart_id( "leg_l" ) ) &&
6486 p.has_effect( effect_bleed, body_part_leg_r ) &&
6487 !p.worn_with_flag( flag_TOURNIQUET, bodypart_id( "leg_r" ) ) ) ||
6488 ( covers( bodypart_id( "arm_l" ) ) && p.has_effect( effect_bleed, body_part_arm_r ) &&
6489 !p.worn_with_flag( flag_TOURNIQUET, bodypart_id( "arm_r" ) ) ) ) {
6490 set_side( side::RIGHT );
6491 }
6492 } else {
6493 // for sided items wear the item on the side which results in least encumbrance
6494 int lhs = 0;
6495 int rhs = 0;
6496 set_side( side::LEFT );
6497 for( const bodypart_id &bp : p.get_all_body_parts() ) {
6498 lhs += p.get_part_encumbrance_data( bp ).encumbrance;
6499 }
6500
6501 set_side( side::RIGHT );
6502 for( const bodypart_id &bp : p.get_all_body_parts() ) {
6503 rhs += p.get_part_encumbrance_data( bp ).encumbrance;
6504 }
6505
6506 set_side( lhs <= rhs ? side::LEFT : side::RIGHT );
6507 }
6508 }
6509
6510 // if game is loaded - don't want ownership assigned during char creation
6511 if( get_player_character().getID().is_valid() ) {
6512 handle_pickup_ownership( p );
6513 }
6514 p.on_item_acquire( *this );
6515 p.on_item_wear( *this );
6516}
6517
6518void item::on_takeoff( Character &p )
6519{
6520 p.on_item_takeoff( *this );
6521
6522 if( is_sided() ) {
6523 set_side( side::BOTH );
6524 }
6525 // reset any pockets to not have restrictions
6526 if( is_ablative() ) {
6527 for( item_pocket *pocket : get_all_standard_pockets() ) {
6528 pocket->set_no_rigid( {} );
6529 }
6530 }
6531}
6532
6533int item::on_wield_cost( const Character &you ) const
6534{
6535 int mv = 0;
6536 // weapons with bayonet/bipod or other generic "unhandiness"
6537 if( has_flag( flag_SLOW_WIELD ) && !is_gunmod() ) {
6538 float d = 32.0f; // arbitrary linear scaling factor
6539 if( is_gun() ) {
6540 d /= std::max( you.get_skill_level( gun_skill() ), 1.0f );
6541 } else if( is_melee() ) {
6542 d /= std::max( you.get_skill_level( melee_skill() ), 1.0f );
6543 }
6544
6545 int penalty = get_var( "volume", volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor ) * d;
6546 mv += penalty;
6547 }
6548
6549 // firearms with a folding stock or tool/melee without collapse/retract iuse
6550 if( has_flag( flag_NEEDS_UNFOLD ) && !is_gunmod() ) {
6551 int penalty = 50; // 200-300 for guns, 50-150 for melee, 50 as fallback
6552 if( is_gun() ) {
6553 penalty = std::max( 0, 300 - static_cast<int>( you.get_skill_level( gun_skill() ) * 10 ) );
6554 } else if( is_melee() ) {
6555 penalty = std::max( 0, 150 - static_cast<int>( you.get_skill_level( melee_skill() ) * 10 ) );
6556 }
6557
6558 mv += penalty;
6559 }
6560 return mv;
6561}
6562
6563void item::on_wield( Character &you )
6564{
6565 int wield_cost = on_wield_cost( you );
6566 you.moves -= wield_cost;
6567
6568 std::string msg;
6569
6570 msg = _( "You wield your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You wield your %s." ) ) );
6571
6572 // if game is loaded - don't want ownership assigned during char creation
6573 if( get_player_character().getID().is_valid() ) {
6574 handle_pickup_ownership( you );
6575 }
6576 you.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, msg, tname() );
6577
6578 if( !you.martial_arts_data->selected_is_none() ) {
6579 you.martial_arts_data->martialart_use_message( you );
6580 }
6581
6582 // Update encumbrance and discomfort in case we were wearing it
6583 you.flag_encumbrance();
6584 you.calc_discomfort();
6585 you.on_item_acquire( *this );
6586}
6587
6588void item::handle_pickup_ownership( Character &c )
6589{
6590 if( is_owned_by( c ) ) {
6591 return;
6592 }
6593 // Add ownership to item if unowned
6594 if( owner.is_null() ) {
6595 set_owner( c );
6596 } else {
6597 if( !is_owned_by( c ) && c.is_avatar() ) {
6598 const auto sees_stealing = [&c, this]( const Creature & cr ) {
6599 const npc *const as_npc = cr.as_npc();
6600 const monster *const as_monster = cr.as_monster();
6601 bool owned_by = false;
6602 if( as_npc ) {
6603 owned_by = is_owned_by( *as_npc );
6604 } else if( as_monster ) {
6605 owned_by = is_owned_by( *as_monster );
6606 }
6607 return &cr != &c && owned_by && rl_dist( cr.pos(), c.pos() ) < MAX_VIEW_DISTANCE &&
6608 cr.sees( c.pos() );
6609 };
6610 const auto sort_criteria = []( const Creature * lhs, const Creature * rhs ) {
6611 const npc *const lnpc = lhs->as_npc();
6612 const npc *const rnpc = rhs->as_npc();
6613 if( !lnpc && !rnpc ) {
6614 const monster *const lmon = lhs->as_monster();
6615 const monster *const rmon = rhs->as_monster();
6616 // Sort more difficult monsters first
6617 return ( lmon ? lmon->type->difficulty : 0 ) > ( rmon ? rmon->type->difficulty : 0 );
6618 } else if( lnpc && !rnpc ) {
6619 return true;
6620 } else if( !lnpc && rnpc ) {
6621 return false;
6622 }
6623 return npc::theft_witness_compare( lnpc, rnpc );
6624 };
6625 std::vector<Creature *> witnesses = g->get_creatures_if( sees_stealing );
6626 std::sort( witnesses.begin(), witnesses.end(), sort_criteria );
6627 for( Creature *c : witnesses ) {
6628 const npc *const elem = c->as_npc();
6629 if( !elem ) {
6630 // Sorted to have NPCs first
6631 break;
6632 }
6633 elem->say( "<witnessed_thievery>", 7 );
6634 }
6635 if( !witnesses.empty() ) {
6636 set_old_owner( get_owner() );
6637 witnesses[0]->witness_thievery( this );
6638 }
6639 set_owner( c );
6640 }
6641 }
6642}
6643
6644void item::on_pickup( Character &p )
6645{
6646 // Fake characters are used to determine pickup weight and volume
6647 if( p.is_fake() ) {
6648 return;
6649 }
6650 // if game is loaded - don't want ownership assigned during char creation
6651 if( get_player_character().getID().is_valid() ) {
6652 handle_pickup_ownership( p );
6653 }
6654 contents.on_pickup( p, this );
6655
6656 p.flag_encumbrance();
6657 p.on_item_acquire( *this );
6658}
6659
6660void item::update_inherited_flags()
6661{
6662 inherited_tags_cache.clear();
6663
6664 auto const inehrit_flags = [this]( FlagsSetType const & Flags ) {
6665 for( flag_id const &f : Flags ) {
6666 if( f->inherit() ) {
6667 inherited_tags_cache.emplace( f );
6668 }
6669 }
6670 };
6671
6672 for( const item *e : is_gun() ? gunmods() : toolmods() ) {
6673 // gunmods fired separately do not contribute to base gun flags
6674 if( !e->is_gun() ) {
6675 inehrit_flags( e->get_flags() );
6676 inehrit_flags( e->type->get_flags() );
6677 }
6678 }
6679
6680 for( const item_pocket *pocket : contents.get_all_contained_pockets() ) {
6681 if( pocket->inherits_flags() ) {
6682 for( const item *e : pocket->all_items_top() ) {
6683 inehrit_flags( e->get_flags() );
6684 inehrit_flags( e->type->get_flags() );
6685 }
6686 }
6687 }
6688 update_prefix_suffix_flags();
6689}
6690
6691void item::update_prefix_suffix_flags()
6692{
6693 prefix_tags_cache.clear();
6694 suffix_tags_cache.clear();
6695 auto const insert_prefix_suffix_flags = [this]( FlagsSetType const & Flags ) {
6696 for( flag_id const &f : Flags ) {
6697 update_prefix_suffix_flags( f );
6698 }
6699 };
6700 insert_prefix_suffix_flags( get_flags() );
6701 insert_prefix_suffix_flags( type->get_flags() );
6702 insert_prefix_suffix_flags( inherited_tags_cache );
6703}
6704
6705void item::update_prefix_suffix_flags( const flag_id &f )
6706{
6707 if( !f->item_prefix().empty() ) {
6708 prefix_tags_cache.emplace( f );
6709 }
6710 if( !f->item_suffix().empty() ) {
6711 suffix_tags_cache.emplace( f );
6712 }
6713}
6714
6715void item::on_contents_changed()
6716{
6717 contents.update_open_pockets();
6718 cached_relative_encumbrance.reset();
6719 encumbrance_update_ = true;
6720 update_inherited_flags();
6721 cached_category.timestamp = calendar::turn_max;
6722 if( empty_container() ) {
6723 clear_automatic_whitelist();
6724 }
6725}
6726
6727std::string item::dirt_symbol() const
6728{
6729 // these symbols are unicode square characters of different heights, representing a rough
6730 // estimation of fouling in a gun. This appears instead of "faulty" since most guns will
6731 // have some level of fouling in them, and usually it is not a big deal.
6732 switch( static_cast<int>( get_var( "dirt", 0 ) / 2000 ) ) {
6733 // *INDENT-OFF*
6734 case 1: return "<color_white>\u2581</color>";
6735 case 2: return "<color_light_gray>\u2583</color>";
6736 case 3: return "<color_light_gray>\u2585</color>";
6737 case 4: return "<color_dark_gray>\u2587</color>";
6738 case 5: return "<color_brown>\u2588</color>";
6739 default: return "";
6740 // *INDENT-ON*
6741 }
6742}
6743
6744std::string item::overheat_symbol() const
6745{
6746
6747 if( !is_gun() || type->gun->overheat_threshold <= 0.0 ) {
6748 return "";
6749 }
6750 double modifier = 0;
6751 float multiplier = 1.0f;
6752 for( const item *mod : gunmods() ) {
6753 modifier += mod->type->gunmod->overheat_threshold_modifier;
6754 multiplier *= mod->type->gunmod->overheat_threshold_multiplier;
6755 }
6756 if( faults.count( fault_overheat_safety ) ) {
6757 return string_format( _( "<color_light_green>\u2588VNT </color>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_light_green>\u2588VNT </color>"
) ) ) );
6758 }
6759 switch( std::min( 5, static_cast<int>( get_var( "gun_heat",
6760 0 ) / std::max( type->gun->overheat_threshold * multiplier + modifier, 5.0 ) * 5.0 ) ) ) {
6761 case 1:
6762 return "";
6763 case 2:
6764 return string_format( _( "<color_yellow>\u2583HEAT </color>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_yellow>\u2583HEAT </color>"
) ) ) );
6765 case 3:
6766 return string_format( _( "<color_light_red>\u2585HEAT </color>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_light_red>\u2585HEAT </color>"
) ) ) );
6767 case 4:
6768 return string_format( _( "<color_red>\u2587HEAT! </color>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_red>\u2587HEAT! </color>"
) ) ) ); // NOLINT(cata-text-style)
6769 case 5:
6770 return string_format( _( "<color_pink>\u2588HEAT!! </color>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_pink>\u2588HEAT!! </color>"
) ) ) ); // NOLINT(cata-text-style)
6771 default:
6772 return "";
6773 }
6774}
6775
6776std::string item::degradation_symbol() const
6777{
6778 const int inc = max_damage() / 5;
6779 const int dgr_lvl = degradation() / ( inc > 0 ? inc : 1 );
6780 std::string dgr_symbol;
6781
6782 switch( dgr_lvl ) {
6783 case 0:
6784 dgr_symbol = colorize( "\u2588", c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) );
6785 break;
6786 case 1:
6787 dgr_symbol = colorize( "\u2587", c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow) );
6788 break;
6789 case 2:
6790 dgr_symbol = colorize( "\u2585", c_magentaget_all_colors().get(def_c_magenta) );
6791 break;
6792 case 3:
6793 dgr_symbol = colorize( "\u2583", c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red) );
6794 break;
6795 default:
6796 dgr_symbol = colorize( "\u2581", c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) );
6797 break;
6798 }
6799 return type->degrade_increments() == 0 ? "" : dgr_symbol;
6800}
6801
6802std::string item::tname( unsigned int quantity, bool with_prefix ) const
6803{
6804 return tname( quantity, with_prefix ? tname::default_tname : tname::unprefixed_tname );
6805}
6806
6807std::string item::tname( unsigned int quantity, tname::segment_bitset const &segments ) const
6808{
6809 std::string ret;
6810
6811 for( size_t i = 0; i < static_cast<size_t>( tname::segments::last_segment ); i++ ) {
6812 tname::segments const idx = static_cast<tname::segments>( i );
6813 if( !segments[idx] ) {
6814 continue;
6815 }
6816 ret += tname::print_segment( idx, *this, quantity, segments );
6817 }
6818
6819 if( item_vars.find( "item_note" ) != item_vars.end() ) {
6820 //~ %s is an item name. This style is used to denote items with notes.
6821 return string_format( _( "*%s*" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "*%s*" ) ) ), ret );
6822 }
6823
6824 return ret;
6825}
6826
6827std::string item::display_money( unsigned int quantity, unsigned int total,
6828 const std::optional<unsigned int> &selected ) const
6829{
6830 if( selected ) {
6831 //~ This is a string to display the selected and total amount of money in a stack of cash cards.
6832 //~ %1$s is the display name of cash cards.
6833 //~ %2$s is the total amount of money.
6834 //~ %3$s is the selected amount of money.
6835 //~ Example: "cash cards $15.35 of $20.48"
6836 return string_format( pgettext( "cash card and money", "%1$s %3$s of %2$s" ), tname( quantity ),
6837 format_money( total ), format_money( *selected ) );
6838 } else {
6839 //~ This is a string to display the total amount of money in a stack of cash cards.
6840 //~ %1$s is the display name of cash cards.
6841 //~ %2$s is the total amount of money on the cash cards.
6842 //~ Example: "cash cards $20.48"
6843 return string_format( pgettext( "cash card and money", "%1$s %2$s" ), tname( quantity ),
6844 format_money( total ) );
6845 }
6846}
6847
6848std::string item::display_name( unsigned int quantity ) const
6849{
6850 std::string name = tname( quantity );
6851 std::string sidetxt;
6852 std::string amt;
6853 std::string cable;
6854
6855 switch( get_side() ) {
6856 case side::BOTH:
6857 case side::num_sides:
6858 break;
6859 case side::LEFT:
6860 sidetxt = string_format( " (%s)", _( "left" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "left" ) ) ) );
6861 break;
6862 case side::RIGHT:
6863 sidetxt = string_format( " (%s)", _( "right" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "right" ) ) ) );
6864 break;
6865 }
6866 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
6867 int amount = 0;
6868 int max_amount = 0;
6869 bool show_amt = false;
6870 // We should handle infinite charges properly in all cases.
6871 if( is_book() && get_chapters() > 0 ) {
6872 // a book which has remaining unread chapters
6873 amount = get_remaining_chapters( player_character );
6874 } else if( magazine_current() ) {
6875 show_amt = true;
6876 const item *mag = magazine_current();
6877 amount = ammo_remaining();
6878 const itype *adata = mag->ammo_data();
6879 if( adata ) {
6880 max_amount = mag->ammo_capacity( adata->ammo->type );
6881 } else {
6882 max_amount = mag->ammo_capacity( item_controller->find_template(
6883 mag->ammo_default() )->ammo->type );
6884 }
6885
6886 } else if( !ammo_types().empty() ) {
6887 // anything that can be reloaded including tools, magazines, guns and auxiliary gunmods
6888 // but excluding bows etc., which have ammo, but can't be reloaded
6889 amount = ammo_remaining();
6890 const itype *adata = ammo_data();
6891 if( adata ) {
6892 max_amount = ammo_capacity( adata->ammo->type );
6893 } else {
6894 max_amount = ammo_capacity( item_controller->find_template( ammo_default() )->ammo->type );
6895 }
6896 show_amt = !has_flag( flag_RELOAD_AND_SHOOT );
6897 } else if( count_by_charges() && !has_infinite_charges() ) {
6898 // A chargeable item
6899 amount = charges;
6900 const itype *adata = ammo_data();
6901 if( adata ) {
6902 max_amount = ammo_capacity( adata->ammo->type );
6903 } else if( !ammo_default().is_null() ) {
6904 max_amount = ammo_capacity( item_controller->find_template( ammo_default() )->ammo->type );
6905 }
6906 } else if( is_vehicle_battery() ) {
6907 show_amt = true;
6908 amount = to_joule( energy_remaining( nullptr ) );
6909 max_amount = to_joule( type->battery->max_capacity );
6910 }
6911
6912 std::string ammotext;
6913 if( !is_ammo() && ( ( is_gun() && ammo_required() ) || is_magazine() ) &&
6914 get_option<bool>( "AMMO_IN_NAMES" ) ) {
6915 if( !ammo_current().is_null() ) {
6916 // Loaded with ammo
6917 ammotext = ammo_current()->nname( 1 );
6918 } else if( !ammo_types().empty() ) {
6919 // Is not loaded but can be loaded
6920 ammotext = ammotype( *ammo_types().begin() )->name();
6921 } else if( magazine_current() ) {
6922 // Is not loaded but has magazine that can be loaded
6923 ammotext = magazine_current()->ammo_default()->ammo->type->name();
6924 } else if( !magazine_default().is_null() ) {
6925 // Is not loaded and doesn't have magazine but can use magazines that could be loaded
6926 item tmp_mag( magazine_default() );
6927 ammotext = tmp_mag.ammo_default()->ammo->type->name();
6928 }
6929 }
6930
6931 if( ( amount || show_amt ) && !has_flag( flag_PSEUDO ) ) {
6932 if( is_money() ) {
6933 amt = " " + format_money( amount );
6934 } else {
6935 if( !ammotext.empty() ) {
6936 ammotext = " " + ammotext;
6937 }
6938
6939 if( max_amount != 0 ) {
6940 const double ratio = static_cast<double>( amount ) / static_cast<double>( max_amount );
6941 nc_color charges_color;
6942 if( amount == 0 ) {
6943 charges_color = c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red);
6944 } else if( amount == max_amount ) {
6945 charges_color = c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white);
6946 } else if( ratio < 1.0 / 3.0 ) {
6947 charges_color = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
6948 } else if( ratio < 2.0 / 3.0 ) {
6949 charges_color = c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
6950 } else {
6951 charges_color = c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green);
6952 }
6953 amt = string_format( " (%s%s)", colorize( string_format( "%i/%i", amount, max_amount ),
6954 charges_color ),
6955 ammotext );
6956 } else {
6957 amt = string_format( " (%i%s)", amount, ammotext );
6958 }
6959 }
6960 } else if( !ammotext.empty() ) {
6961 amt = " (" + ammotext + ")";
6962 }
6963
6964 if( has_link_data() ) {
6965 std::string extensions = cables().empty() ? "" : string_format( "+%d", cables().size() );
6966 const int link_len = link_length();
6967 const int link_max_len = max_link_length();
6968 if( link_len <= -2 ) {
6969 cable = string_format( _( " (-/%1$d cable%2$s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " (-/%1$d cable%2$s)" ) ) ), link_max_len, extensions );
6970 } else if( link_len == -1 ) {
6971 cable = string_format( _( " (%1$s cable%2$s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " (%1$s cable%2$s)" ) ) ),
6972 colorize( string_format( "×/%d", link_max_len ), c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red) ), extensions );
6973 } else {
6974 nc_color cable_color;
6975 const double ratio = static_cast<double>( link_len ) / static_cast<double>( link_max_len );
6976 if( ratio < 1.0 / 3.0 ) {
6977 cable_color = c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green);
6978 } else if( ratio < 2.0 / 3.0 ) {
6979 cable_color = c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
6980 } else {
6981 cable_color = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
6982 }
6983 cable = string_format( " (%s)", colorize( string_format( _( "%d/%d cable%s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%d/%d cable%s" ) ) ),
6984 link_max_len - link_len, link_max_len, extensions ), cable_color ) );
6985 }
6986 }
6987
6988 // HACK: This is a hack to prevent possible crashing when displaying maps as items during character creation
6989 if( is_map() && calendar::turn != calendar::turn_zero ) {
6990 // TODO: fix point types
6991 tripoint map_pos_omt =
6992 get_var( "reveal_map_center_omt", player_character.global_omt_location().raw() );
6993 tripoint_abs_sm map_pos =
6994 project_to<coords::sm>( tripoint_abs_omt( map_pos_omt ) );
6995 const city *c = overmap_buffer.closest_city( map_pos ).city;
6996 if( c != nullptr ) {
6997 name = string_format( "%s %s", c->name, name );
6998 }
6999 }
7000
7001 return string_format( "%s%s%s%s", name, sidetxt, amt, cable );
7002}
7003
7004bool item::is_collapsed() const
7005{
7006 return !contents.empty() && !contents.get_pockets( []( item_pocket const & pocket ) {
7007 return pocket.settings.is_collapsed() && pocket.is_standard_type();
7008 } ).empty();
7009}
7010
7011nc_color item::color() const
7012{
7013 if( is_null() ) {
7014 return c_blackget_all_colors().get(def_c_black);
7015 }
7016 if( is_corpse() ) {
7017 return corpse->color;
7018 }
7019 if( has_itype_variant() && _itype_variant->alt_color ) {
7020 return *_itype_variant->alt_color;
7021 }
7022 return type->color;
7023}
7024
7025int item::price( bool practical ) const
7026{
7027 int res = 0;
7028
7029 visit_items( [&res, practical]( const item * e, item * ) {
7030 res += e->price_no_contents( practical );
7031 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
7032 } );
7033
7034 return res;
7035}
7036
7037int item::price_no_contents( bool practical, std::optional<int> price_override ) const
7038{
7039 if( rotten() ) {
7040 return 0;
7041 }
7042 int price = price_override ? *price_override
7043 : units::to_cent( practical ? type->price_post : type->price );
7044 if( damage() > 0 ) {
7045 // maximal damage level is 5, maximal reduction is 80% of the value.
7046 price -= price * static_cast<double>( std::max( 0, damage_level() - 1 ) ) / 5;
7047 }
7048
7049 if( count_by_charges() || made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
7050 // price from json data is for default-sized stack
7051 price *= charges / static_cast< double >( type->stack_size );
7052
7053 } else if( is_tool() && type->tool->max_charges != 0 ) {
7054 // if tool has no ammo (e.g. spray can) reduce price proportional to remaining charges
7055 price *= ammo_remaining() / static_cast< double >( std::max( type->charges_default(), 1 ) );
7056
7057 }
7058
7059 if( is_filthy() ) {
7060 // Filthy items receieve a fixed price malus. This means common clothing ends up
7061 // with no value (it's *everywhere*), but valuable items retain most of their value.
7062 // https://github.com/CleverRaven/Cataclysm-DDA/issues/49469
7063 price = std::max( price - PRICE_FILTHY_MALUS, 0 );
7064 }
7065
7066 return price;
7067}
7068
7069// TODO: MATERIALS add a density field to materials.json
7070units::mass item::weight( bool include_contents, bool integral ) const
7071{
7072 if( is_null() ) {
7073 return 0_gram;
7074 }
7075
7076 // Items that don't drop aren't really there, they're items just for ease of implementation
7077 if( has_flag( flag_NO_DROP ) ) {
7078 return 0_gram;
7079 }
7080
7081 if( is_craft() ) {
7082 if( !craft_data_->cached_weight ) {
7083 units::mass ret = 0_gram;
7084 for( const item_components::type_vector_pair &tvp : components ) {
7085 for( const item &it : tvp.second ) {
7086 ret += it.weight();
7087 }
7088 }
7089 craft_data_->cached_weight = ret;
7090 }
7091 return *craft_data_->cached_weight;
7092 }
7093
7094 units::mass ret;
7095 double ret_mul = 1.0;
7096 std::string local_str_mass = integral ? get_var( "integral_weight" ) : get_var( "weight" );
7097 if( local_str_mass.empty() ) {
7098 ret = integral ? type->integral_weight : type->weight;
7099 } else {
7100 ret = units::from_milligram( std::stoll( local_str_mass ) );
7101 }
7102
7103 if( has_flag( flag_REDUCED_WEIGHT ) ) {
7104 ret_mul *= 0.75;
7105 }
7106
7107 // if this is a gun apply all of its gunmods' weight multipliers
7108 if( type->gun ) {
7109 for( const item *mod : gunmods() ) {
7110 ret_mul *= mod->type->gunmod->weight_multiplier;
7111 }
7112 }
7113
7114 if( count_by_charges() ) {
7115 ret_mul *= charges;
7116
7117 } else if( is_corpse() ) {
7118 cata_assert( corpse )(static_cast <bool> (corpse) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("corpse", "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, 7118, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__)); // To appease static analysis
7119 ret = corpse->weight;
7120 ret_mul = 1.0;
7121 if( has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) || has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) {
7122 ret_mul *= 0.75;
7123 }
7124 if( has_flag( flag_GIBBED ) ) {
7125 ret_mul *= 0.85;
7126 }
7127 if( has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) ) {
7128 ret_mul *= 0.85;
7129 }
7130 if( has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
7131 ret_mul *= 0.25;
7132 }
7133
7134 }
7135
7136 ret *= ret_mul;
7137
7138 // if it has additional pockets include the mass of those
7139 if( contents.has_additional_pockets() ) {
7140 ret += contents.get_additional_weight();
7141 }
7142
7143 if( include_contents ) {
7144 ret += contents.item_weight_modifier();
7145 }
7146
7147 // if this is an ammo belt add the weight of any implicitly contained linkages
7148 if( type->magazine && type->magazine->linkage ) {
7149 item links( *type->magazine->linkage );
7150 links.charges = ammo_remaining();
7151 ret += links.weight();
7152 }
7153
7154 // reduce weight for sawn-off barrel capped to the apportioned weight of the barrel
7155 if( gunmod_find( itype_barrel_small ) ) {
7156 const units::volume b = type->gun->barrel_volume;
7157 const units::mass max_barrel_weight = units::from_gram( to_milliliter( b ) );
7158 const units::mass barrel_weight = units::from_gram( b.value() * type->weight.value() /
7159 type->volume.value() );
7160 ret -= std::min( max_barrel_weight, barrel_weight );
7161 }
7162
7163 // reduce weight for sawn-off stock
7164 if( gunmod_find( itype_stock_none ) ) {
7165 // Length taken from item::length(), height and width are "average" values
7166 const float stock_dimensions = 0.26f * 0.11f * 0.04f; // length * height * width = 0.00114 m3.
7167 // density of 'wood' material
7168 const int density = 850;
7169 ret -= units::from_kilogram( stock_dimensions * density );
7170 }
7171
7172 return ret;
7173}
7174
7175static units::length sawn_off_reduction( const itype *type )
7176{
7177 int barrel_percentage = type->gun->barrel_volume / ( type->volume / 100 );
7178 return ( type->longest_side / 100 ) * barrel_percentage;
7179}
7180
7181units::length item::length() const
7182{
7183 if( made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) || ( is_soft() && is_container_empty() ) ) {
7184 return 0_mm;
7185 }
7186
7187 if( is_corpse() ) {
7188 return units::default_length_from_volume<int>( corpse->volume );
7189 }
7190
7191 if( is_gun() ) {
7192 units::length length_adjusted = type->longest_side;
7193
7194 //TODO: Unhardcode this now that integral_longest_side can be used
7195 if( gunmod_find( itype_barrel_small ) ) {
7196 length_adjusted = type->longest_side - sawn_off_reduction( type );
7197 }
7198
7199 std::vector<const item *> mods = gunmods();
7200 // only the longest thing sticking off the gun matters for length adjustment
7201 // TODO: Differentiate from back end mods like stocks vs front end like bayonets and muzzle devices
7202 units::length max_length = 0_mm;
7203 units::length stock_length = 0_mm;
7204 units::length stock_accessory_length = 0_mm;
7205 for( const item *mod : mods ) {
7206 // stocks and accessories for stocks are added with whatever the longest thing on the front is
7207 // stock mount is added here for support for sawing off stocks
7208 if( mod->type->gunmod->location.str() == "stock mount" ) {
7209 if( has_flag( flag_REMOVED_STOCK ) ) {
7210 // stock has been removed so slightly more length removed about 26cm
7211 stock_length -= 26_cm;
7212 }
7213 } else if( mod->type->gunmod->location.str() == "stock" ) {
7214 stock_length = mod->type->integral_longest_side;
7215 if( has_flag( flag_COLLAPSED_STOCK ) || has_flag( flag_FOLDED_STOCK ) ) {
7216 // stock is folded so need to reduce length
7217
7218 // folded stock length is estimated at about 20 cm, LOP for guns should be about
7219 // 13.5 inches and a folding stock folds past the trigger and isn't perfectly efficient
7220 stock_length -= 20_cm;
7221 }
7222 } else if( mod->type->gunmod->location.str() == "stock accessory" ) {
7223 stock_accessory_length = mod->type->integral_longest_side;
7224 } else {
7225 units::length l = mod->type->integral_longest_side;
7226 if( l > max_length ) {
7227 max_length = l;
7228 }
7229 }
7230 }
7231 return length_adjusted + max_length + stock_length + stock_accessory_length;
7232 }
7233
7234 units::length max = is_soft() ? 0_mm : type->longest_side;
7235 max = std::max( contents.item_length_modifier(), max );
7236 return max;
7237}
7238
7239units::length item::barrel_length() const
7240{
7241 if( is_gun() ) {
7242 units::length l = type->gun->barrel_length;
7243 for( const item *mod : mods() ) {
7244 // if a gun has a barrel length specifying mod then use that length for sure
7245 if( mod->type->gunmod->barrel_length > 0_mm ) {
7246 l = mod->type->gunmod->barrel_length;
7247 // if we find an explicit barrel mod then use that and quit the loop
7248 break;
7249 }
7250 }
7251 // if we've sawn off the barrel reduce the damage
7252 if( gunmod_find( itype_barrel_small ) ) {
7253 l = l - sawn_off_reduction( type );
7254 }
7255
7256 return l;
7257 } else {
7258 return 0_mm;
7259 }
7260}
7261
7262units::volume item::collapsed_volume_delta() const
7263{
7264 units::volume delta_volume = 0_ml;
7265
7266 // COLLAPSIBLE_STOCK is the legacy version of this just here for mod support
7267 // TODO Remove at some point
7268 if( is_gun() && ( has_flag( flag_COLLAPSIBLE_STOCK ) || has_flag( flag_COLLAPSED_STOCK ) ||
7269 has_flag( flag_REMOVED_STOCK ) ) ) {
7270 // consider only the base size of the gun (without mods)
7271 int tmpvol = get_var( "volume",
7272 ( type->volume - type->gun->barrel_volume ) / units::legacy_volume_factor );
7273 if( tmpvol <= 3 ) {
7274 // intentional NOP
7275 } else if( tmpvol <= 5 ) {
7276 delta_volume = 250_ml;
7277 } else if( tmpvol <= 6 ) {
7278 delta_volume = 500_ml;
7279 } else if( tmpvol <= 9 ) {
7280 delta_volume = 750_ml;
7281 } else if( tmpvol <= 12 ) {
7282 delta_volume = 1000_ml;
7283 } else if( tmpvol <= 15 ) {
7284 delta_volume = 1250_ml;
7285 } else {
7286 delta_volume = 1500_ml;
7287 }
7288 }
7289
7290 return delta_volume;
7291}
7292
7293units::volume item::corpse_volume( const mtype *corpse ) const
7294{
7295 units::volume corpse_volume = corpse->volume;
7296 if( has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
7297 corpse_volume *= 0.25;
7298 }
7299 if( has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) || has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) {
7300 corpse_volume *= 0.75;
7301 }
7302 if( has_flag( flag_GIBBED ) ) {
7303 corpse_volume *= 0.85;
7304 }
7305 if( has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) ) {
7306 corpse_volume *= 0.85;
7307 }
7308 if( corpse_volume > MAX_ITEM_VOLUME ) {
7309 // Silently set volume so the corpse can still spawn but a mtype can have a volume > MAX_ITEM_VOLUME
7310 corpse_volume = MAX_ITEM_VOLUME;
7311 }
7312 if( corpse_volume > 0_ml ) {
7313 return corpse_volume;
7314 }
7315 debugmsg( "invalid monster volume for corpse" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "7315", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "invalid monster volume for corpse"
);
7316 return 0_ml;
7317}
7318
7319units::volume item::base_volume() const
7320{
7321 if( is_null() ) {
7322 return 0_ml;
7323 }
7324 if( is_corpse() ) {
7325 return corpse_volume( corpse );
7326 }
7327
7328 if( is_craft() ) {
7329 units::volume ret = 0_ml;
7330 for( const item_components::type_vector_pair &tvp : components ) {
7331 for( const item &it : tvp.second ) {
7332 ret += it.base_volume();
7333 }
7334 }
7335 return ret;
7336 }
7337
7338 if( count_by_charges() && type->stack_size > 0 ) {
7339 if( type->volume % type->stack_size == 0_ml ) {
7340 return type->volume / type->stack_size;
7341 } else {
7342 return type->volume / type->stack_size + 1_ml;
7343 }
7344 }
7345
7346 return type->volume;
7347}
7348
7349units::volume item::volume( bool integral, bool ignore_contents, int charges_in_vol ) const
7350{
7351 charges_in_vol = charges_in_vol < 0 || charges_in_vol > charges ? charges : charges_in_vol;
7352 if( is_null() ) {
7353 return 0_ml;
7354 }
7355
7356 if( is_corpse() ) {
7357 return corpse_volume( corpse );
7358 }
7359
7360 if( is_craft() ) {
7361 if( !craft_data_->cached_volume ) {
7362 units::volume ret = 0_ml;
7363 for( const item_components::type_vector_pair &tvp : components ) {
7364 for( const item &it : tvp.second ) {
7365 ret += it.volume();
7366 }
7367 }
7368 // 1 mL minimum craft volume to avoid 0 volume errors from practices or hammerspace
7369 craft_data_->cached_volume = std::max( ret, 1_ml );
7370 }
7371 return *craft_data_->cached_volume;
7372 }
7373
7374 const int local_volume = get_var( "volume", -1 );
7375 units::volume ret;
7376 if( local_volume >= 0 ) {
7377 ret = local_volume * units::legacy_volume_factor;
7378 } else if( integral ) {
7379 ret = type->integral_volume;
7380 } else {
7381 ret = type->volume;
7382 }
7383
7384 if( count_by_charges() || made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
7385 units::quantity<int64_t, units::volume_in_milliliter_tag> num = ret * static_cast<int64_t>
7386 ( charges_in_vol );
7387 if( type->stack_size <= 0 ) {
7388 if( type->charges_default() <= 0 ) {
7389 debugmsg( "Item type %s has invalid default charges %d", typeId().str(), type->charges_default() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "7389", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Item type %s has invalid default charges %d"
, typeId().str(), type->charges_default());
7390 } else {
7391 debugmsg( "Item type %s has invalid stack_size %d", typeId().str(), type->stack_size )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "7391", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Item type %s has invalid stack_size %d"
, typeId().str(), type->stack_size);
7392 }
7393 ret = num;
7394 } else {
7395 ret = num / type->stack_size;
7396 if( num % type->stack_size != 0_ml ) {
7397 ret += 1_ml;
7398 }
7399 }
7400 }
7401
7402 if( !ignore_contents ) {
7403 ret += contents.item_size_modifier();
7404 }
7405
7406 // if it has additional pockets include the volume of those
7407 if( contents.has_additional_pockets() ) {
7408 ret += contents.get_additional_volume();
7409 }
7410
7411 // TODO: do a check if the item is collapsed or not
7412 ret -= collapsed_volume_delta();
7413
7414 if( is_gun() ) {
7415 for( const item *elem : gunmods() ) {
7416 ret += elem->volume( true );
7417 }
7418
7419 if( gunmod_find( itype_barrel_small ) ) {
7420 ret -= type->gun->barrel_volume;
7421 }
7422 }
7423
7424 return ret;
7425}
7426
7427int item::lift_strength() const
7428{
7429 const int mass = units::to_gram( weight() );
7430 return std::max( mass / 10000, 1 );
7431}
7432
7433int item::attack_time( const Character &you ) const
7434{
7435 int ret = 65 + ( volume() / 62.5_ml + weight() / 60_gram ) / count();
7436 ret = calculate_by_enchantment_wield( you, ret, enchant_vals::mod::ITEM_ATTACK_SPEED,
7437 true );
7438 return ret;
7439}
7440
7441int item::damage_melee( const damage_type_id &dt ) const
7442{
7443 if( is_null() ) {
8
←
Taking false branch
→
7444 return 0;
7445 }
7446
7447 // effectiveness is reduced by 10% per damage level
7448 int res = 0;
7449 if( type->melee.count( dt ) > 0 ) {
9
←
Assuming the condition is false
→
10
←
Taking false branch
→
7450 res = type->melee.at( dt );
7451 }
7452 res = damage_adjusted_melee_weapon_damage( res );
7453
7454 // apply type specific flags
7455 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage types
7456 if( dt == damage_bash && has_flag( flag_REDUCED_BASHING ) ) {
7457 res *= 0.5;
7458 }
7459 if( dt->edged && has_flag( flag_DIAMOND ) ) {
11
←
Assuming field 'edged' is false
→
7460 res *= 1.3;
7461 }
7462
7463 // consider any attached bayonets
7464 if( is_gun() ) {
12
←
Taking true branch
→
7465 std::vector<int> opts = { res };
7466 for( const item *mod : gunmods() ) {
7467 if( mod->type->gunmod->is_bayonet ) {
7468 opts.push_back( mod->damage_melee( dt ) );
7469 }
7470 }
7471 return *std::max_element( opts.begin(), opts.end() );
13
←
Past-the-end iterator dereferenced
7472
7473 }
7474
7475 return std::max( res, 0 );
7476}
7477
7478damage_instance item::base_damage_melee() const
7479{
7480 // TODO: Caching
7481 damage_instance ret;
7482 for( const damage_type &dt : damage_type::get_all() ) {
7483 int dam = damage_melee( dt.id );
7484 if( dam > 0 ) {
7485 ret.add_damage( dt.id, dam );
7486 }
7487 }
7488
7489 return ret;
7490}
7491
7492damage_instance item::base_damage_thrown() const
7493{
7494 // TODO: Create a separate cache for individual items (for modifiers like diamond etc.)
7495 return type->thrown_damage;
7496}
7497
7498int item::reach_range( const Character &guy ) const
7499{
7500 int res = 1;
7501
7502 if( has_flag( flag_REACH_ATTACK ) ) {
7503 res = has_flag( flag_REACH3 ) ? 3 : 2;
7504 }
7505
7506 // for guns consider any attached gunmods
7507 if( is_gun() && !is_gunmod() ) {
7508 for( const std::pair<const gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &m : gun_all_modes() ) {
7509 if( guy.is_npc() && m.second.flags.count( "NPC_AVOID" ) ) {
7510 continue;
7511 }
7512 if( m.second.melee() ) {
7513 res = std::max( res, m.second.qty );
7514 }
7515 }
7516 }
7517
7518 return res;
7519}
7520
7521int item::current_reach_range( const Character &guy ) const
7522{
7523 int res = 1;
7524
7525 if( has_flag( flag_REACH_ATTACK ) ) {
7526 res = has_flag( flag_REACH3 ) ? 3 : 2;
7527 } else if( is_gun() && !is_gunmod() && gun_current_mode().melee() ) {
7528 res = gun_current_mode().target->gun_range();
7529 }
7530
7531 if( is_gun() && !is_gunmod() ) {
7532 gun_mode gun = gun_current_mode();
7533 if( !( guy.is_npc() && gun.flags.count( "NPC_AVOID" ) ) && gun.melee() ) {
7534 res = std::max( res, gun.qty );
7535 }
7536 }
7537
7538 return res;
7539}
7540
7541void item::unset_flags()
7542{
7543 item_tags.clear();
7544 requires_tags_processing = true;
7545}
7546
7547bool item::has_fault( const fault_id &fault ) const
7548{
7549 return faults.count( fault );
7550}
7551
7552bool item::has_fault_flag( const std::string &searched_flag ) const
7553{
7554 for( const fault_id &fault : faults ) {
7555 if( fault->has_flag( searched_flag ) ) {
7556 return true;
7557 }
7558 }
7559 return false;
7560}
7561
7562bool item::has_own_flag( const flag_id &f ) const
7563{
7564 return item_tags.find( f ) != item_tags.end();
7565}
7566
7567bool item::has_flag( const flag_id &f ) const
7568{
7569 bool ret = false;
7570 if( !f.is_valid() ) {
7571 debugmsg( "Attempted to check invalid flag_id %s", f.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "7571", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Attempted to check invalid flag_id %s"
, f.str());
7572 return false;
7573 }
7574
7575 ret = inherited_tags_cache.find( f ) != inherited_tags_cache.end();
7576 if( ret ) {
7577 return ret;
7578 }
7579
7580 // other item type flags
7581 ret = type->has_flag( f );
7582 if( ret ) {
7583 return ret;
7584 }
7585
7586 // now check for item specific flags
7587 ret = has_own_flag( f );
7588 return ret;
7589}
7590
7591item &item::set_flag( const flag_id &flag )
7592{
7593 if( flag.is_valid() ) {
7594 item_tags.insert( flag );
7595 update_prefix_suffix_flags( flag );
7596 requires_tags_processing = true;
7597 } else {
7598 debugmsg( "Attempted to set invalid flag_id %s", flag.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "7598", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Attempted to set invalid flag_id %s"
, flag.str());
7599 }
7600 return *this;
7601}
7602
7603item &item::unset_flag( const flag_id &flag )
7604{
7605 item_tags.erase( flag );
7606 update_prefix_suffix_flags();
7607 requires_tags_processing = true;
7608 return *this;
7609}
7610
7611item &item::set_flag_recursive( const flag_id &flag )
7612{
7613 set_flag( flag );
7614 for( item_components::type_vector_pair &tvp : components ) {
7615 for( item &it : tvp.second ) {
7616 it.set_flag_recursive( flag );
7617 }
7618 }
7619 return *this;
7620}
7621
7622const item::FlagsSetType &item::get_flags() const
7623{
7624 return item_tags;
7625}
7626
7627const item::FlagsSetType &item::get_prefix_flags() const
7628{
7629 return prefix_tags_cache;
7630}
7631
7632const item::FlagsSetType &item::get_suffix_flags() const
7633{
7634 return suffix_tags_cache;
7635}
7636
7637bool item::has_property( const std::string &prop ) const
7638{
7639 return type->properties.find( prop ) != type->properties.end();
7640}
7641
7642std::string item::get_property_string( const std::string &prop, const std::string &def ) const
7643{
7644 const auto it = type->properties.find( prop );
7645 return it != type->properties.end() ? it->second : def;
7646}
7647
7648int64_t item::get_property_int64_t( const std::string &prop, int64_t def ) const
7649{
7650 const auto it = type->properties.find( prop );
7651 if( it != type->properties.end() ) {
7652 char *e = nullptr;
7653 int64_t r = std::strtoll( it->second.c_str(), &e, 10 );
7654 if( !it->second.empty() && *e == '\0' ) {
7655 return r;
7656 }
7657 debugmsg( "invalid property '%s' for item '%s'", prop.c_str(), tname() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "7657", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "invalid property '%s' for item '%s'"
, prop.c_str(), tname());
7658 }
7659 return def;
7660}
7661
7662bool item::has_quality_nonrecursive( const quality_id &qual, int level ) const
7663{
7664 return get_quality_nonrecursive( qual ) >= level;
7665}
7666
7667int item::get_quality_nonrecursive( const quality_id &id, const bool strict_boiling ) const
7668{
7669 /**
7670 * EXCEPTION: Items with quality BOIL only count as such if they are empty.
7671 */
7672 if( strict_boiling && id == qual_BOIL && !contents.empty_container() ) {
7673 return INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1);
7674 }
7675
7676 int return_quality = INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1);
7677
7678 // Check for inherent item quality
7679 for( const std::pair<const quality_id, int> &quality : type->qualities ) {
7680 if( quality.first == id ) {
7681 return_quality = quality.second;
7682 }
7683 }
7684
7685 // If tool has charged qualities and enough charge to use at least once
7686 // (using ammo_remaining() with player character to include bionic/UPS power)
7687 if( !type->charged_qualities.empty() && ammo_sufficient( &get_player_character() ) ) {
7688 // see if any charged qualities are better than the current one
7689 for( const std::pair<const quality_id, int> &quality : type->charged_qualities ) {
7690 if( quality.first == id ) {
7691 return_quality = std::max( return_quality, quality.second );
7692 }
7693 }
7694 }
7695
7696 return return_quality;
7697}
7698
7699int item::get_quality( const quality_id &id, const bool strict_boiling ) const
7700{
7701 /**
7702 * EXCEPTION: Items with quality BOIL only count as such if they are empty.
7703 */
7704 if( strict_boiling && id == qual_BOIL && !contents.empty_container() ) {
7705 return INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1);
7706 }
7707
7708 // First check the item itself
7709 int return_quality = get_quality_nonrecursive( id, false );
7710
7711 // If any contained item has a better quality, use that instead
7712 return_quality = std::max( return_quality, contents.best_quality( id ) );
7713
7714 return return_quality;
7715}
7716
7717bool item::has_technique( const matec_id &tech ) const
7718{
7719 return type->techniques.count( tech ) > 0 || techniques.count( tech ) > 0;
7720}
7721
7722void item::add_technique( const matec_id &tech )
7723{
7724 techniques.insert( tech );
7725}
7726
7727std::vector<item *> item::toolmods()
7728{
7729 std::vector<item *> res;
7730 if( is_tool() ) {
7731 for( item *e : contents.all_items_top( pocket_type::MOD ) ) {
7732 if( e->is_toolmod() ) {
7733 res.push_back( e );
7734 }
7735 }
7736 }
7737 return res;
7738}
7739
7740std::vector<const item *> item::toolmods() const
7741{
7742 std::vector<const item *> res;
7743 if( is_tool() ) {
7744 for( const item *e : contents.all_items_top( pocket_type::MOD ) ) {
7745 if( e->is_toolmod() ) {
7746 res.push_back( e );
7747 }
7748 }
7749 }
7750 return res;
7751}
7752
7753std::set<matec_id> item::get_techniques() const
7754{
7755 std::set<matec_id> result = type->techniques;
7756 result.insert( techniques.begin(), techniques.end() );
7757 return result;
7758}
7759
7760int item::get_comestible_fun() const
7761{
7762 if( !is_comestible() ) {
7763 return 0;
7764 }
7765 int fun = get_comestible()->fun;
7766 for( const flag_id &flag : item_tags ) {
7767 fun += flag->taste_mod();
7768 }
7769 for( const flag_id &flag : type->get_flags() ) {
7770 fun += flag->taste_mod();
7771 }
7772
7773 if( has_flag( flag_MUSHY ) ) {
7774 return std::min( -5, fun ); // defrosted MUSHY food is practically tasteless or tastes off
7775 }
7776
7777 return fun;
7778}
7779
7780bool item::goes_bad() const
7781{
7782 if( item_internal::goes_bad_cache_is_for( this ) ) {
7783 return item_internal::goes_bad_cache_fetch();
7784 }
7785 if( has_flag( flag_PROCESSING ) ) {
7786 return false;
7787 }
7788 if( is_corpse() ) {
7789 // Corpses rot only if they are made of rotting materials
7790 // They also only rot if they are not dormant
7791 if( corpse->has_flag( mon_flag_DORMANT ) ) {
7792 return false;
7793 }
7794 return made_of_any( materials::get_rotting() );
7795 }
7796 return is_comestible() && get_comestible()->spoils != 0_turns;
7797}
7798
7799time_duration item::get_shelf_life() const
7800{
7801 if( goes_bad() ) {
7802 if( is_comestible() ) {
7803 return get_comestible()->spoils;
7804 } else if( is_corpse() ) {
7805 return 24_hours;
7806 }
7807 }
7808 return 0_turns;
7809}
7810
7811double item::get_relative_rot() const
7812{
7813 if( goes_bad() ) {
7814 return rot / get_shelf_life();
7815 }
7816 return 0;
7817}
7818
7819void item::set_relative_rot( double val )
7820{
7821 if( goes_bad() ) {
7822 rot = get_shelf_life() * val;
7823 // calc_rot uses last_temp_check (when it's not turn_zero) instead of bday.
7824 // this makes sure the rotting starts from now, not from bday.
7825 // if this item is the result of smoking or milling don't do this, we want to start from bday.
7826 if( !has_flag( flag_PROCESSING_RESULT ) ) {
7827 last_temp_check = calendar::turn;
7828 }
7829 }
7830}
7831
7832void item::set_rot( time_duration val )
7833{
7834 rot = val;
7835}
7836
7837void item::randomize_rot()
7838{
7839 if( is_comestible() && get_comestible()->spoils > 0_turns ) {
7840 const double x_input = rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 );
7841 const double k_rot = ( 1.0 - x_input ) / ( 1.0 + 2.0 * x_input );
7842 set_rot( get_shelf_life() * k_rot );
7843 }
7844
7845 for( item_pocket *pocket : contents.get_all_contained_pockets() ) {
7846 if( pocket->spoil_multiplier() > 0.0f ) {
7847 for( item *subitem : pocket->all_items_top() ) {
7848 subitem->randomize_rot();
7849 }
7850 }
7851 }
7852}
7853
7854int item::spoilage_sort_order() const
7855{
7856 int bottom = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
7857
7858 bool any_goes_bad = false;
7859 time_duration min_spoil_time = calendar::INDEFINITELY_LONG_DURATION;
7860 visit_items( [&]( item * const node, item * const parent ) {
7861 if( node && node->goes_bad() ) {
7862 float spoil_multiplier = 1.0f;
7863 if( parent ) {
7864 const item_pocket *const parent_pocket = parent->contained_where( *node );
7865 if( parent_pocket ) {
7866 spoil_multiplier = parent_pocket->spoil_multiplier();
7867 }
7868 }
7869 if( spoil_multiplier > 0.0f ) {
7870 time_duration remaining_shelf_life = node->get_shelf_life() - node->rot;
7871 if( !any_goes_bad || min_spoil_time * spoil_multiplier > remaining_shelf_life ) {
7872 any_goes_bad = true;
7873 min_spoil_time = remaining_shelf_life / spoil_multiplier;
7874 }
7875 }
7876 }
7877 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
7878 } );
7879 if( any_goes_bad ) {
7880 return to_turns<int>( min_spoil_time );
7881 }
7882
7883 if( get_comestible() ) {
7884 if( get_category_shallow().get_id() == item_category_food ) {
7885 return bottom - 3;
7886 } else if( get_category_shallow().get_id() == item_category_drugs ) {
7887 return bottom - 2;
7888 } else {
7889 return bottom - 1;
7890 }
7891 }
7892 return bottom;
7893}
7894
7895/**
7896 * Food decay calculation.
7897 * Calculate how much food rots per hour, based on 3600 rot/hour at 65 F (18.3 C).
7898 * Rate of rot doubles every 16 F (~8.8888 C) increase in temperature
7899 * Rate of rot halves every 16 F decrease in temperature
7900 * Rot maxes out at 105 F
7901 * Rot stops below 32 F (0C) and above 145 F (63 C)
7902 */
7903float item::calc_hourly_rotpoints_at_temp( const units::temperature &temp ) const
7904{
7905 const units::temperature dropoff = units::from_fahrenheit( 38 ); // F, ~3 C
7906 const float max_rot_temp = 105; // F, ~41 C, Maximum rotting rate is at this temperature
7907 const float safe_temp = 145; // F, ~63 C, safe temperature above which food stops rotting
7908
7909 if( temp <= temperatures::freezing ||
7910 temp > units::from_fahrenheit( safe_temp ) ) {
7911 return 0.f;
7912 } else if( temp < dropoff ) {
7913 // ditch our fancy equation and do a linear approach to 0 rot from 38 F (3 C) -> 32 F (0 C)
7914 return 600.f * std::exp2( -27.f / 16.f ) * ( units::to_fahrenheit( temp ) - units::to_fahrenheit(
7915 temperatures::freezing ) );
7916 } else if( temp < units::from_fahrenheit( max_rot_temp ) ) {
7917 // Exponential progress from 38 F (3 C) to 105 F (41 C)
7918 return 3600.f * std::exp2( ( units::to_fahrenheit( temp ) - 65.f ) / 16.f );
7919 } else {
7920 // Constant rot from 105 F (41 C) to 145 F (63 C)
7921 // This is approximately 20364.67 rot/hour
7922 return 3600.f * std::exp2( ( max_rot_temp - 65.f ) / 16.f );
7923 }
7924}
7925
7926void item::calc_rot( units::temperature temp, const float spoil_modifier,
7927 const time_duration &time_delta )
7928{
7929 // Avoid needlessly calculating already rotten things. Corpses should
7930 // always rot away and food rots away at twice the shelf life. If the food
7931 // is in a sealed container they won't rot away, this avoids needlessly
7932 // calculating their rot in that case.
7933 if( !is_corpse() && get_relative_rot() > 2.0 ) {
7934 return;
7935 }
7936
7937 if( has_own_flag( flag_FROZEN ) ) {
7938 return;
7939 }
7940
7941 // rot modifier
7942 float factor = spoil_modifier;
7943 if( is_corpse() && has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ) {
7944 factor *= 0.75;
7945 }
7946 if( has_own_flag( flag_MUSHY ) ) {
7947 factor *= 3.0;
7948 }
7949 // Food irradiation can quadruple the shelf life.
7950 // "Shelf life of ground beef patties treated by gamma radiation":
7951 // > Beef patties treated at 1.0 and 3.0 kGy [spoiled] by day 14 and 21, ...
7952 // > patties treated at 5.0 kGy did not spoil until 42 days.
7953 // > The nonirradiated control samples for both batches of ground beef spoiled within 7 days
7954 // We get 0.5, 0.33, and 0.167. 0.25 seems reasonable for irradiation
