10672 }
10673 }
10674
10675 // Handle non-magazines with ammo_restriction in a CONTAINER type pocket (like quivers)
10676 if( !( mag || is_magazine() || ammo.empty() ) ) {
10677 for( const item *e : contents.all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
10678 if( e->is_ammo() && ammo.find( e->ammo_type() ) != ammo.end() ) {
10679 ret += e->charges;
10680 }
10681 }
10682 }
10683
10684 // UPS/bionic power can replace ammo requirement.
10685 // Only for tools. Guns should always use energy_drain for electricity use.
10686 if( carrier != nullptr && type->tool ) {
10687 if( has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
10688 ret += units::to_kilojoule( carrier->get_power_level() );
10689 }
10690 if( has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
10691 ret += units::to_kilojoule( carrier->available_ups() );
10692 }
10693 }
10694
10695 return ret;
10696}
10697int item::ammo_remaining( const Character *carrier, const bool include_linked ) const
10698{
10699 std::set<ammotype> ammo = ammo_types();
10700 return ammo_remaining( ammo, carrier, include_linked );
10701}
10702
10703int item::ammo_remaining( const bool include_linked ) const
10704{
10705 return ammo_remaining( nullptr, include_linked );
10706}
10707
10708units::energy item::energy_remaining( const Character *carrier ) const
10709{
10710 units::energy ret = 0_kJ;
10711
10712 // Future energy based batteries
10713 if( is_vehicle_battery() ) {
10714 ret += energy;
10715 }
10716
10717 // Magazine in the item
10718 const item *mag = magazine_current();
10719 if( mag ) {
10720 ret += mag->energy_remaining( carrier );
10721 }
10722
10723 // Power from bionic
10724 if( carrier != nullptr && has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
10725 ret += carrier->get_power_level();
10726 }
10727
10728 // Extra power from UPS
10729 if( carrier != nullptr && has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
10730 ret += carrier->available_ups();
10731 }
10732
10733 // Battery(ammo) contained within
10734 if( is_magazine() ) {
10735 for( const item *e : contents.all_items_top( pocket_type::MAGAZINE ) ) {
10736 if( e->typeId() == itype_battery ) {
10737 ret += units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( e->charges ) );
10738 }
10739 }
10740 }
10741
10742 return ret;
10743}
10744
10745int item::remaining_ammo_capacity() const
10746{
10747 if( ammo_types().empty() ) {
10748 return 0;
10749 }
10750
10751 const itype *loaded_ammo = ammo_data();
10752 if( loaded_ammo == nullptr ) {
10753 return ammo_capacity( item::find_type( ammo_default() )->ammo->type ) - ammo_remaining();
10754 } else {
10755 return ammo_capacity( loaded_ammo->ammo->type ) - ammo_remaining();
10756 }
10757}
10758
10759int item::ammo_capacity( const ammotype &ammo, bool include_linked ) const
10760{
10761 const item *mag = magazine_current();
10762 if( include_linked && has_link_data() ) {
10763 return link().t_veh ? link().t_veh->connected_battery_power_level().second : 0;
10764 } else if( mag ) {
10765 return mag->ammo_capacity( ammo );
10766 } else if( has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
10767 return units::to_kilojoule( get_player_character().get_max_power_level() );
10768 }
10769
10770 if( contents.has_pocket_type( pocket_type::MAGAZINE ) ) {
10771 return contents.ammo_capacity( ammo );
10772 }
10773 if( is_magazine() ) {
10774 return type->magazine->capacity;
10775 }
10776 return 0;
10777}
10778
10779int item::ammo_required() const
10780{
10781 if( is_gun() ) {
10782 if( type->gun->ammo.empty() ) {
10783 return 0;
10784 } else {
10785 int modifier = 0;
10786 float multiplier = 1.0f;
10787 for( const item *mod : gunmods() ) {
10788 modifier += mod->type->gunmod->ammo_to_fire_modifier;
10789 multiplier *= mod->type->gunmod->ammo_to_fire_multiplier;
10790 }
10791 return ( type->gun->ammo_to_fire * multiplier ) + modifier;
10792 }
10793 }
10794
10795 return type->charges_to_use();
10796}
10797
10798item &item::first_ammo()
10799{
10800 return contents.first_ammo();
10801}
10802
10803const item &item::first_ammo() const
10804{
10805 return contents.first_ammo();
10806}
10807
10808void item::handle_liquid_or_spill( Character &guy, const item *avoid )
10809{
10810 contents.handle_liquid_or_spill( guy, avoid );
10811}
10812
10813bool item::ammo_sufficient( const Character *carrier, int qty ) const
10814{
10815 if( count_by_charges() ) {
10816 return ammo_remaining( carrier, true ) >= qty;
10817 }
10818
10819 if( is_comestible() ) {
10820 return true;
10821 }
10822
10823 return shots_remaining( carrier ) >= qty;
10824}
10825
10826bool item::ammo_sufficient( const Character *carrier, const std::string &method, int qty ) const
10827{
10828 auto iter = type->ammo_scale.find( method );
10829 if( iter != type->ammo_scale.end() ) {
10830 qty *= iter->second;
10831 }
10832
10833 return ammo_sufficient( carrier, qty );
10834}
10835
10836int item::ammo_consume( int qty, const tripoint &pos, Character *carrier )
10837{
10838 if( qty < 0 ) {
10839 debugmsg( "Cannot consume negative quantity of ammo for %s", tname() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "10839", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Cannot consume negative quantity of ammo for %s"
, tname());
10840 return 0;
10841 }
10842 const int wanted_qty = qty;
10843
10844 // Consume power from appliances/vehicles connected with cables
10845 if( has_link_data() ) {
10846 if( link().t_veh && link().efficiency >= MIN_LINK_EFFICIENCY ) {
10847 qty = link().t_veh->discharge_battery( qty, true );
10848 } else {
10849 const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( link().t_abs_pos );
10850 if( vp ) {
10851 qty = vp->vehicle().discharge_battery( qty, true );
10852 }
10853 }
10854 }
10855
10856 // Consume charges loaded in the item or its magazines
10857 if( is_magazine() || uses_magazine() ) {
10858 qty -= contents.ammo_consume( qty, pos );
10859 if( ammo_capacity( ammo_battery ) == 0 && carrier != nullptr ) {
10860 carrier->invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
10861 }
10862 }
10863
10864 // Dirty fix: activating a container of meds leads here, and used to use up all of the charges.
10865 if( is_medication() && charges > 1 ) {
10866 int charg_used = std::min( charges, qty );
10867 charges -= charg_used;
10868 qty -= charg_used;
10869 }
10870
10871 // Some weird internal non-item charges (used by grenades)
10872 if( is_tool() && type->tool->ammo_id.empty() ) {
10873 int charg_used = std::min( charges, qty );
10874 charges -= charg_used;
10875 qty -= charg_used;
10876 }
10877
10878 // Modded tools can consume UPS/bionic energy instead of ammo.
10879 // Guns handle energy in energy_consume()
10880 if( carrier != nullptr && type->tool &&
10881 ( has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) || has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) ) {
10882 units::energy wanted_energy = units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( qty ) );
10883
10884 if( has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
10885 wanted_energy -= carrier->consume_ups( wanted_energy );
10886 }
10887
10888 if( has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
10889 units::energy bio_used = std::min( carrier->get_power_level(), wanted_energy );
10890 carrier->mod_power_level( -bio_used );
10891 wanted_energy -= bio_used;
10892 }
10893
10894 // It is possible for this to cause rounding error due to different precision of energy
10895 // But that can happen only if there was not enough ammo and you shouldn't be able to use without sufficient ammo
10896 qty = units::to_kilojoule( wanted_energy );
10897 }
10898 return wanted_qty - qty;
10899}
10900
10901units::energy item::energy_consume( units::energy qty, const tripoint &pos, Character *carrier,
10902 float fuel_efficiency )
10903{
10904 if( qty < 0_kJ ) {
10905 debugmsg( "Cannot consume negative quantity of energy for %s", tname() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "10905", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Cannot consume negative quantity of energy for %s"
, tname());
10906 return 0_kJ;
10907 }
10908
10909 const units::energy wanted_energy = qty;
10910
10911 // Consume battery(ammo) and other fuel (if allowed)
10912 if( is_battery() || fuel_efficiency >= 0 ) {
10913 int consumed_kj = contents.ammo_consume( units::to_kilojoule( qty ), pos, fuel_efficiency );
10914 qty -= units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( consumed_kj ) );
10915 // fix negative quantity
10916 if( qty < 0_J ) {
10917 qty = 0_J;
10918 }
10919 }
10920
10921 // Consume energy from contained magazine
10922 if( magazine_current() ) {
10923 qty -= magazine_current()->energy_consume( qty, pos, carrier );
10924 }
10925
10926 // Consume UPS energy from various sources
10927 if( carrier != nullptr && has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
10928 qty -= carrier->consume_ups( qty );
10929 }
10930
10931 // Consume bio energy
10932 if( carrier != nullptr && has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
10933 units::energy bio_used = std::min( carrier->get_power_level(), qty );
10934 carrier->mod_power_level( -bio_used );
10935 qty -= bio_used;
10936 }
10937
10938 // If consumption is not integer kJ we need to consume one extra battery charge to "round up".
10939 // Should happen only if battery powered and energy per shot is not integer kJ.
10940 if( qty > 0_kJ && is_battery() ) {
10941 int consumed_kj = contents.ammo_consume( 1, pos );
10942 qty -= units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( consumed_kj ) );
10943 }
10944
10945 return wanted_energy - qty;
10946}
10947
10948int item::activation_consume( int qty, const tripoint &pos, Character *carrier )
10949{
10950 return ammo_consume( qty * ammo_required(), pos, carrier );
10951}
10952
10953const itype *item::ammo_data() const
10954{
10955 const item *mag = magazine_current();
10956 if( mag ) {
10957 return mag->ammo_data();
10958 }
10959
10960 if( is_ammo() ) {
10961 return type;
10962 }
10963
10964 if( is_magazine() ) {
10965 return !contents.empty() ? contents.first_ammo().ammo_data() : nullptr;
10966 }
10967
10968 auto mods = is_gun() ? gunmods() : toolmods();
10969 for( const item *e : mods ) {
10970 if( !e->type->mod->ammo_modifier.empty() && !e->ammo_current().is_null() &&
10971 item_controller->has_template( e->ammo_current() ) ) {
10972 return item_controller->find_template( e->ammo_current() );
10973 }
10974 }
10975
10976 return nullptr;
10977}
10978
10979itype_id item::ammo_current() const
10980{
10981 const itype *ammo = ammo_data();
10982 if( ammo ) {
10983 return ammo->get_id();
10984 }
10985
10986 return itype_id::NULL_ID();
10987}
10988
10989const item &item::loaded_ammo() const
10990{
10991 const item *mag = magazine_current();
10992 if( mag ) {
10993 return mag->loaded_ammo();
10994 }
10995
10996 if( is_magazine() ) {
10997 return !contents.empty() ? contents.first_ammo() : null_item_reference();
10998 }
10999
11000 auto mods = is_gun() ? gunmods() : toolmods();
11001 for( const item *e : mods ) {
11002 const item &mod_ammo = e->loaded_ammo();
11003 if( !mod_ammo.is_null() ) {
11004 return mod_ammo;
11005 }
11006 }
11007
11008 if( is_gun() && ammo_remaining() != 0 ) {
11009 return contents.first_ammo();
11010 }
11011 return null_item_reference();
11012}
11013
11014std::set<ammotype> item::ammo_types( bool conversion ) const
11015{
11016 if( conversion ) {
11017 const std::vector<const item *> &mods = is_gun() ? gunmods() : toolmods();
11018 for( const item *e : mods ) {
11019 if( !e->type->mod->ammo_modifier.empty() ) {
11020 return e->type->mod->ammo_modifier;
11021 }
11022 }
11023 }
11024
11025 if( is_gun() ) {
11026 return type->gun->ammo;
11027 }
11028 return contents.ammo_types();
11029}
11030
11031ammotype item::ammo_type() const
11032{
11033 if( is_ammo() ) {
11034 return type->ammo->type;
11035 }
11036 return ammotype::NULL_ID();
11037}
11038
11039itype_id item::ammo_default( bool conversion ) const
11040{
11041 if( !ammo_types( conversion ).empty() ) {
11042 itype_id res = ammotype( *ammo_types( conversion ).begin() )->default_ammotype();
11043 if( !res.is_empty() ) {
11044 return res;
11045 }
11046 }
11047
11048 return itype_id::NULL_ID();
11049}
11050
11051std::string item::print_ammo( ammotype at, const item *gun ) const
11052{
11053 const item *mag = magazine_current();
11054 if( mag ) {
11055 return mag->print_ammo( at, this );
11056 } else if( has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
11057 return _( "energy" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "energy" ) ) );
11058 }
11059
11060 // for magazines if we have a gun in mind display damage as well
11061 if( type->magazine ) {
11062 if( gun ) {
11063 return enumerate_as_string( type->magazine->cached_ammos[at],
11064 [gun]( const itype_id & id ) {
11065 return string_format( "<info>%s</info>(%d)", id->nname( 1 ),
11066 static_cast<int>( gun->gun_damage( id ).total_damage() ) );
11067 } );
11068 } else {
11069 return enumerate_as_string( type->magazine->cached_ammos[at],
11070 []( const itype_id & id ) {
11071 return string_format( "<info>%s</info>", id->nname( 1 ) );
11072 } );
11073 }
11074 }
11075
11076 if( type->gun ) {
11077 return enumerate_as_string( type->gun->cached_ammos[at],
11078 [this]( const itype_id & id ) {
11079 return string_format( "<info>%s(%d)</info>", id->nname( 1 ),
11080 static_cast<int>( gun_damage( id ).total_damage() ) );
11081 } );
11082 }
11083
11084 return "";
11085}
11086
11087itype_id item::common_ammo_default( bool conversion ) const
11088{
11089 for( const ammotype &at : ammo_types( conversion ) ) {
11090 const item *mag = magazine_current();
11091 if( mag && mag->type->magazine->type.count( at ) ) {
11092 itype_id res = at->default_ammotype();
11093 if( !res.is_empty() ) {
11094 return res;
11095 }
11096 }
11097 }
11098 return itype_id::NULL_ID();
11099}
11100
11101std::set<std::string> item::ammo_effects( bool with_ammo ) const
11102{
11103 if( !is_gun() ) {
11104 return std::set<std::string>();
11105 }
11106
11107 std::set<std::string> res = type->gun->ammo_effects;
11108 if( with_ammo && ammo_data() ) {
11109 res.insert( ammo_data()->ammo->ammo_effects.begin(), ammo_data()->ammo->ammo_effects.end() );
11110 }
11111
11112 for( const item *mod : gunmods() ) {
11113 res.insert( mod->type->gunmod->ammo_effects.begin(), mod->type->gunmod->ammo_effects.end() );
11114 }
11115
11116 return res;
11117}
11118
11119std::string item::ammo_sort_name() const
11120{
11121 if( is_magazine() || is_gun() || is_tool() ) {
11122 const std::set<ammotype> &types = ammo_types();
11123 if( !types.empty() ) {
11124 return ammotype( *types.begin() )->name();
11125 }
11126 }
11127 if( is_ammo() ) {
11128 return ammo_type()->name();
11129 }
11130 return "";
11131}
11132
11133bool item::magazine_integral() const
11134{
11135 return contents.has_pocket_type( pocket_type::MAGAZINE );
11136}
11137
11138bool item::uses_magazine() const
11139{
11140 return contents.has_pocket_type( pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL );
11141}
11142
11143itype_id item::magazine_default( bool conversion ) const
11144{
11145 // consider modded ammo types
11146 itype_id ammo;
11147 if( conversion && ( ammo = ammo_default(), !ammo.is_null() ) ) {
11148 for( const itype_id &mag : contents.magazine_compatible() ) {
11149 auto mag_types = mag->magazine->type;
11150 if( mag_types.find( ammo->ammo->type ) != mag_types.end() ) {
11151 return mag;
11152 }
11153 }
11154 }
11155
11156 // otherwise return the default
11157 return contents.magazine_default();
11158}
11159
11160std::set<itype_id> item::magazine_compatible() const
11161{
11162 return contents.magazine_compatible();
11163}
11164
11165item *item::magazine_current()
11166{
11167 return contents.magazine_current();
11168}
11169
11170const item *item::magazine_current() const
11171{
11172 return const_cast<item *>( this )->magazine_current();
11173}
11174
11175std::vector<item *> item::gunmods()
11176{
11177 return contents.gunmods();
11178}
11179
11180std::vector<const item *> item::gunmods() const
11181{
11182 return contents.gunmods();
11183}
11184
11185std::vector<const item *> item::mods() const
11186{
11187 return contents.mods();
11188}
11189
11190std::vector<const item *> item::softwares() const
11191{
11192 return contents.softwares();
11193}
11194
11195std::vector<const item *> item::ebooks() const
11196{
11197 return contents.ebooks();
11198}
11199
11200std::vector<const item *> item::cables() const
11201{
11202 return contents.cables();
11203}
11204
11205item *item::gunmod_find( const itype_id &mod )
11206{
11207 std::vector<item *> mods = gunmods();
11208 auto it = std::find_if( mods.begin(), mods.end(), [&mod]( item * e ) {
11209 return e->typeId() == mod;
11210 } );
11211 return it != mods.end() ? *it : nullptr;
11212}
11213
11214const item *item::gunmod_find( const itype_id &mod ) const
11215{
11216 return const_cast<item *>( this )->gunmod_find( mod );
11217}
11218
11219item *item::gunmod_find_by_flag( const flag_id &flag )
11220{
11221 std::vector<item *> mods = gunmods();
11222 auto it = std::find_if( mods.begin(), mods.end(), [&flag]( item * e ) {
11223 return e->has_flag( flag );
11224 } );
11225 return it != mods.end() ? *it : nullptr;
11226}
11227
11228ret_val<void> item::is_gunmod_compatible( const item &mod ) const
11229{
11230 if( !mod.is_gunmod() ) {
11231 debugmsg( "Tried checking compatibility of non-gunmod" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "11231", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried checking compatibility of non-gunmod"
);
11232 return ret_val<void>::make_failure();
11233 }
11234 static const gun_type_type pistol_gun_type( translate_marker_context( "gun_type_type", "pistol" )"pistol" );
11235
11236 if( !is_gun() ) {
11237 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "isn't a weapon" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "isn't a weapon" ) ) ) );
11238
11239 } else if( is_gunmod() ) {
11240 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "is a gunmod and cannot be modded" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "is a gunmod and cannot be modded"
) ) ) );
11241
11242 } else if( gunmod_find( mod.typeId() ) ) {
11243 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "already has a %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "already has a %s" ) ) ), mod.tname( 1 ) );
11244
11245 } else if( !get_mod_locations().count( mod.type->gunmod->location ) ) {
11246 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "doesn't have a slot for this mod" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "doesn't have a slot for this mod"
) ) ) );
11247
11248 } else if( get_free_mod_locations( mod.type->gunmod->location ) <= 0 ) {
11249 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "doesn't have enough room for another %s mod" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "doesn't have enough room for another %s mod"
) ) ),
11250 mod.type->gunmod->location.name() );
11251
11252 } else if( !mod.type->gunmod->usable.count( gun_type() ) &&
11253 !mod.type->gunmod->usable.count( gun_type_type( typeId().str() ) ) ) {
11254 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "cannot have a %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "cannot have a %s" ) ) ), mod.tname() );
11255
11256 } else if( typeId() == itype_hand_crossbow &&
11257 !mod.type->gunmod->usable.count( pistol_gun_type ) ) {
11258 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "isn't big enough to use that mod" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "isn't big enough to use that mod"
) ) ) );
11259
11260 } else if( mod.type->gunmod->location.str() == "underbarrel" &&
11261 !mod.has_flag( flag_PUMP_RAIL_COMPATIBLE ) && has_flag( flag_PUMP_ACTION ) ) {
11262 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "can only accept small mods on that slot" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "can only accept small mods on that slot"
) ) ) );
11263
11264 } else if( !mod.type->mod->acceptable_ammo.empty() ) {
11265 bool compat_ammo = false;
11266 for( const ammotype &at : mod.type->mod->acceptable_ammo ) {
11267 if( ammo_types( false ).count( at ) ) {
11268 compat_ammo = true;
11269 }
11270 }
11271 if( !compat_ammo ) {
11272 return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
11273 _( "%1$s cannot be used on item with no compatible ammo types" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s cannot be used on item with no compatible ammo types"
) ) ), mod.tname( 1 ) );
11274 }
11275 } else if( mod.typeId() == itype_waterproof_gunmod && has_flag( flag_WATERPROOF_GUN ) ) {
11276 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "is already waterproof" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "is already waterproof" ) ) ) );
11277
11278 } else if( mod.typeId() == itype_tuned_mechanism && has_flag( flag_NEVER_JAMS ) ) {
11279 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "is already eminently reliable" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "is already eminently reliable"
) ) ) );
11280
11281 } else if( mod.typeId() == itype_brass_catcher && has_flag( flag_RELOAD_EJECT ) ) {
11282 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "cannot have a brass catcher" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "cannot have a brass catcher"
) ) ) );
11283
11284 } else if( ( mod.type->gunmod->location.name() == "magazine" ||
11285 mod.type->gunmod->location.name() == "mechanism" ) &&
11286 ( ammo_remaining() > 0 || magazine_current() ) ) {
11287 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "must be unloaded before installing this mod" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "must be unloaded before installing this mod"
) ) ) );
11288
11289 } else if( gunmod_find( itype_stock_none ) &&
11290 mod.type->gunmod->location.name() == "stock accessory" ) {
11291 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "doesn't have a stock to attach this mod" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "doesn't have a stock to attach this mod"
) ) ) );
11292 }
11293
11294 for( const gunmod_location &slot : mod.type->gunmod->blacklist_slot ) {
11295 if( get_mod_locations().count( slot ) ) {
11296 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "cannot be installed on a weapon with \"%s\"" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "cannot be installed on a weapon with \"%s\""
) ) ),
11297 slot.name() );
11298 }
11299 }
11300
11301 for( const itype_id &testmod : mod.type->gunmod->blacklist_mod ) {
11302 if( gunmod_find( testmod ) ) {
11303 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "cannot be installed on a weapon with a \"%s\"" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "cannot be installed on a weapon with a \"%s\""
) ) ),
11304 ( testmod->nname( 1 ) ) );
11305 }
11306 }
11307
11308 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
11309}
11310
11311std::map<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> item::gun_all_modes() const
11312{
11313 std::map<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> res;
11314
11315 if( !is_gun() && !is_gunmod() ) {
11316 return res;
11317 }
11318
11319 std::vector<const item *> opts = gunmods();
11320 opts.push_back( this );
11321
11322 for( const item *e : opts ) {
11323
11324 // handle base item plus any auxiliary gunmods
11325 if( e->is_gun() ) {
11326 for( const std::pair<const gun_mode_id, gun_modifier_data> &m : e->type->gun->modes ) {
11327 // prefix attached gunmods, e.g. M203_DEFAULT to avoid index key collisions
11328 std::string prefix = e->is_gunmod() ? ( std::string( e->typeId() ) += "_" ) : "";
11329 std::transform( prefix.begin(), prefix.end(), prefix.begin(),
11330 static_cast<int( * )( int )>( toupper ) );
11331
11332 const int qty = m.second.qty();
11333
11334 res.emplace( gun_mode_id( prefix + m.first.str() ), gun_mode( m.second.name(),
11335 const_cast<item *>( e ),
11336 qty, m.second.flags() ) );
11337 }
11338
11339 // non-auxiliary gunmods may provide additional modes for the base item
11340 } else if( e->is_gunmod() ) {
11341 for( const std::pair<const gun_mode_id, gun_modifier_data> &m : e->type->gunmod->mode_modifier ) {
11342 //checks for melee gunmod, points to gunmod
11343 if( m.first == gun_mode_REACH ) {
11344 res.emplace( m.first, gun_mode { m.second.name(), const_cast<item *>( e ),
11345 m.second.qty(), m.second.flags() } );
11346 //otherwise points to the parent gun, not the gunmod
11347 } else {
11348 res.emplace( m.first, gun_mode { m.second.name(), const_cast<item *>( this ),
11349 m.second.qty(), m.second.flags() } );
11350 }
11351 }
11352 }
11353 }
11354
11355 return res;
11356}
11357
11358gun_mode item::gun_get_mode( const gun_mode_id &mode ) const
11359{
11360 if( is_gun() ) {
11361 for( const std::pair<const gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &e : gun_all_modes() ) {
11362 if( e.first == mode ) {
11363 return e.second;
11364 }
11365 }
11366 }
11367 return gun_mode();
11368}
11369
11370gun_mode item::gun_current_mode() const
11371{
11372 return gun_get_mode( gun_get_mode_id() );
11373}
11374
11375gun_mode_id item::gun_get_mode_id() const
11376{
11377 if( !is_gun() || is_gunmod() ) {
11378 return gun_mode_id();
11379 }
11380 return gun_mode_id( get_var( GUN_MODE_VAR_NAME, "DEFAULT" ) );
11381}
11382
11383bool item::gun_set_mode( const gun_mode_id &mode )
11384{
11385 if( !is_gun() || is_gunmod() || !gun_all_modes().count( mode ) ) {
11386 return false;
11387 }
11388 set_var( GUN_MODE_VAR_NAME, mode.str() );
11389 return true;
11390}
11391
11392void item::gun_cycle_mode()
11393{
11394 if( !is_gun() || is_gunmod() ) {
11395 return;
11396 }
11397
11398 const gun_mode_id cur = gun_get_mode_id();
11399 const std::map<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> modes = gun_all_modes();
11400
11401 for( auto iter = modes.begin(); iter != modes.end(); ++iter ) {
11402 if( iter->first == cur ) {
11403 if( std::next( iter ) == modes.end() ) {
11404 break;
11405 }
11406 gun_set_mode( std::next( iter )->first );
11407 return;
11408 }
11409 }
11410 gun_set_mode( modes.begin()->first );
11411}
11412
11413const use_function *item::get_use( const std::string &use_name ) const
11414{
11415 const use_function *fun = nullptr;
11416 visit_items(
11417 [&fun, &use_name]( const item * it, auto ) {
11418 if( it == nullptr ) {
11419 return VisitResponse::SKIP;
11420 }
11421 fun = it->get_use_internal( use_name );
11422 if( fun != nullptr ) {
11423 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
11424 }
11425 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
11426 } );
11427
11428 return fun;
11429}
11430
11431const use_function *item::get_use_internal( const std::string &use_name ) const
11432{
11433 if( type != nullptr ) {
11434 return type->get_use( use_name );
11435 }
11436 return nullptr;
11437}
11438
11439template<typename Item>
11440Item *item::get_usable_item_helper( Item &self, const std::string &use_name )
11441{
11442 Item *ret = nullptr;
11443 self.visit_items(
11444 [&ret, &use_name]( item * it, auto ) {
11445 if( it == nullptr ) {
11446 return VisitResponse::SKIP;
11447 }
11448 if( it->get_use_internal( use_name ) ) {
11449 ret = it;
11450 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
11451 }
11452 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
11453 } );
11454
11455 return ret;
11456}
11457
11458const item *item::get_usable_item( const std::string &use_name ) const
11459{
11460 return get_usable_item_helper( *this, use_name );
11461}
11462
11463item *item::get_usable_item( const std::string &use_name )
11464{
11465 return get_usable_item_helper( *this, use_name );
11466}
11467
11468item::reload_option::reload_option( const reload_option & ) = default;
11469
11470item::reload_option &item::reload_option::operator=( const reload_option & ) = default;
11471
11472item::reload_option::reload_option( const Character *who, const item_location &target,
11473 const item_location &ammo ) :
11474 who( who ), target( target ), ammo( ammo )
11475{
11476 if( this->target->is_ammo_belt() && this->target->type->magazine->linkage ) {
11477 max_qty = this->who->charges_of( * this->target->type->magazine->linkage );
11478 }
11479 qty( max_qty );
11480}
11481
11482int item::reload_option::moves() const
11483{
11484 int mv = ammo.obtain_cost( *who, qty() ) + who->item_reload_cost( *target, *ammo, qty() );
11485 if( target.has_parent() ) {
11486 item_location parent = target.parent_item();
11487 if( parent->is_gun() && !target->is_gunmod() ) {
11488 mv += parent->get_reload_time() * 1.5;
11489 } else if( parent->is_tool() ) {
11490 mv += 100;
11491 }
11492 }
11493 return mv;
11494}
11495
11496void item::reload_option::qty( int val )
11497{
11498 bool ammo_in_container = ammo->is_ammo_container();
11499 bool ammo_in_liquid_container = ammo->is_watertight_container();
11500 item &ammo_obj = ( ammo_in_container || ammo_in_liquid_container ) ?
11501 // this is probably not the right way to do this. there is no guarantee whatsoever that ammo_obj will be an ammo
11502 *ammo->contents.all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ).front() : *ammo;
11503
11504 if( ( ammo_in_container && !ammo_obj.is_ammo() ) ||
11505 ( ammo_in_liquid_container && !ammo_obj.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) ) {
11506 debugmsg( "Invalid reload option: %s", ammo_obj.tname() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "11506", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Invalid reload option: %s", ammo_obj
.tname());
11507 return;
11508 }
11509
11510 // Checking ammo capacity implicitly limits guns with removable magazines to capacity 0.
11511 // This gets rounded up to 1 later.
11512 int remaining_capacity = target->is_watertight_container() ?
11513 target->get_remaining_capacity_for_liquid( ammo_obj, true ) :
11514 target->remaining_ammo_capacity();
11515 if( target->has_flag( flag_RELOAD_ONE ) &&
11516 !( ammo->has_flag( flag_SPEEDLOADER ) || ammo->has_flag( flag_SPEEDLOADER_CLIP ) ) ) {
11517 remaining_capacity = 1;
11518 }
11519 if( ammo_obj.type->ammo ) {
11520 if( ammo_obj.ammo_type() == ammo_plutonium ) {
11521 remaining_capacity = remaining_capacity / PLUTONIUM_CHARGES +
11522 ( remaining_capacity % PLUTONIUM_CHARGES != 0 );
11523 }
11524 }
11525
11526 bool ammo_by_charges = ammo_obj.is_ammo() || ammo_in_liquid_container;
11527 int available_ammo;
11528 if( ammo->has_flag( flag_SPEEDLOADER ) || ammo->has_flag( flag_SPEEDLOADER_CLIP ) ) {
11529 available_ammo = ammo_obj.ammo_remaining();
11530 } else {
11531 available_ammo = ammo_by_charges ? ammo_obj.charges : ammo_obj.count();
11532 }
11533 // constrain by available ammo, target capacity and other external factors (max_qty)
11534 // @ref max_qty is currently set when reloading ammo belts and limits to available linkages
11535 qty_ = std::min( { val, available_ammo, remaining_capacity, max_qty } );
11536
11537 // always expect to reload at least one charge
11538 qty_ = std::max( qty_, 1 );
11539
11540}
11541
11542int item::casings_count() const
11543{
11544 int res = 0;
11545
11546 const_cast<item *>( this )->casings_handle( [&res]( item & ) {
11547 ++res;
11548 return false;
11549 } );
11550
11551 return res;
11552}
11553
11554void item::casings_handle( const std::function<bool( item & )> &func )
11555{
11556 if( !is_gun() && !is_tool() ) {
11557 return;
11558 }
11559 contents.casings_handle( func );
11560}
11561
11562bool item::reload( Character &u, item_location ammo, int qty )
11563{
11564 if( qty <= 0 ) {
11565 debugmsg( "Tried to reload zero or less charges" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "11565", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to reload zero or less charges"
);
11566 return false;
11567 }
11568
11569 if( !ammo ) {
11570 debugmsg( "Tried to reload using non-existent ammo" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "11570", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to reload using non-existent ammo"
);
11571 return false;
11572 }
11573
11574 if( !can_reload_with( *ammo.get_item(), true ) ) {
11575 return false;
11576 }
11577
11578 bool ammo_from_map = !ammo.held_by( u );
11579 if( ammo->has_flag( flag_SPEEDLOADER ) || ammo->has_flag( flag_SPEEDLOADER_CLIP ) ) {
11580 // if the thing passed in is a speed loader, we want the ammo
11581 ammo = item_location( ammo, &ammo->first_ammo() );
11582 }
11583
11584 // limit quantity of ammo loaded to remaining capacity
11585 int limit = 0;
11586 if( is_watertight_container() && ammo->made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
11587 limit = get_remaining_capacity_for_liquid( *ammo );
11588 } else if( ammo->is_ammo() ) {
11589 limit = ammo_capacity( ammo->ammo_type() ) - ammo_remaining();
11590 }
11591
11592 if( ammo->ammo_type() == ammo_plutonium ) {
11593 limit = limit / PLUTONIUM_CHARGES + ( limit % PLUTONIUM_CHARGES != 0 );
11594 }
11595
11596 qty = std::min( qty, limit );
11597
11598 casings_handle( [&u]( item & e ) {
11599 return u.i_add_or_drop( e );
11600 } );
11601
11602 if( is_magazine() ) {
11603 qty = std::min( qty, ammo->charges );
11604
11605 if( is_ammo_belt() && type->magazine->linkage ) {
11606 if( !u.use_charges_if_avail( *type->magazine->linkage, qty ) ) {
11607 debugmsg( "insufficient linkages available when reloading ammo belt" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "11607", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "insufficient linkages available when reloading ammo belt"
);
11608 }
11609 }
11610
11611 item item_copy( *ammo );
11612 ammo->charges -= qty;
11613
11614 if( ammo->ammo_type() == ammo_plutonium ) {
11615 // any excess is wasted rather than overfilling the item
11616 item_copy.charges = std::min( qty * PLUTONIUM_CHARGES, ammo_capacity( ammo_plutonium ) );
11617 } else {
11618 item_copy.charges = qty;
11619 }
11620
11621 put_in( item_copy, pocket_type::MAGAZINE );
11622
11623 } else if( is_watertight_container() && ammo->made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
11624 item contents( *ammo );
11625 fill_with( contents, qty );
11626 if( ammo.has_parent() ) {
11627 ammo.parent_item()->contained_where( *ammo.get_item() )->on_contents_changed();
11628 }
11629 ammo->charges -= qty;
11630 } else {
11631 item magazine_removed;
11632 bool allow_wield = false;
11633 // if we already have a magazine loaded prompt to eject it
11634 if( magazine_current() ) {
11635 // we don't want to replace wielded `ammo` with ejected magazine
11636 // as it will invalidate `ammo`. Also keep wielding the item being reloaded.
11637 allow_wield = ( !u.is_wielding( *ammo ) && !u.is_wielding( *this ) );
11638 // Defer placing the magazine into inventory until new magazine is installed.
11639 magazine_removed = *magazine_current();
11640 remove_item( *magazine_current() );
11641 }
11642
11643 put_in( *ammo, pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL );
11644 ammo.remove_item();
11645 if( ammo_from_map ) {
11646 u.invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
11647 }
11648 if( magazine_removed.type != nullitem() ) {
11649 u.i_add( magazine_removed, true, nullptr, nullptr, true, allow_wield );
11650 }
11651 return true;
11652 }
11653
11654 if( ammo->charges == 0 ) {
11655 ammo.remove_item();
11656 }
11657 if( ammo_from_map ) {
11658 u.invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
11659 }
11660 return true;
11661}
11662
11663float item::simulate_burn( fire_data &frd ) const
11664{
11665 const std::map<material_id, int> &mats = made_of();
11666 float smoke_added = 0.0f;
11667 float time_added = 0.0f;
11668 float burn_added = 0.0f;
11669 const units::volume vol = base_volume();
11670 const int effective_intensity = frd.contained ? 3 : frd.fire_intensity;
11671 for( const auto &m : mats ) {
11672 const mat_burn_data &bd = m.first->burn_data( effective_intensity );
11673 if( bd.immune ) {
11674 // Made to protect from fire
11675 return 0.0f;
11676 }
11677
11678 // If fire is contained, burn rate is independent of volume
11679 if( frd.contained || bd.volume_per_turn == 0_ml ) {
11680 time_added += bd.fuel * m.second;
11681 smoke_added += bd.smoke * m.second;
11682 burn_added += bd.burn * m.second;
11683 } else {
11684 double volume_burn_rate = to_liter( bd.volume_per_turn ) / to_liter( vol );
11685 time_added += bd.fuel * volume_burn_rate * m.second;
11686 smoke_added += bd.smoke * volume_burn_rate * m.second;
11687 burn_added += bd.burn * volume_burn_rate * m.second;
11688 }
11689 }
11690 const int mat_total = type->mat_portion_total == 0 ? 1 : type->mat_portion_total;
11691
11692 // Liquids that don't burn well smother fire well instead
11693 if( made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && time_added < 200 ) {
11694 time_added -= rng( 400.0 * to_liter( vol ), 1200.0 * to_liter( vol ) );
11695 } else if( mats.size() > 1 ) {
11696 // Average the materials
11697 time_added /= mat_total;
11698 smoke_added /= mat_total;
11699 burn_added /= mat_total;
11700 } else if( mats.empty() ) {
11701 // Non-liquid items with no specified materials will burn at moderate speed
11702 burn_added = 1;
11703 }
11704
11705 if( count_by_charges() ) {
11706 int stack_burnt = rng( type->stack_size / 2, type->stack_size );
11707 time_added *= stack_burnt;
11708 smoke_added *= stack_burnt;
11709 burn_added *= stack_burnt;
11710 }
11711
11712 frd.fuel_produced += time_added;
11713 frd.smoke_produced += smoke_added;
11714 return burn_added;
11715}
11716
11717bool item::burn( fire_data &frd )
11718{
11719 if( has_flag( flag_UNBREAKABLE ) ) {
11720 return false;
11721 }
11722 float burn_added = simulate_burn( frd );
11723
11724 if( burn_added <= 0 ) {
11725 return false;
11726 }
11727
11728 if( count_by_charges() ) {
11729 if( type->volume == 0_ml ) {
11730 charges = 0;
11731 } else {
11732 charges -= roll_remainder( burn_added * units::legacy_volume_factor * type->stack_size /
11733 ( 3.0 * type->volume ) );
11734 }
11735
11736 return charges <= 0;
11737 }
11738
11739 if( is_corpse() ) {
11740 const mtype *mt = get_mtype();
11741 if( active && mt != nullptr && burnt + burn_added > mt->hp &&
11742 !mt->burn_into.is_null() && mt->burn_into.is_valid() ) {
11743 corpse = &get_mtype()->burn_into.obj();
11744 // Delay rezing
11745 set_age( 0_turns );
11746 burnt = 0;
11747 return false;
11748 }
11749 } else if( has_temperature() ) {
11750 heat_up();
11751 }
11752
11753 contents.heat_up();
11754
11755 burnt += roll_remainder( burn_added );
11756
11757 const int vol = base_volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor;
11758 return burnt >= vol * 3;
11759}
11760
11761bool item::flammable( int threshold ) const
11762{
11763 const std::map<material_id, int> &mats = made_of();
11764 if( mats.empty() ) {
11765 // Don't know how to burn down something made of nothing.
11766 return false;
11767 }
11768
11769 int flammability = 0;
11770 units::volume volume_per_turn = 0_ml;
11771 for( const std::pair<material_id, int> m : mats ) {
11772 const mat_burn_data &bd = m.first->burn_data( 1 );
11773 if( bd.immune ) {
11774 // Made to protect from fire
11775 return false;
11776 }
11777
11778 flammability += bd.fuel * m.second;
11779 volume_per_turn += bd.volume_per_turn * m.second;
11780 }
11781 const int total = type->mat_portion_total == 0 ? 1 : type->mat_portion_total;
11782 flammability /= total;
11783 volume_per_turn /= total;
11784
11785 if( threshold == 0 || flammability <= 0 ) {
11786 return flammability > 0;
11787 }
11788
11789 units::volume vol = base_volume();
11790 if( volume_per_turn > 0_ml && volume_per_turn < vol ) {
11791 flammability = flammability * volume_per_turn / vol;
11792 } else {
11793 // If it burns well, it provides a bonus here
11794 flammability = flammability * vol / units::legacy_volume_factor;
11795 }
11796
11797 return flammability > threshold;
11798}
11799
11800itype_id item::typeId() const
11801{
11802 return type ? type->get_id() : itype_id::NULL_ID();
11803}
11804
11805bool item::getlight( float &luminance, units::angle &width, units::angle &direction ) const
11806{
11807 luminance = 0;
11808 width = 0_degrees;
11809 direction = 0_degrees;
11810 if( light.luminance > 0 ) {
11811 luminance = static_cast<float>( light.luminance );
11812 if( light.width > 0 ) { // width > 0 is a light arc
11813 width = units::from_degrees( light.width );
11814 direction = units::from_degrees( light.direction );
11815 }
11816 return true;
11817 } else {
11818 const int lumint = getlight_emit();
11819 if( lumint > 0 ) {
11820 luminance = static_cast<float>( lumint );
11821 return true;
11822 }
11823 }
11824 return false;
11825}
11826
11827int item::getlight_emit() const
11828{
11829 float lumint = type->light_emission;
11830
11831 if( lumint == 0 ) {
11832 return 0;
11833 }
11834
11835 if( ammo_required() == 0 || ( has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) && ammo_capacity( ammo_battery ) == 0 ) ||
11836 has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
11837 return lumint;
11838 }
11839 if( ammo_remaining( true ) == 0 ) {
11840 return 0;
11841 }
11842 if( has_flag( flag_CHARGEDIM ) && is_tool() && !has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
11843 // Falloff starts at 1/5 total charge and scales linearly from there to 0.
11844 const ammotype &loaded_ammo = ammo_data()->ammo->type;
11845 if( ammo_capacity( loaded_ammo ) &&
11846 ammo_remaining( true ) < ( ammo_capacity( loaded_ammo ) / 5 ) ) {
11847 lumint *= ammo_remaining( true ) * 5.0 / ammo_capacity( loaded_ammo );
11848 }
11849 }
11850 return lumint;
11851}
11852
11853units::volume item::get_total_capacity( const bool unrestricted_pockets_only ) const
11854{
11855 return contents.total_container_capacity( unrestricted_pockets_only );
11856}
11857
11858units::mass item::get_total_weight_capacity( const bool unrestricted_pockets_only ) const
11859{
11860 return contents.total_container_weight_capacity( unrestricted_pockets_only );
11861}
11862
11863units::volume item::get_remaining_capacity( const bool unrestricted_pockets_only ) const
11864{
11865 return contents.remaining_container_capacity( unrestricted_pockets_only );
11866}
11867units::mass item::get_remaining_weight_capacity( const bool unrestricted_pockets_only ) const
11868{
11869 return contents.remaining_container_capacity_weight( unrestricted_pockets_only );
11870}
11871
11872units::volume item::get_total_contained_volume( const bool unrestricted_pockets_only ) const
11873{
11874 return contents.total_contained_volume( unrestricted_pockets_only );
11875}
11876units::mass item::get_total_contained_weight( const bool unrestricted_pockets_only ) const
11877{
11878 return contents.total_contained_weight( unrestricted_pockets_only );
11879}
11880
11881int item::get_used_holsters() const
11882{
11883 return contents.get_used_holsters();
11884}
11885int item::get_total_holsters() const
11886{
11887 return contents.get_total_holsters();
11888}
11889units::volume item::get_total_holster_volume() const
11890{
11891 return contents.get_total_holster_volume();
11892}
11893units::volume item::get_used_holster_volume() const
11894{
11895 return contents.get_used_holster_volume();
11896}
11897units::mass item::get_total_holster_weight() const
11898{
11899 return contents.get_total_holster_weight();
11900}
11901units::mass item::get_used_holster_weight() const
11902{
11903 return contents.get_used_holster_weight();
11904}
11905
11906int item::get_remaining_capacity_for_liquid( const item &liquid, bool allow_bucket,
11907 std::string *err ) const
11908{
11909 const auto error = [ &err ]( const std::string & message ) {
11910 if( err != nullptr ) {
11911 *err = message;
11912 }
11913 return 0;
11914 };
11915
11916 int remaining_capacity = 0;
11917
11918 if( can_contain_partial( liquid ).success() ) {
11919 if( !contents.can_contain_liquid( allow_bucket ) ) {
11920 return error( string_format( _( "That %s must be on the ground or held to hold contents!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "That %s must be on the ground or held to hold contents!"
) ) ),
11921 tname() ) );
11922 }
11923 remaining_capacity = contents.remaining_capacity_for_liquid( liquid );
11924 } else {
11925 return error( string_format( _( "That %1$s won't hold %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "That %1$s won't hold %2$s." )
) ), tname(),
11926 liquid.tname() ) );
11927 }
11928
11929 if( remaining_capacity <= 0 ) {
11930 return error( string_format( _( "Your %1$s can't hold any more %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %1$s can't hold any more %2$s."
) ) ), tname(),
11931 liquid.tname() ) );
11932 }
11933
11934 return remaining_capacity;
11935}
11936
11937int item::get_remaining_capacity_for_liquid( const item &liquid, const Character &p,
11938 std::string *err ) const
11939{
11940 const bool allow_bucket = ( p.get_wielded_item() && this == &*p.get_wielded_item() ) ||
11941 !p.has_item( *this );
11942 int res = get_remaining_capacity_for_liquid( liquid, allow_bucket, err );
11943
11944 if( res > 0 ) {
11945 res = std::min( contents.remaining_capacity_for_liquid( liquid ), res );
11946
11947 if( res == 0 && err != nullptr ) {
11948 *err = string_format( _( "That %s doesn't have room to expand." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "That %s doesn't have room to expand."
) ) ), tname() );
11949 }
11950 }
11951
11952 return res;
11953}
11954
11955units::volume item::total_contained_volume() const
11956{
11957 return contents.total_contained_volume();
11958}
11959
11960bool item::use_amount( const itype_id &it, int &quantity, std::list<item> &used,
11961 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter )
11962{
11963 if( is_null() ) {
11964 return false;
11965 }
11966 // Remember quantity so that we can unseal self
11967 int old_quantity = quantity;
11968 std::vector<item *> removed_items;
11969 for( item *contained : all_items_ptr( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
11970 if( contained->use_amount_internal( it, quantity, used, filter ) ) {
11971 removed_items.push_back( contained );
11972 }
11973 }
11974
11975 for( item *removed : removed_items ) {
11976 this->remove_item( *removed );
11977 }
11978
11979 if( quantity != old_quantity ) {
11980 on_contents_changed();
11981 }
11982 return use_amount_internal( it, quantity, used, filter );
11983}
11984
11985// NOLINTNEXTLINE(readability-make-member-function-const)
11986bool item::use_amount_internal( const itype_id &it, int &quantity, std::list<item> &used,
11987 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter )
11988{
11989 if( typeId().is_null() ) {
11990 return false;
11991 }
11992 if( typeId() == it && quantity > 0 && filter( *this ) ) {
11993 used.push_back( *this );
11994 quantity--;
11995 return true;
11996 } else {
11997 return false;
11998 }
11999}
12000
12001bool item::allow_crafting_component() const
12002{
12003 if( ( is_toolmod() && is_irremovable() ) || has_flag( flag_PSEUDO ) ) {
12004 return false;
12005 }
12006
12007 // vehicle batteries are implemented as magazines of charge
12008 if( is_magazine() && ammo_types().count( ammo_battery ) ) {
12009 return true;
12010 }
12011
12012 // fixes #18886 - turret installation may require items with irremovable mods
12013 if( is_gun() ) {
12014 bool valid = true;
12015 visit_items( [&]( const item * it, item * ) {
12016 if( this == it ) {
12017 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
12018 }
12019 if( !( it->is_magazine() || ( it->is_gunmod() && it->is_irremovable() ) ) ) {
12020 valid = false;
12021 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
12022 }
12023 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
12024 } );
12025 return valid;
12026 }
12027
12028 return true;
12029}
12030
12031void item::set_item_specific_energy( const units::specific_energy &new_specific_energy )
12032{
12033 const float float_new_specific_energy = units::to_joule_per_gram( new_specific_energy );
12034 const float specific_heat_liquid = get_specific_heat_liquid(); // J/g K
12035 const float specific_heat_solid = get_specific_heat_solid(); // J/g K
12036 const float latent_heat = get_latent_heat(); // J/g
12037 const float freezing_temperature = units::to_kelvin( get_freeze_point() );
12038 // Energy that the item would have if it was completely solid at freezing temperature
12039 const float completely_frozen_specific_energy = specific_heat_solid * freezing_temperature; // J/g
12040 // Energy that the item would have if it was completely liquid at freezing temperature
12041 const float completely_liquid_specific_energy = completely_frozen_specific_energy + latent_heat;
12042 float new_item_temperature = 0.0f; // K
12043 float freeze_percentage = 1.0f;
12044
12045 if( float_new_specific_energy > completely_liquid_specific_energy ) {
12046 // Item is liquid
12047 new_item_temperature = freezing_temperature + ( float_new_specific_energy -
12048 completely_liquid_specific_energy ) /
12049 specific_heat_liquid;
12050 freeze_percentage = 0.0f;
12051 } else if( float_new_specific_energy < completely_frozen_specific_energy ) {
12052 // Item is solid
12053 new_item_temperature = float_new_specific_energy / specific_heat_solid;
12054 } else {
12055 // Item is partially solid
12056 new_item_temperature = freezing_temperature;
12057 freeze_percentage = ( completely_liquid_specific_energy - float_new_specific_energy ) /
12058 ( completely_liquid_specific_energy - completely_frozen_specific_energy );
12059 }
12060
12061 temperature = units::from_kelvin( new_item_temperature );
12062 specific_energy = new_specific_energy;
12063 set_temp_flags( temperature, freeze_percentage );
12064 reset_temp_check();
12065}
12066
12067units::specific_energy item::get_specific_energy_from_temperature( const units::temperature
12068 &new_temperature ) const
12069{
12070 const float specific_heat_liquid = get_specific_heat_liquid(); // J/g K
12071 const float specific_heat_solid = get_specific_heat_solid(); // J/g K
12072 const float latent_heat = get_latent_heat(); // J/g
12073 const float freezing_temperature = units::to_kelvin( get_freeze_point() );
12074 // Energy that the item would have if it was completely solid at freezing temperature
12075 const float completely_frozen_energy = specific_heat_solid * freezing_temperature;
12076 // Energy that the item would have if it was completely liquid at freezing temperature
12077 const float completely_liquid_energy = completely_frozen_energy + latent_heat;
12078 float new_specific_energy;
12079
12080 if( units::to_kelvin( new_temperature ) <= freezing_temperature ) {
12081 new_specific_energy = specific_heat_solid * units::to_kelvin( new_temperature );
12082 } else {
12083 new_specific_energy = completely_liquid_energy + specific_heat_liquid *
12084 ( units::to_kelvin( new_temperature ) - freezing_temperature );
12085 }
12086 return units::from_joule_per_gram( new_specific_energy );
12087}
12088
12089void item::set_item_temperature( units::temperature new_temperature )
12090{
12091 const float freezing_temperature = units::to_kelvin( get_freeze_point() );
12092 const float specific_heat_solid = get_specific_heat_solid(); // J/g K
12093 const float latent_heat = get_latent_heat(); // J/g
12094
12095 units::specific_energy new_specific_energy = get_specific_energy_from_temperature(
12096 new_temperature );
12097 float freeze_percentage = 0.0f;
12098
12099 temperature = new_temperature;
12100 specific_energy = new_specific_energy ;
12101
12102 // Energy that the item would have if it was completely solid at freezing temperature
12103 const float completely_frozen_specific_energy = specific_heat_solid * freezing_temperature;
12104 // Energy that the item would have if it was completely liquid at freezing temperature
12105 const float completely_liquid_specific_energy = completely_frozen_specific_energy + latent_heat;
12106
12107 if( units::to_joule_per_gram( new_specific_energy ) < completely_frozen_specific_energy ) {
12108 // Item is solid
12109 freeze_percentage = 1;
12110 } else {
12111 // Item is partially solid
12112 freeze_percentage = ( completely_liquid_specific_energy - units::to_joule_per_gram(
12113 new_specific_energy ) ) /
12114 ( completely_liquid_specific_energy - completely_frozen_specific_energy );
12115 }
12116 set_temp_flags( new_temperature, freeze_percentage );
12117 reset_temp_check();
12118}
12119
12120int item::fill_with( const item &contained, const int amount,
12121 const bool unseal_pockets,
12122 const bool allow_sealed,
12123 const bool ignore_settings,
12124 const bool into_bottom,
12125 Character *carrier )
12126{
12127 if( amount <= 0 ) {
12128 return 0;
12129 }
12130
12131 item contained_item( contained );
12132 const bool count_by_charges = contained.count_by_charges();
12133 if( count_by_charges ) {
12134 contained_item.charges = 1;
12135 }
12136 item_location loc;
12137 item_pocket *pocket = nullptr;
12138
12139 int num_contained = 0;
12140 while( amount > num_contained ) {
12141 if( count_by_charges || pocket == nullptr ||
12142 !pocket->can_contain( contained_item ).success() ) {
12143 if( count_by_charges ) {
12144 contained_item.charges = 1;
12145 }
12146 pocket = best_pocket( contained_item, loc, /*avoid=*/nullptr, allow_sealed,
12147 ignore_settings ).second;
12148 }
12149 if( pocket == nullptr ) {
12150 break;
12151 }
12152 if( count_by_charges ) {
12153 ammotype ammo = contained.ammo_type();
12154 if( pocket->ammo_capacity( ammo ) ) {
12155 contained_item.charges = std::min( amount - num_contained,
12156 pocket->remaining_ammo_capacity( ammo ) );
12157 } else {
12158 contained_item.charges = std::min( { amount - num_contained,
12159 pocket->charges_per_remaining_volume( contained_item ),
12160 pocket->charges_per_remaining_weight( contained_item )
12161 } );
12162 }
12163
12164 if( contained_item.charges == 0 ) {
12165 break;
12166 }
12167 }
12168
12169 ret_val<item *> result = pocket->insert_item( contained_item, into_bottom );
12170 if( !result.success() ) {
12171 if( count_by_charges ) {
12172 debugmsg( "charges per remaining pocket volume does not fit in that very volume: %s",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "12173", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "charges per remaining pocket volume does not fit in that very volume: %s"
, result.str())
12173 result.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "12173", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "charges per remaining pocket volume does not fit in that very volume: %s"
, result.str());
12174 } else {
12175 debugmsg( "best pocket for item cannot actually contain the item: %s", result.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "12175", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "best pocket for item cannot actually contain the item: %s"
, result.str());
12176 }
12177 break;
12178 }
12179 if( count_by_charges ) {
12180 num_contained += contained_item.charges;
12181 } else {
12182 num_contained++;
12183 }
12184 if( unseal_pockets ) {
12185 pocket->unseal();
12186 }
12187 if( carrier ) {
12188 result.value()->on_pickup( *carrier );
12189 }
12190 }
12191 if( num_contained == 0 ) {
12192 debugmsg( "tried to put an item (%s, amount %d) in a container (%s) that cannot contain it",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "12193", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "tried to put an item (%s, amount %d) in a container (%s) that cannot contain it"
, contained_item.typeId().str(), contained_item.charges, typeId
().str())
12193 contained_item.typeId().str(), contained_item.charges, typeId().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "12193", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "tried to put an item (%s, amount %d) in a container (%s) that cannot contain it"
, contained_item.typeId().str(), contained_item.charges, typeId
().str());
12194 }
12195 on_contents_changed();
12196 return num_contained;
12197}
12198
12199void item::set_countdown( int num_turns )
12200{
12201 if( num_turns < 0 ) {
12202 debugmsg( "Tried to set a negative countdown value %d.", num_turns )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "12202", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to set a negative countdown value %d."
, num_turns);
12203 return;
12204 }
12205 if( !ammo_types().empty() ) {
12206 debugmsg( "Tried to set countdown on an item with ammo." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "12206", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to set countdown on an item with ammo."
);
12207 return;
12208 }
12209 charges = num_turns;
12210}
12211
12212bool item::use_charges( const itype_id &what, int &qty, std::list<item> &used,
12213 const tripoint &pos, const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter,
12214 Character *carrier, bool in_tools )
12215{
12216 std::vector<item *> del;
12217
12218 visit_items(
12219 [&what, &qty, &used, &pos, &del, &filter, &carrier, &in_tools]( item * e, item * parent ) {
12220 if( qty == 0 ) {
12221 // found sufficient charges
12222 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
12223 }
12224
12225 if( !filter( *e ) ) {
12226 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
12227 }
12228
12229 if( e->is_tool() ) {
12230 if( e->typeId() == what || ( in_tools && e->ammo_current() == what ) ) {
12231 int n;
12232 if( carrier ) {
12233 n = e->ammo_consume( qty, pos, carrier );
12234 } else {
12235 n = e->ammo_consume( qty, pos, nullptr );
12236 }
12237
12238 if( n > 0 ) {
12239 item temp( *e );
12240 used.push_back( temp );
12241 qty -= n;
12242 return VisitResponse::SKIP;
12243 }
12244 }
12245 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
12246
12247 } else if( e->count_by_charges() ) {
12248 if( e->typeId() == what ) {
12249 // if can supply excess charges split required off leaving remainder in-situ
12250 item obj = e->split( qty );
12251 if( parent ) {
12252 parent->contained_where( *e )->on_contents_changed();
12253 parent->on_contents_changed();
12254 }
12255 if( !obj.is_null() ) {
12256 used.push_back( obj );
12257 qty = 0;
12258 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
12259 }
12260
12261 qty -= e->charges;
12262 used.push_back( *e );
12263 del.push_back( e );
12264 }
12265 // items counted by charges are not themselves expected to be containers
12266 return VisitResponse::SKIP;
12267 }
12268
12269 // recurse through any nested containers
12270 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
12271 } );
12272
12273 bool destroy = false;
12274 for( item *e : del ) {
12275 if( e == this ) {
12276 destroy = true; // cannot remove ourselves...
12277 } else {
12278 remove_item( *e );
12279 }
12280 }
12281
12282 return destroy;
12283}
12284
12285void item::set_snippet( const snippet_id &id )
12286{
12287 if( is_null() ) {
12288 return;
12289 }
12290 if( !id.is_valid() ) {
12291 debugmsg( "there's no snippet with id %s", id.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "12291", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "there's no snippet with id %s"
, id.str());
12292 return;
12293 }
12294 snip_id = id;
12295}
12296
12297const item_category &item::get_category_shallow() const
12298{
12299 static item_category null_category;
12300 return type->category_force.is_valid() ? type->category_force.obj() : null_category;
12301}
12302
12303const item_category &item::get_category_of_contents( int depth, int maxdepth ) const
12304{
12305 if( depth < maxdepth && type->category_force == item_category_container ) {
12306 if( cached_category.timestamp == calendar::turn ) {
12307 return cached_category.id.obj();
12308 }
12309 ++depth;
12310 if( item::aggregate_t const aggi = aggregated_contents( depth, maxdepth ); aggi ) {
12311 item_category const &cat = aggi.header->get_category_of_contents( depth, maxdepth );
12312 cached_category = { cat.get_id(), calendar::turn };
12313 return cat;
12314 }
12315 }
12316 return this->get_category_shallow();
12317}
12318
12319iteminfo::iteminfo( const std::string &Type, const std::string &Name, const std::string &Fmt,
12320 flags Flags, double Value, double UnitVal )
12321{
12322 sType = Type;
12323 sName = replace_colors( Name );
12324 sFmt = replace_colors( Fmt );
12325 is_int = !( Flags & is_decimal || Flags & is_three_decimal );
12326 three_decimal = ( Flags & is_three_decimal );
12327 dValue = Value;
12328 dUnitAdjustedVal = UnitVal < std::numeric_limits<float>::epsilon() &&
12329 UnitVal > -std::numeric_limits<float>::epsilon() ? Value : UnitVal;
12330 bShowPlus = static_cast<bool>( Flags & show_plus );
12331 std::stringstream convert;
12332 if( bShowPlus ) {
12333 convert << std::showpos;
12334 }
12335 if( is_int ) {
12336 convert << std::setprecision( 0 );
12337 } else if( three_decimal ) {
12338 convert << std::setprecision( 3 );
12339 } else {
12340 convert << std::setprecision( 2 );
12341 }
12342 convert << std::fixed << Value;
12343 sValue = convert.str();
12344 bNewLine = !( Flags & no_newline );
12345 bLowerIsBetter = static_cast<bool>( Flags & lower_is_better );
12346 bDrawName = !( Flags & no_name );
12347}
12348
12349iteminfo::iteminfo( const std::string &Type, const std::string &Name, flags Flags )
12350 : iteminfo( Type, Name, "", Flags )
12351{
12352}
12353
12354iteminfo::iteminfo( const std::string &Type, const std::string &Name, double Value,
12355 double UnitVal )
12356 : iteminfo( Type, Name, "", no_flags, Value, UnitVal )
12357{
12358}
12359
12360iteminfo vol_to_info( const std::string &type, const std::string &left,
12361 const units::volume &vol, int decimal_places, bool lower_is_better )
12362{
12363 iteminfo::flags f = iteminfo::no_newline;
12364 if( lower_is_better ) {
12365 f |= iteminfo::lower_is_better;
12366 }
12367 int converted_volume_scale = 0;
12368 const double converted_volume =
12369 round_up( convert_volume( vol.value(), &converted_volume_scale ), decimal_places );
12370 if( converted_volume_scale != 0 ) {
12371 f |= iteminfo::is_decimal;
12372 }
12373 return iteminfo( type, left, string_format( "<num> %s", volume_units_abbr() ), f,
12374 converted_volume );
12375}
12376
12377iteminfo weight_to_info( const std::string &type, const std::string &left,
12378 const units::mass &weight, int /* decimal_places */, bool lower_is_better )
12379{
12380 iteminfo::flags f = iteminfo::no_newline;
12381 if( lower_is_better ) {
12382 f |= iteminfo::lower_is_better;
12383 }
12384 const double converted_weight = convert_weight( weight );
12385 f |= iteminfo::is_decimal;
12386 return iteminfo( type, left, string_format( "<num> %s", weight_units() ), f,
12387 converted_weight );
12388}
12389
12390bool item::will_explode_in_fire() const
12391{
12392 if( type->explode_in_fire ) {
12393 return true;
12394 }
12395
12396 if( type->ammo && ( type->ammo->special_cookoff || type->ammo->cookoff ) ) {
12397 return true;
12398 }
12399
12400 return false;
12401}
12402
12403bool item::detonate( const tripoint &p, std::vector<item> &drops )
12404{
12405 const Creature *source = get_player_character().get_faction()->id == owner
12406 ? &get_player_character()
12407 : nullptr;
12408 if( type->explosion.power >= 0 ) {
12409 explosion_handler::explosion( source, p, type->explosion );
12410 return true;
12411 } else if( type->ammo && ( type->ammo->special_cookoff || type->ammo->cookoff ) ) {
12412 int charges_remaining = charges;
12413 const int rounds_exploded = rng( 1, charges_remaining / 2 );
12414 if( type->ammo->special_cookoff ) {
12415 // If it has a special effect just trigger it.
12416 apply_ammo_effects( nullptr, p, type->ammo->ammo_effects );
12417 }
12418 if( type->ammo->cookoff ) {
12419 // If ammo type can burn, then create an explosion proportional to quantity.
12420 float power = 3.0f * std::pow( rounds_exploded / 25.0f, 0.25f );
12421 explosion_handler::explosion( nullptr, p, power, 0.0f, false, 0 );
12422 }
12423 charges_remaining -= rounds_exploded;
12424 if( charges_remaining > 0 ) {
12425 item temp_item = *this;
12426 temp_item.charges = charges_remaining;
12427 drops.push_back( temp_item );
12428 }
12429
12430 return true;
12431 }
12432
12433 return false;
12434}
12435bool item::has_rotten_away() const
12436{
12437 if( is_corpse() && !can_revive() ) {
12438 return get_rot() > 10_days;
12439 } else {
12440 return get_relative_rot() > 2.0;
12441 }
12442}
12443
12444bool item_ptr_compare_by_charges( const item *left, const item *right )
12445{
12446 if( left->empty() ) {
12447 return false;
12448 } else if( right->empty() ) {
12449 return true;
12450 } else {
12451 return right->only_item().charges < left->only_item().charges;
12452 }
12453}
12454
12455bool item_compare_by_charges( const item &left, const item &right )
12456{
12457 return item_ptr_compare_by_charges( &left, &right );
12458}
12459
12460static const std::string USED_BY_IDS( "USED_BY_IDS" );
12461bool item::already_used_by_player( const Character &p ) const
12462{
12463 const auto it = item_vars.find( USED_BY_IDS );
12464 if( it == item_vars.end() ) {
12465 return false;
12466 }
12467 // USED_BY_IDS always starts *and* ends with a ';', the search string
12468 // ';<id>;' matches at most one part of USED_BY_IDS, and only when exactly that
12469 // id has been added.
12470 const std::string needle = string_format( ";%d;", p.getID().get_value() );
12471 return it->second.find( needle ) != std::string::npos;
12472}
12473
12474void item::mark_as_used_by_player( const Character &p )
12475{
12476 std::string &used_by_ids = item_vars[ USED_BY_IDS ];
12477 if( used_by_ids.empty() ) {
12478 // *always* start with a ';'
12479 used_by_ids = ";";
12480 }
12481 // and always end with a ';'
12482 used_by_ids += string_format( "%d;", p.getID().get_value() );
12483}
12484
12485bool item::can_holster( const item &obj, bool ) const
12486{
12487 if( !type->can_use( "holster" ) ) {
12488 return false; // item is not a holster
12489 }
12490
12491 const holster_actor *ptr = dynamic_cast<const holster_actor *>
12492 ( type->get_use( "holster" )->get_actor_ptr() );
12493 return ptr->can_holster( *this, obj );
12494}
12495
12496bool item::will_spill() const
12497{
12498 return contents.will_spill();
12499}
12500
12501bool item::will_spill_if_unsealed() const
12502{
12503 return contents.will_spill_if_unsealed();
12504}
12505
12506std::string item::components_to_string() const
12507{
12508 using t_count_map = std::map<std::string, int>;
12509 t_count_map counts;
12510 for( const item_components::type_vector_pair &tvp : components ) {
12511 for( const item &it : tvp.second ) {
12512 if( !it.has_flag( flag_BYPRODUCT ) ) {
12513 const std::string name = it.display_name();
12514 counts[name]++;
12515 }
12516 }
12517 }
12518 return enumerate_as_string( counts,
12519 []( const std::pair<std::string, int> &entry ) {
12520 return entry.second != 1
12521 ? string_format( pgettext( "components count", "%d x %s" ), entry.second, entry.first )
12522 : entry.first;
12523 }, enumeration_conjunction::none );
12524}
12525
12526uint64_t item::make_component_hash() const
12527{
12528 std::string concatenated_ids;
12529 for( const item_components::type_vector_pair &tvp : components ) {
12530 for( size_t i = 0; i < tvp.second.size(); ++i ) {
12531 concatenated_ids += tvp.first.str();
12532 }
12533 }
12534
12535 std::hash<std::string> hasher;
12536 return hasher( concatenated_ids );
12537}
12538
12539bool item::needs_processing() const
12540{
12541 return processing_speed() != NO_PROCESSING;
12542}
12543
12544int item::processing_speed() const
12545{
12546 if( is_corpse() || is_comestible() ) {
12547 return to_turns<int>( 10_minutes );
12548 }
12549
12550 if( active || ethereal || wetness || has_link_data() ||
12551 has_flag( flag_RADIO_ACTIVATION ) || has_relic_recharge() ||
12552 has_fault_flag( flag_BLACKPOWDER_FOULING_DAMAGE ) || get_var( "gun_heat", 0 ) > 0 ) {
12553 // Unless otherwise indicated, update every turn.
12554 return 1;
12555 }
12556
12557 return item::NO_PROCESSING;
12558}
12559
12560void item::apply_freezerburn()
12561{
12562 if( !has_flag( flag_FREEZERBURN ) ) {
12563 return;
12564 }
12565 set_flag( flag_MUSHY );
12566}
12567
12568bool item::process_temperature_rot( float insulation, const tripoint &pos, map &here,
12569 Character *carrier, const temperature_flag flag, float spoil_modifier )
12570{
12571 const time_point now = calendar::turn;
12572
12573 // if player debug menu'd the time backward it breaks stuff, just reset the
12574 // last_temp_check in this case
12575 if( now - last_temp_check < 0_turns ) {
12576 reset_temp_check();
12577 return false;
12578 }
12579
12580 // process temperature and rot at most once every 100_turns (10 min)
12581 // note we're also gated by item::processing_speed
12582 time_duration smallest_interval = 10_minutes;
12583 if( now - last_temp_check < smallest_interval && units::to_joule_per_gram( specific_energy ) > 0 ) {
12584 return false;
12585 }
12586
12587 units::temperature temp = get_weather().get_temperature( pos );
12588
12589 switch( flag ) {
12590 case temperature_flag::NORMAL:
12591 // Just use the temperature normally
12592 break;
12593 case temperature_flag::FRIDGE:
12594 temp = std::min( temp, temperatures::fridge );
12595 break;
12596 case temperature_flag::FREEZER:
12597 temp = std::min( temp, temperatures::freezer );
12598 break;
12599 case temperature_flag::HEATER:
12600 temp = std::max( temp, temperatures::normal );
12601 break;
12602 case temperature_flag::ROOT_CELLAR:
12603 temp = AVERAGE_ANNUAL_TEMPERATURE;
12604 break;
12605 default:
12606 debugmsg( "Temperature flag enum not valid. Using current temperature." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "12606", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Temperature flag enum not valid. Using current temperature."
);
12607 }
12608
12609 bool carried = carrier != nullptr;
12610 // body heat increases inventory temperature by 5 F (2.77 K) and insulation by 50%
12611 if( carried ) {
12612 insulation *= 1.5;
12613 temp += units::from_fahrenheit_delta( 5 );
12614 }
12615
12616 time_point time = last_temp_check;
12617 item_internal::scoped_goes_bad_cache _cache( this );
12618 const bool process_rot = goes_bad() && spoil_modifier != 0;
12619
12620 if( now - time > 1_hours ) {
12621 // This code is for items that were left out of reality bubble for long time
12622
12623 const weather_generator &wgen = get_weather().get_cur_weather_gen();
12624 const unsigned int seed = g->get_seed();
12625
12626 units::temperature_delta temp_mod;
12627 // Toilets and vending machines will try to get the heat radiation and convection during mapgen and segfault.
12628 if( !g->new_game ) {
12629 temp_mod = get_heat_radiation( pos );
12630 temp_mod += get_convection_temperature( pos );
12631 temp_mod += here.get_temperature_mod( pos );
12632 } else {
12633 temp_mod = units::from_kelvin_delta( 0 );
12634 }
12635
12636 if( carried ) {
12637 temp_mod += units::from_fahrenheit_delta( 5 ); // body heat increases inventory temperature
12638 }
12639
12640 // Process the past of this item in 1h chunks until there is less than 1h left.
12641 time_duration time_delta = 1_hours;
12642
12643 while( now - time > 1_hours ) {
12644 time += time_delta;
12645
12646 // Get the environment temperature
12647 // Use weather if above ground, use map temp if below
12648 units::temperature env_temperature;
12649 if( pos.z >= 0 && flag != temperature_flag::ROOT_CELLAR ) {
12650 env_temperature = wgen.get_weather_temperature( pos, time, seed );
12651 } else {
12652 env_temperature = AVERAGE_ANNUAL_TEMPERATURE;
12653 }
12654 env_temperature += temp_mod;
12655
12656 switch( flag ) {
12657 case temperature_flag::NORMAL:
12658 // Just use the temperature normally
12659 break;
12660 case temperature_flag::FRIDGE:
12661 env_temperature = std::min( env_temperature, temperatures::fridge );
12662 break;
12663 case temperature_flag::FREEZER:
12664 env_temperature = std::min( env_temperature, temperatures::freezer );
12665 break;
12666 case temperature_flag::HEATER:
12667 env_temperature = std::max( env_temperature, temperatures::normal );
12668 break;
12669 case temperature_flag::ROOT_CELLAR:
12670 env_temperature = AVERAGE_ANNUAL_TEMPERATURE;
12671 break;
12672 default:
12673 debugmsg( "Temperature flag enum not valid. Using normal temperature." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, "12673", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Temperature flag enum not valid. Using normal temperature."
);
12674 }
12675
12676 // Calculate item temperature from environment temperature
12677 // If the time was more than 2 d ago we do not care about item temperature.
12678 if( now - time < 2_days ) {
12679 calc_temp( env_temperature, insulation, time_delta );
12680 }
12681 last_temp_check = time;
12682
12683 // Calculate item rot
12684 if( process_rot ) {
12685 calc_rot( env_temperature, spoil_modifier, time_delta );
12686
12687 if( has_rotten_away() && carrier == nullptr ) {
12688 // No need to track item that will be gone
12689 return true;
12690 }
12691 }
12692 }
12693 }
12694
12695 // Remaining <1 h from above
12696 // and items that are held near the player
12697 if( now - time > smallest_interval ) {
12698 calc_temp( temp, insulation, now - time );
12699 last_temp_check = now;
12700 if( process_rot ) {
12701 calc_rot( temp, spoil_modifier, now - time );
12702 return has_rotten_away() && carrier == nullptr;
12703 }
12704 }
12705
12706 // Just now created items will get here.
12707 if( units::to_joule_per_gram( specific_energy ) < 0 ) {
12708 set_item_temperature( temp );
12709 }
12710 return false;
12711}
12712
12713void item::calc_temp( const units::temperature &temp, const float insulation,
12714 const time_duration &time_delta )
12715{
12716 const float env_temperature = units::to_kelvin( temp ); // K
12717 const float old_temperature = units::to_kelvin( temperature ); // K
12718 const float temperature_difference = env_temperature - old_temperature;
12719
12720 // If no or only small temperature difference then no need to do math.
12721 if( std::abs( temperature_difference ) < 0.4 ) {
12722 return;
12723 }
12724 const float mass = to_gram( weight() ); // g
12725
12726 // If item has negative energy set to environment temperature (it not been processed ever)
12727 if( units::to_joule_per_gram( specific_energy ) < 0 ) {
12728 set_item_temperature( temp );
12729 return;
12730 }
12731
12732 // specific_energy = item thermal energy (J/g). Stored in the item
12733 // temperature = item temperature (K). Stored in the item
12734 const float conductivity_term = 0.0076 * std::pow( to_milliliter( volume() ),
12735 2.0 / 3.0 ) / insulation;
12736 const float specific_heat_liquid = get_specific_heat_liquid();
12737 const float specific_heat_solid = get_specific_heat_solid();
12738 const float latent_heat = get_latent_heat();
12739 const float freezing_temperature = units::to_kelvin( get_freeze_point() );
12740 // Energy that the item would have if it was completely solid at freezing temperature
12741 const units::specific_energy completely_frozen_specific_energy = units::from_joule_per_gram(
12742 specific_heat_solid * freezing_temperature );
12743 // Energy that the item would have if it was completely liquid at freezing temperature
12744 const units::specific_energy completely_liquid_specific_energy = completely_frozen_specific_energy +
12745 units::from_joule_per_gram( latent_heat );
12746
12747 float new_specific_energy;
12748 float new_item_temperature;
12749 float freeze_percentage = 0.0f;
12750 int extra_time;
12751
12752 // Temperature calculations based on Newton's law of cooling.
12753 // Calculations are done assuming that the item stays in its phase.
12754 // This assumption can cause over heating when transitioning from melting to liquid.
12755 // In other transitions the item may cool/heat too little but that won't be a problem.
12756 if( specific_energy < completely_frozen_specific_energy ) {
12757 // Was solid.
12758 new_item_temperature = ( - temperature_difference
12759 * std::exp( - to_turns<int>( time_delta ) * conductivity_term / ( mass * specific_heat_solid ) )
12760 + env_temperature );
12761 new_specific_energy = new_item_temperature * specific_heat_solid;
12762 if( new_item_temperature > freezing_temperature + 0.5 ) {
12763 // Started melting before temp was calculated.
12764 // 0.5 is here because we don't care if it heats up a bit too high
12765 // Calculate how long the item was solid
12766 // and apply rest of the time as melting
12767 extra_time = to_turns<int>( time_delta )
12768 - std::log( - temperature_difference / ( freezing_temperature - env_temperature ) )
12769 * ( mass * specific_heat_solid / conductivity_term );
12770 new_specific_energy = units::to_joule_per_gram( completely_frozen_specific_energy )
12771 + conductivity_term
12772 * ( env_temperature - freezing_temperature ) * extra_time / mass;
12773 new_item_temperature = freezing_temperature;
12774 if( units::from_joule_per_gram( new_specific_energy ) > completely_liquid_specific_energy ) {
12775 // The item then also finished melting.
12776 // This may happen rarely with very small items
12777 // Just set the item to environment temperature
12778 set_item_temperature( units::from_kelvin( env_temperature ) );
12779 return;
12780 }
12781 }
12782 } else if( specific_energy > completely_liquid_specific_energy ) {
12783 // Was liquid.
12784 new_item_temperature = ( - temperature_difference
12785 * std::exp( - to_turns<int>( time_delta ) * conductivity_term / ( mass *
12786 specific_heat_liquid ) )
12787 + env_temperature );
12788 new_specific_energy = ( new_item_temperature - freezing_temperature ) * specific_heat_liquid +
12789 units::to_joule_per_gram( completely_liquid_specific_energy );
12790 if( new_item_temperature < freezing_temperature - 0.5 ) {
12791 // Started freezing before temp was calculated.
12792 // 0.5 is here because we don't care if it cools down a bit too low
12793 // Calculate how long the item was liquid
12794 // and apply rest of the time as freezing
12795 extra_time = to_turns<int>( time_delta )
12796 - std::log( - temperature_difference / ( freezing_temperature - env_temperature ) )
12797 * ( mass * specific_heat_liquid / conductivity_term );
12798 new_specific_energy = units::to_joule_per_gram( completely_liquid_specific_energy )
12799 + conductivity_term
12800 * ( env_temperature - freezing_temperature ) * extra_time / mass;
12801 new_item_temperature = freezing_temperature;
12802 if( units::from_joule_per_gram( new_specific_energy ) < completely_frozen_specific_energy ) {
12803 // The item then also finished freezing.
12804 // This may happen rarely with very small items
12805 // Just set the item to environment temperature
12806 set_item_temperature( units::from_kelvin( env_temperature ) );
12807 return;
12808 }
12809 }
12810 } else {
12811 // Was melting or freezing
12812 new_specific_energy = units::to_joule_per_gram( specific_energy ) + conductivity_term *
12813 temperature_difference * to_turns<int>( time_delta ) / mass;
12814 new_item_temperature = freezing_temperature;
12815 if( units::from_joule_per_gram( new_specific_energy ) > completely_liquid_specific_energy ) {
12816 // Item melted before temp was calculated
12817 // Calculate how long the item was melting
12818 // and apply rest of the time as liquid
12819 extra_time = to_turns<int>( time_delta ) - ( mass / ( conductivity_term * temperature_difference ) )
12820 *
