14734void item::set_tools_to_continue( bool value )
14735{
14736 cata_assert( craft_data_ )(static_cast <bool> (craft_data_) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("craft_data_", "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, 14736, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
14737 craft_data_->tools_to_continue = value;
14738}
14739
14740bool item::has_tools_to_continue() const
14741{
14742 cata_assert( craft_data_ )(static_cast <bool> (craft_data_) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("craft_data_", "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, 14742, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
14743 return craft_data_->tools_to_continue;
14744}
14745
14746void item::set_cached_tool_selections( const std::vector<comp_selection<tool_comp>> &selections )
14747{
14748 cata_assert( craft_data_ )(static_cast <bool> (craft_data_) ? void (0) : __assert_fail
("craft_data_", "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, 14748, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));

14750}

14753{

("craft_data_", "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/item.cpp"
, 14754, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
14755 return craft_data_->cached_tool_selections;
14756}
14757
14758const cata::value_ptr<islot_comestible> &item::get_comestible() const
14759{
14760 if( is_craft() && !craft_data_->disassembly ) {
14761 return find_type( craft_data_->making->result() )->comestible;
14762 } else {
14763 return type->comestible;
14764 }
14765}
14766
14767bool item::has_clothing_mod() const
14768{
14769 for( const clothing_mod &cm : clothing_mods::get_all() ) {
14770 if( has_own_flag( cm.flag ) ) {
14771 return true;
14772 }
14773 }
14774 return false;
14775}
14776
14777static const std::string &get_clothing_mod_val_key( clothing_mod_type type )
14778{
14779 const static auto cache = ( []() {
14780 std::array<std::string, clothing_mods::all_clothing_mod_types.size()> res;
14781 for( const clothing_mod_type &type : clothing_mods::all_clothing_mod_types ) {
14782 res[type] = CLOTHING_MOD_VAR_PREFIX + clothing_mods::string_from_clothing_mod_type(
14783 clothing_mods::all_clothing_mod_types[type]
14784 );
14785 }
14786 return res;
14787 } )();
14788
14789 return cache[ type ];
14790}
14791
14792float item::get_clothing_mod_val( clothing_mod_type type ) const
14793{
14794 return get_var( get_clothing_mod_val_key( type ), 0.0f );
14795}
14796
14797void item::update_clothing_mod_val()
14798{
14799 for( const clothing_mod_type &type : clothing_mods::all_clothing_mod_types ) {
14800 float tmp = 0.0f;
14801 for( const clothing_mod &cm : clothing_mods::get_all_with( type ) ) {
14802 if( has_own_flag( cm.flag ) ) {
14803 tmp += cm.get_mod_val( type, *this );
14804 }
14805 }
14806 set_var( get_clothing_mod_val_key( type ), tmp );
14807 }
14808}
14809
14810units::volume item::check_for_free_space() const
14811{
14812 units::volume volume;
14813
14814 for( const item *container : contents.all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
14815 std::vector<const item_pocket *> containedPockets =
14816 container->contents.get_all_contained_pockets();
14817 if( !containedPockets.empty() ) {
14818 volume += container->check_for_free_space();
14819
14820 for( const item_pocket *pocket : containedPockets ) {
14821 if( pocket->rigid() && ( pocket->empty() || pocket->contains_phase( phase_id::SOLID ) ) &&
14822 pocket->get_pocket_data()->ammo_restriction.empty() ) {
14823 volume += pocket->remaining_volume();
14824 }
14825 }
14826 }
14827 }
14828 return volume;
14829}
14830
14831int item::get_pocket_size() const
14832{
14833 // set the amount of space that will be used on the vest based on the size of the item
14834 if( has_flag( flag_PALS_SMALL ) ) {
14835 return 1;
14836 } else if( has_flag( flag_PALS_MEDIUM ) ) {
14837 return 2;
14838 } else {
14839 return 3;
14840 }
14841}
14842
14843bool item::can_attach_as_pocket() const
14844{
14845 return has_flag( flag_PALS_SMALL ) || has_flag( flag_PALS_MEDIUM ) || has_flag( flag_PALS_LARGE );
14846}
14847
14848units::volume item::get_selected_stack_volume( const std::map<const item *, int> &without ) const
14849{
14850 auto stack = without.find( this );
14851 if( stack != without.end() ) {
14852 int selected = stack->second;
14853 item copy = *this;
14854 copy.charges = selected;
14855 return copy.volume();
14856 }
14857
14858 return 0_ml;
14859}
14860
14861bool item::has_unrestricted_pockets() const
14862{
14863 return contents.has_unrestricted_pockets();
14864}
14865
14866units::volume item::get_contents_volume_with_tweaks( const std::map<const item *, int> &without )
14867const
14868{
14869 return contents.get_contents_volume_with_tweaks( without );
14870}
14871
14872units::volume item::get_nested_content_volume_recursive( const std::map<const item *, int>
14873 &without )
14874const
14875{
14876 return contents.get_nested_content_volume_recursive( without );
14877}
14878
14879int item::get_recursive_disassemble_moves( const Character &guy ) const
14880{
14881 int moves = recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( type->get_id() ).time_to_craft_moves( guy,
14882 recipe_time_flag::ignore_proficiencies );
14883 std::vector<item_comp> to_be_disassembled = get_uncraft_components();
14884 while( !to_be_disassembled.empty() ) {
14885 item_comp current_comp = to_be_disassembled.back();
14886 to_be_disassembled.pop_back();
14887 const recipe &r = recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( current_comp.type->get_id() );
14888 if( r.ident() != recipe_id::NULL_ID() ) {
14889 moves += r.time_to_craft_moves( guy ) * current_comp.count;
14890 std::vector<item_comp> components = item( current_comp.type->get_id() ).get_uncraft_components();
14891 for( item_comp &component : components ) {
14892 component.count *= current_comp.count;
14893 to_be_disassembled.push_back( component );
14894 }
14895 }
14896 }
14897 return moves;
14898}
14899
14900void item::remove_internal( const std::function<bool( item & )> &filter,
14901 int &count, std::list<item> &res )
14902{
14903 contents.remove_internal( filter, count, res );
14904}
14905
14906std::list<const item *> item::all_items_top() const
14907{
14908 return contents.all_items_top();
14909}
14910
14911std::list<item *> item::all_items_top()
14912{
14913 return contents.all_items_top();
14914}
14915
14916std::list<const item *> item::all_items_top( pocket_type pk_type ) const
14917{
14918 return contents.all_items_top( pk_type );
14919}
14920
14921std::list<item *> item::all_items_top( pocket_type pk_type, bool unloading )
14922{
14923 return contents.all_items_top( pk_type, unloading );
14924}
14925
14926item const *item::this_or_single_content() const
14927{
14928 return type->category_force == item_category_container && contents_only_one_type()
14929 ? &contents.first_item()
14930 : this;
14931}
14932
14933bool item::contents_only_one_type() const
14934{
14935 std::list<const item *> const items = contents.all_items_top( []( item_pocket const & pkt ) {
14936 return pkt.is_type( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ||
14937 pkt.is_type( pocket_type::SOFTWARE );
14938 } );
14939 return items.size() == 1 ||
14940 ( items.size() > 1 &&
14941 std::all_of( ++items.begin(), items.end(), [&items]( item const * e ) {
14942 return e->stacks_with( *items.front() );
14943 } ) );
14944}
14945
14946namespace
14947{
14948template <class C>
14949void _aggregate( C &container, typename C::key_type const &key, item const *it,
14950 item::aggregate_t *&running_max, item::aggregate_t *&max_type, int depth,
14951 int maxdepth )
14952{
14953 auto const [iter, emplaced] = container.emplace( key, it );
14954 if( emplaced && running_max == nullptr ) {
14955 running_max = &iter->second;
14956 max_type = running_max;
14957 } else if( !emplaced ) {
14958 iter->second.info.bits &=
14959 iter->second.header->stacks_with( *it, false, false, true, depth, maxdepth ).bits;
14960 ++iter->second.count;
14961
14962 if constexpr( std::is_same_v<itype_id, typename C::key_type> ) {
14963 max_type = max_type->count < iter->second.count ? &iter->second : max_type;
14964 } else {
14965 iter->second.info.bits.reset( tname::segments::TYPE );
14966 }
14967
14968 running_max = running_max->count < iter->second.count ? &iter->second : running_max;
14969 }
14970}
14971} // namespace
14972
14973item::aggregate_t item::aggregated_contents( int depth, int maxdepth ) const
14974{
14975 constexpr double cutoff = 0.5;
14976
14977 std::unordered_map<itype_id, aggregate_t> types;
14978 std::unordered_map<item_category_id, aggregate_t> cats;
14979 unsigned int total{};
14980 aggregate_t *running_max{};
14981 aggregate_t *max_type{};
14982 auto const cont_and_soft = []( item_pocket const & pkt ) {
14983 return pkt.is_type( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) || pkt.is_type( pocket_type::SOFTWARE );
14984 };
14985
14986 for( item_pocket const *pk : contents.get_pockets( cont_and_soft ) ) {
14987 for( item const *pkit : pk->all_items_top() ) {
14988 total++;
14989 item_category_id const cat = pkit->get_category_of_contents( depth, maxdepth ).get_id();
14990 bool const type_ok = pkit->type->category_force != item_category_container ||
14991 cat == item_category_container;
14992 if( type_ok ) {
14993 _aggregate( types, pkit->typeId(), pkit, running_max, max_type, depth, maxdepth );
14994 }
14995 _aggregate( cats, cat, pkit, running_max, max_type, depth, maxdepth );
14996 }
14997 }
14998 if( running_max == nullptr ) {
14999 return {};
15000 }
15001
15002 unsigned int const cutoff_check =
15003 total < 3 ? total - 1 : static_cast<int>( std::floor( total * cutoff ) );
15004
15005 // alow a type to still dominate over its own category
15006 if( max_type->count > cutoff_check &&
15007 max_type->header->type->category_force != item_category_container &&
15008 max_type->header->cached_category.id == running_max->header->cached_category.id ) {
15009
15010 max_type->info.bits.set( tname::segments::TYPE );
15011 return *max_type;
15012 }
15013
15014 return running_max->count > cutoff_check ? *running_max : aggregate_t{};
15015}
15016
15017std::list<const item *> item::all_items_ptr() const
15018{
15019 std::list<const item *> all_items_internal;
15020 for( int i = static_cast<int>( pocket_type::CONTAINER );
15021 i < static_cast<int>( pocket_type::LAST ); i++ ) {
15022 std::list<const item *> inserted{ all_items_top_recursive( static_cast<pocket_type>( i ) ) };
15023 all_items_internal.insert( all_items_internal.end(), inserted.begin(), inserted.end() );
15024 }
15025 return all_items_internal;
15026}
15027
15028std::list<const item *> item::all_items_ptr( pocket_type pk_type ) const
15029{
15030 return all_items_top_recursive( pk_type );
15031}
15032
15033std::list<item *> item::all_items_ptr( pocket_type pk_type )
15034{
15035 return all_items_top_recursive( pk_type );
15036}
15037
15038std::list<const item *> item::all_items_top_recursive( pocket_type pk_type )
15039const
15040{
15041 std::list<const item *> contained = contents.all_items_top( pk_type );
15042 std::list<const item *> all_items_internal{ contained };
15043 for( const item *it : contained ) {
15044 std::list<const item *> recursion_items = it->all_items_top_recursive( pk_type );
15045 all_items_internal.insert( all_items_internal.end(), recursion_items.begin(),
15046 recursion_items.end() );
15047 }
15048
15049 return all_items_internal;
15050}
15051
15052std::list<item *> item::all_items_top_recursive( pocket_type pk_type )
15053{
15054 std::list<item *> contained = contents.all_items_top( pk_type );
15055 std::list<item *> all_items_internal{ contained };
15056 for( item *it : contained ) {
15057 std::list<item *> recursion_items = it->all_items_top_recursive( pk_type );
15058 all_items_internal.insert( all_items_internal.end(), recursion_items.begin(),
15059 recursion_items.end() );
15060 }
15061
15062 return all_items_internal;
15063}
15064

15066{

15068}
15069
15070std::list<const item *> item::all_known_contents() const
15071{
15072 return contents.all_known_contents();
15073}

15144
15145bool is_preferred_component( const item &component )
15146{
15147 return component.is_container_empty() && !component.has_flag( flag_HIDDEN_POISON ) &&
15148 !component.has_flag( flag_HIDDEN_HALLU );
15149}
15150
15151bool is_preferred_crafting_component( const item &component )
15152{
15153 return is_preferred_component( component ) && is_crafting_component( component );
15154}
15155
15156disp_mod_by_barrel::disp_mod_by_barrel() = default;
15157void disp_mod_by_barrel::deserialize( const JsonObject &jo )
15158{
15159 mandatory( jo, false, "barrel_length", barrel_length );
15160 mandatory( jo, false, "dispersion", dispersion_modifier );
15161}
